[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/khri ba nga bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po dgu pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 
[\[1b.2\]]'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug_/ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug la/_dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/_de yang mi dmigs 
[\[1b.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_
[\[1b.4\]]gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/_khams gsum la mi shes pa yang mi 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[1b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug_/'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /_'dus byas rnams dang /_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'dus ma byas rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la mi shes pa mi 'jug la/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la mi shes pa yang mi 'jug_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /_
[\[2a.2\]]'dus byas rnams dang /_'dus ma byas rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la mi shes pa yang mi 'jug cing de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jug pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems 
[\[2a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i theg pa yin te/_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_theg 
[\[2a.4\]]pa chen po yang gzhan la/_go cha chen po yang gzhan ma yin te/_go cha chen po nyid theg pa chen po yin la/_theg pa chen po nyid kyang go cha chen po yin pa'i phyir te/_theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_go cha chen po gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[2a.5\]]skyon med pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes brjod par bgyi 
[\[2a.6\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_shes rab kyi 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas nas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_len pa yang mi dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[2b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas nas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i chos mi dmigs/_mi dge ba'i chos dang /_lung du bstan pa dang /_
[\[2b.3\]]lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[2b.4\]]pa bsgom pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa po mi dmigs pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[2b.5\]]dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i ched du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/_/de bzhin du bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i ched du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_
[\[2b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[2b.7\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du bsgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgom pa ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]chen po 'di snyam du sems pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[3a.2\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyang dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin no/_/rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa 'di ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/mig dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di lta ste/_mig 'di ni ming dang tha snyad tsam 
[\[3a.3\]]du zad do/_/de bzhin du yid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang lus dang /_yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin du gzugs rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di lta ste/_gzugs rnams zhes bya ba 'di 
[\[3a.4\]]dag ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di lta ste/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di dag ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/dran pa 
[\[3a.5\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di dag ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lam gyi bar du dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[3a.6\]]rnams dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang de bzhin no/_/'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/_ming 
[\[3a.7\]]dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de dag ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de dag ni ming dang tha snyad tsam 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]du zad do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/byang chub dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 'di 
[\[3b.2\]]lta ste/_byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do/_/'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir/_ming dang tha snyad tsam du zad do snyam pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[3b.3\]]dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_nyams pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed/_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[3b.4\]]smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 
[\[3b.5\]]yang dang yang du 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rab mchog gi theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang nyan to/_/theg pa 'di la zhon te/_sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro yang de phyir zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[3b.6\]]'du shes kyang mi 'byung /_sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/yang de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas nas/_lus ji snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa de snyed kyi lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/bla na med pa yang 
[\[3b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang ma bskor 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa dang /_de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[4a.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhon nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[4a.3\]]rjes su thob nas/_de lta na gzhan dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze nas gzhan sus kyang ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'jig rten du bskor ro zhes de'i bsngags pa rjod cing snyan pa sgrogs la dbyangs brjod par mdzad de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[4a.4\]]dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[4a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_drug po de dag go/_/de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[4a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas 'di lta ste/_nang ngam phyi'i dngos po dag gi sbyin pa de 'dod pa rnams la sbyin par byed cing byin nas kyang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[4a.7\]]tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]bskyed pas bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas legs par spyod la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/_rab tu 'god la de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[4b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/_/de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la/_gzhan dag kyang bzod pa yang 
[\[4b.3\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub 
[\[4b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_pha rol phyin pa drug la brtson pa mi gtong ba yin/_sems can rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/_de yang 
[\[4b.5\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[4b.6\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_bdag kyang thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan dang /_tshad 
[\[4b.7\]]med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog cing /_
[\[5a.2\]]chos thams cad la yang mngon par zhen pa med la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med nas kyang gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god 
[\[5a.3\]]la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[5a.4\]]dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten pa lags sam/_'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de lta lags sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[5a.5\]]tu phyin pa 'jig rten pa lags shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de lta lags na ni/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[5a.6\]]lags/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jig rten pa ni 'dus byas lags la/_'dus byas gang lags pa de ni mi rtag pa lags na/_mi rtag pa gang lags pa de ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/_ji ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 
[\[5a.7\]]lags shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de lta lags na ni/_/de ni byed pa ma mchis pa lags la/_byed pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[5b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten pa ni gang lags/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 
[\[5b.3\]]ni gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin phod pa sbyin bdag tu gyur pa de dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_'dron pa dang /_sdug 'phongs pa dang /_slong ba rnams la zas 'dod pa dag la zas sbyin par 
[\[5b.4\]]byed/_skom 'dod pa dag la skom sbyin par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_khyim 'dod pa'i bar dag la sbyin par byed pa dang /_gnas 'dod pa dag la gnas sbyin par byed cing /_sman 'dod 
[\[5b.5\]]pa rnams la sman/_yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du slong ba rnams la mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bu pho sbyin par byed pa dang /_bu mo sbyin par byed pa dang /_chung ma dang /_slas kyi 'khor dag sbyin par byed pa 
[\[5b.6\]]dang /_de bzhin du mgo dang /_mig dag dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_rkang pa dang /_lag pa dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag dag sbyin par byed cing /_de dag kyang dngos po'i bdag nyid du gnas nas yongs su gtong bar byed la/_de 'di snyam du yang sems te/_bdag ni 
[\[5b.7\]]sbyin par byed pa'o/_/'di dag ni len par byed pa dag go/_/kye bdag ni ser sna med pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin bdag yin no/_/bdag ni slongs mo ster ba'o/_/kye bdag ni thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur sti byed pa'o/_/
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/sbyin pa de byin nas kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing /_bdag gi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams 
[\[6a.2\]]cad tshe 'di nyid la bde bar gyur cig_/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig snyam mo/_/de ni chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa de sbyin par byed de/_gsum po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[6a.3\]]gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/_chags pa gsum po de dag la chags nas/_sbyin pa de sbyin par byed pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[6a.4\]]'jig rten dang lhan cig tu spyod cing 'jig rten las mi g.yo la yang dag par mi 'da' ste/_rgyu des na 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la kye byang chub sems 
[\[6a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs/_sbyin pa yang ma yin la/_sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par dga' ba med pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[6a.6\]]bu 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin zhing byin nas kyang sems can de dag nyid la gtong yang sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[6a.7\]]mi mthong /_sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par dga' ba med la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang yongs su sngo mod kyi/_mtshan ma phra rab tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten las rgal zhing 'jig rten las 'phags la/_'jig rten las yang dag par 'das te/_de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gnas pa'i 
[\[6b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yin la/_mi gnas pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[6b.3\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yin la/_mi gnas pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[6b.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yang sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dang /_go cha chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon 
[\[6b.5\]]med pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na go cha chen po 
[\[6b.6\]]bgos pa go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_de bzhin du 
[\[6b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi go cha bgos/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi go cha bgos/_nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bcu'i go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed do/_/
[\[7a.2\]]de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed do/_/de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed do/_/khyab par byas nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[7a.3\]]rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/_rab tu g.yo bar byed/_kun tu rab tu g.yo bar byed do/_/de bzhin du shar phyogs nas phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/_rab tu g.yo bar byed/_kun tu rab tu 
[\[7a.4\]]g.yo bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de snang ba des kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bar gyi go cha bgos pa yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul par byed do/_/
[\[7a.5\]]mngon par sprul nas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bkod pa mngon par sprul par byed cing /_des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas kyang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed/_de bzhin du btung ba nas/_gos dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_
[\[7a.6\]]byug pa dang /_khang pa dang /_gnas dang /_mar me dang /_sman du sbyar ba dang /_sman gyi bar du sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sems can dag la sbyin par byed cing /_des sbyin pa de lta bu byin nas/_sems can de dag nyid 
[\[7a.7\]]la 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/_nam yang log par ltung bar mi ltung la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo phal po 
[\[7b.2\]]che'i mdun du zas 'dod pa dag la zas sbyin pa nas mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'am/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mas sems can gang la yang sbyin pa byin pa yod snyam 'am gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[7b.3\]]ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/_zas 'dod pa dag la zas sbyin par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi'i 
[\[7b.4\]]yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed kyang sems can gang la yang sbyin pa ci yang byin pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul 
[\[7b.5\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skye ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi dbang phyug de la gnas nas/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 
[\[7b.6\]]'god par byed/_de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la 'god par byed/_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[7b.7\]]thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed de/_sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos bstan 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa de dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[8a.2\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu'am/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des de la sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 
[\[8a.3\]]bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag dge ba bcu'i 
[\[8a.4\]]las kyi lam la bkod pa de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 
[\[8a.5\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bzod pa la 'god par byed do/_/
[\[8a.6\]]rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bzod pa la 'god par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung 
[\[8a.7\]]ste/_go cha 'di ltar gyon par byed de/_gal te sems can thams cad 'ongs nas/_bdag la dbyug pa dang /_mtshon cha dang /_bong ba dag gis bsnun kyang de la bdag gis sems can gang la yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' yang bskyed par mi bya'i bdag gis 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la dgod par bya'o snyam mo/_/des go cha de lta bu bgos nas dgra bo dang phyir rgol ba dag gis bong ba dang /_dbyug pa dang /_mtshon gyis gdab pa dag gis nyon mongs na yang nam yang sems can gang la yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/_
[\[8b.2\]]sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bzod pa de lta bu la 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod 
[\[8b.3\]]na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu'am/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des de la sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa la bkod pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[8b.4\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bzod pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir te/_
[\[8b.5\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[8b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba'i phyir dang /_dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 
[\[8b.7\]]'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'am/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des de la sems can 'ga' yang brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis 
[\[9a.2\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[9a.3\]]rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[9a.4\]]phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems 
[\[9a.5\]]can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/_chos gang yang mnyam 
[\[9a.6\]]par gzhag pa'am/_rnam par g.yeng bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de de kho na bzhin du sems can de dag bsam gtan de yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed la/_ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[9a.7\]]ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]nas/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu'am/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des de la sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[9b.2\]]phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bsam gtan 
[\[9b.3\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 
[\[9b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[9b.5\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[9b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod du med pa la gnas te/_chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_pha rol mi dmigs na/_rab 'byor de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[9b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin zhing /_de de kho na bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes 
[\[10a.2\]]bu'am/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des de la sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[10a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir te/_
[\[10a.4\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang dag sdig pa'i 
[\[10a.5\]]las kun tu spyod cing log pa'i chos la gzhol ba de dag ji ltar 'tsham pa'i lus dag la gnas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god 
[\[10a.6\]]par byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed 
[\[10a.7\]]cing /_sems can de dag la rtag tu 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs su ji skad bstan pa bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du ji ltar 
[\[10b.2\]]le'u dang por dpe dang bcas par bstan pa de kho na bzhin du 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'di 
[\[10b.3\]]bgos nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa na/_sems bskyed pa gzhan nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed la de 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod 
[\[10b.4\]]par bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba snga ma kho na bzhin no/_/de bzhin du bdag 
[\[10b.5\]]gis sems can 'di snyed cig dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[10b.6\]]thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la dgod par bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bar dag la dgod par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar 
[\[10b.7\]]dag la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[11a.2\]]dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi/_rab 'byor de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /_dran 
[\[11a.3\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag gis sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam mo/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhes bya ba nas/_de 
[\[11a.4\]]bzhin du sbyar te/_ji ltar sngar dpes bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[11a.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[11a.6\]]gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /_de bzhin du mig ni mig gis stong /_yid kyi bar ni yid kyis stong /_de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par 
[\[11a.7\]]shes pas stong /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /_de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_shes 
[\[11b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong /_nang stong pa 
[\[11b.3\]]nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[11b.4\]]kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis stong /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong /_go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_kye ma byang chub sems 
[\[11b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_rab 'byor 
[\[11b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dag yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[11b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis shing mngon par 'dus ma bgyis la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du go cha chen po 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'tshal ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis shing mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/
[\[12a.2\]]sems can de dag kyang ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed 
[\[12a.3\]]de/_rab 'byor de bzhin du bdag ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bdag la sogs pa gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 
[\[12a.4\]]'byor rmi lam yang mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rmi lam ni gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_de bzhin du brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sprul pa ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[12a.5\]]rab 'byor 'di ltar sprul pa de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nang stong pa nyid de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i 
[\[12a.6\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/
[\[12a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[12b.2\]]dpa' ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rab 
[\[12b.3\]]'byor rnam grangs des na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des 
[\[12b.4\]]kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po bcu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[12b.5\]]ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so/_/
[\[12b.6\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/_
[\[12b.7\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin te/_gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma 
[\[13a.2\]]grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i 'du shes dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i 'du byed rnams dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_brag ca lta bu'i gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar ni ma bcings ma 
[\[13a.3\]]grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du mig yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings 
[\[13a.4\]]ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 
[\[13a.5\]]bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor 
[\[13a.6\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_med pa'i phyir gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/_rnam 
[\[13a.7\]]par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs dben pa'i phyir/_gzugs thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dben pa'i phyir dang /_rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_rnam par shes pa 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs skye ba med pa'i phyir/_gzugs thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa'i phyir/_rnam par 
[\[13b.2\]]shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/_gzugs thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang /_rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med 
[\[13b.3\]]pa'i phyir/_rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gzugs dge ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dge ba dang /_'du shes dge ba dang /_'du byed dge ba rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dge ba ni ma bcings 
[\[13b.4\]]ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs mi dge ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed mi dge ba rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dge ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs lung du ma bstan pa ni ma bcings ma 
[\[13b.5\]]grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa lung du ma bstan pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[13b.6\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[13b.7\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gzugs zag pa dang bcas pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ma bcings ma 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]grol ba'o/_/gzugs zag pa med pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed zag pa med pa rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zag pa med pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs med pa'i phyir 
[\[14a.2\]]dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams med pa'i phyir dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[14a.3\]]gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du dben pa'i phyir dang /_gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /_gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang /_gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyir dang /_
[\[14a.4\]]gzugs dang de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad 
[\[14a.5\]]dben pa'i phyir dang skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /_'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang /_ma bcings pa'i phyir dang /_ma grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 
[\[14a.6\]]de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[14a.7\]]med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du med pa nyid kyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang ma bcings 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 
[\[14b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ma bcings pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ma grol ba nyid kyi 
[\[14b.3\]]phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_
[\[14b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 
[\[14b.5\]]de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_'dus ma 
[\[14b.6\]]byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus ma byas kyi bar du med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ma bcings pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ma grol ba nyid kyi phyir 'dus ma byas kyi bar du ma 
[\[14b.7\]]bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_le'u gong mar 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ma bcings ma grol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad 
[\[15a.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/ma bcings ma grol ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de ma bcings ma grol ba kho na'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/
[\[15a.3\]]de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ma bcings ma grol ba kho na'i chos kyang nyan to/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[15a.4\]]ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[15a.5\]]nyid kyang mngon par sgrub bo/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang skyed par byed do/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[15a.6\]]de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la sbyor bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos thams cad mngon 
[\[15a.7\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_chos thams cad med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma bcings 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ma grol ba'i go cha chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po ni 'di lta ste/_mngon par shes pa drug po dag yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon 
[\[15b.2\]]sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi 
[\[15b.3\]]gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid de/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pa drug po dag yin 
[\[15b.4\]]no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_
[\[15b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa du ma myong bar byed de/_des 'di yang g.yo bar byed do/_/de bzhin du gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /_mang por gyur nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du snang bar 'gyur zhing /_mi snang bar 'gyur ba yang myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la yang thad 
[\[15b.6\]]kar 'gro'o/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ri la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung bcas nas 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_byi'u zul byed de/_dper 
[\[15b.7\]]na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du ba 'thul bar yang byed/_'bar bar yang byed de/_dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]grags pa 'di dag la yang lag pas nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/gang gis rlom sems su byed pa dang /_gang la rlom sems su byed pa dang /_gang zhig rlom sems su byed pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa 
[\[16a.2\]]nyid kyi phyir dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul des kyang rlom sems su mi byed/_rdzu 'phrul de la yang rlom sems su mi byed/_dmigs par yang mi byed cing /_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma 
[\[16a.3\]]gtogs par rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i sems pa yang mi skyed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no/_/
[\[16a.4\]]rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_lha'i mig 
[\[16a.5\]]rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba rnams dang /_skye ba rnams dang /_kha dog bzang po rnams dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_ngan pa dang /_bar ma dang /_gya nom pa'i sems can rnams las ji ltar bsags 
[\[16a.6\]]pa bzhin du rab tu shes te/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta ba dang ldan pa dag ste/_kye ma de dag ni log par lta 
[\[16a.7\]]ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhig ste shi nas/_ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ldan pa dag yin te/_rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can las ji ltar bsags pa rnams mthong ba'i bar dang /_bde 
[\[16b.2\]]'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[16b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_lha'i rna ba mi'i las 'das pas de 'di lta ste/_lha dang mi'i sgra nyan kyang ngo 
[\[16b.4\]]bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag ni sgra nyan to zhes lha'i rna ba des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra de yang mi dmigs la/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma 
[\[16b.5\]]gtogs par lha'i rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir sems kyang skyed par mi byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin 
[\[16b.6\]]no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[16b.7\]]la gnas te/_de sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe 
[\[17a.2\]]sdang dang bral ba'i sems la/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la/_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la/_gti 
[\[17a.3\]]mug dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sred pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/_sred pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la/_sred pa dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag 
[\[17a.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/_nye bar len pa med pa'i sems dang /_sems bsdus pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang /_sems chung ngu dang /_sems rgya chen por gyur pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i 
[\[17a.5\]]sems dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems dang /_sems rnam par grol ba dang /_sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /_bla na yod pa'i sems la/_bla na yod pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na med pa'i sems la/_bla na med pa'i 
[\[17a.6\]]sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la/_de dag gis rlom sems su yang mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems de dag ni sems ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_ji ltar gong du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher 
[\[17a.7\]]sbyar bar bya ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngon gyi gnas 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon 
[\[17b.2\]]sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub cing /_des sems gcig rjes su dran pa nas/_sems brgya'i bar dang /_sems stong gi bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar dang /_nyi ma stong gi bar dang /_nyi ma 'bum gyi bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/
[\[17b.3\]]zla ba gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_zla ba brgya'i bar dang /_zla ba stong gi bar dang /_zla ba 'bum gyi bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/lo gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_lo 'bum gyi bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_bskal pa brgya phrag du 
[\[17b.4\]]ma'i bar dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa 'bum phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no/_/de na bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig 
[\[17b.5\]]za za/_yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/_tshe ring khyad ni 'di tsam zhig lon/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /_de de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/_
[\[17b.6\]]yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma dag rjes su dran la/_mngon par shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa'i bar du ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngon 
[\[17b.7\]]gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/_rab 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang rjes su thob par mi byed la/_gang 
[\[18a.2\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gang la yang 'dod par mi byed cing /_de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas/_bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed mod kyi/_ngo bo nyid 
[\[18a.3\]]kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par 
[\[18a.4\]]sems kyang skyed par mi byed de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[18a.5\]]phyin pa la gnas pa'i mngon par shes pa drug po dag yongs su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya ste/_de yang go cha chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mngon par shes pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[18a.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po ni 'di lta ste/_yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga ste/_lnga po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig go/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[18a.7\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyar mthong ba yang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgyar mthong ba yang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad 
[\[18b.2\]]sum brgyar mthong ba yang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya dang /_lnga brgya dang /_drug brgyar mthong ba yang yod do/_/yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis 'dzam 
[\[18b.3\]]bu gling gcig mthong ba yang yod do/_/yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu gling gnyis mthong ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sha'i mig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du mthong ba yang yod do/_/yang rab 
[\[18b.4\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yang yod do/_/yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yang yod do/_/
[\[18b.5\]]yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yang yod do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[18b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[18b.7\]]pos rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]dpa' chen pos rab tu shes la/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rab tu mi shes pa nas/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis rab tu mi shes so/_/yang rab 'byor 
[\[19a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig des/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can las ji ltar bsags pa rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dag kyang mthong /_kha dog bzang po rnams dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams dang bde 'gro dang /_ngan 
[\[19a.3\]]'gro dang /_ngan pa dang /_bar ma dang /_gya nom pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta ba dang ldan pa dag 
[\[19a.4\]]yin te/_kye ma de dag ni log par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhig ste/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi legs 
[\[19a.5\]]par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag ste zhes bya ba nas/_rgyu de dang rkyen de'i bar du ste/_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[19a.6\]]ma snyed kyi bar dag na sems can dag las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin zhes bya ba nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/
[\[19a.7\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig gang gis 'di snyam 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]du gang 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang yod do snyam du mi sems pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig gang 
[\[19b.2\]]gis gang ma mthong ba'am/_ma thos pa'am/_ma dran pa'am/_rnam par ma shes pa'i chos gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[19b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis 'di ltar shes te/_gang zag 'di ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/
[\[19b.4\]]'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'o/_/'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa'o/_/'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa'o/_/gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgos dbang po lnga po dag skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu dbang po 
[\[19b.5\]]lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun du sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[19b.6\]]ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/_kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems 
[\[19b.7\]]gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/_de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/_/des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/des de gnyis spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/des 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa ste/_
[\[20a.2\]]des de dag spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /_gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgos dbang po lnga po dag skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[20a.3\]]las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa 
[\[20a.4\]]ste/_kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/_de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/_/des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 
[\[20a.5\]]'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga po dag spong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[20a.6\]]ste/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa ste/_des de dag spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /_gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgos dbang po lnga po dag skyed par 
[\[20a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/_kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_
[\[20b.2\]]gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/_de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/_/des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems de gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnyi ga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/des 
[\[20b.3\]]bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga po dag spong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa ste/_des de dag 
[\[20b.4\]]spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 'di ltar shes te/_kun 'byung ba'i chos gang 
[\[20b.5\]]ci yang rung de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin par rig nas/_dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[20b.6\]]dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 'di ltar shes te/_'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba dang /_de nas dad pa'i 
[\[20b.7\]]dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas rtag tu lus bzang po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nye bar rton pas brtan pa ste/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/_bram ze'i 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gam/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro 
[\[21a.2\]]zhes bya bar shes so/_/der gnas nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing bde ba nye bar sgrub pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[21a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par byed/_bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed de/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[21a.4\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar shes te/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar 
[\[21a.5\]]shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/'di ni lung ma bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni rang gi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[21a.6\]]chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog pa'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i mngon par shes pa ni yongs su rdzogs so/_/'di'i ni yongs su ma rdzogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag gis 
[\[21a.7\]]shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_bkur stir bya ba'i phyir dang /_bla mar bya ba'i phyir dang /_ri mor bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]par bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa thob po/_/'di ni 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur 
[\[21b.2\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas so/_/'dis ni yongs su smin par ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags 
[\[21b.3\]]pa rjod pa mdzad do/_/'di la ni rjod pa mi mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas so/_/gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni nye bar mi gnas so/_/nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di 
[\[21b.4\]]byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[21b.5\]]chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni
