[\[21b.6\]]srid pa tha ma pa yin no/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la ni bdud 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar shes 
[\[21b.7\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis byang chub kyi sems kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[22a.2\]]la snyoms par zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob la/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[22a.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gang gis kyang rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la ma mthong ba'am/_ma thos pa'am/_mi dran pa'am/_mngon par mi shes pa gang yang med pa ste/_rab 
[\[22a.4\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mig yongs su dag pa ni de lta bu ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu yongs su dag 
[\[22a.5\]]pa'i mig lnga po dag yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga po de dag yongs su dag par byed pa ni go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[22a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang dag la gnas par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[22a.7\]]pa la spyod pas chos gang la yang gnas par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnas dang /_gnas pa po dang /_gnas par bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin 
[\[22b.2\]]du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/mig la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/
[\[22b.3\]]de bzhin du gzugs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas 
[\[22b.4\]]par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos kyi khams kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[22b.5\]]pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi zhing /_sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi/_nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par 
[\[22b.6\]]mi bgyi/_ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[22b.7\]]par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags la/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]lags pa'i slad du ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa 
[\[23a.2\]]dang /_'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la/_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te/_rnam par 
[\[23a.3\]]shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_
[\[23a.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi ma lags la/_
[\[23a.5\]]rga shi'i stong pa nyid las gud na yang rga shi ma mchis te/_rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_stong pa nyid kyang rga shi lags pa'i slad du ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rga 
[\[23a.6\]]shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar dran pa nye 
[\[23a.7\]]bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[23b.2\]]'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis stong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags 
[\[23b.3\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lags pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas 
[\[23b.4\]]par mi bgyi lags so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[23b.5\]]par mi bgyi lags/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[23b.6\]]du zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na stong pa nyid ma mchis la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[23b.7\]]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_yig 'bru rnams la gnas 
[\[24a.2\]]par mi bgyi/_yi ge bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi/_gcig brjod pa dang /_gnyis brjod pa dang /_mang po brjod pa'i bar dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar yig 'bru rnams ni yig 'bru rnams kyis stong pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[24a.3\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de 
[\[24a.4\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/_mngon par shes pa gang lags pa de ni stong pa nyid ma lags/_stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags shing /_mngon par shes pa rnams las gud 
[\[24a.5\]]na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te/_mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams lags pa'i slad du ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 
[\[24a.6\]]des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[24a.7\]]pas/_gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gang lags pa de stong pa nyid ma lags/_stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs mi rtag pa 
[\[24b.2\]]nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dag la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi ste/_
[\[24b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs mi rtag pa nyid nas rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs 
[\[24b.4\]]nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bde zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags 
[\[24b.5\]]so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes bgyi bar 
[\[24b.6\]]gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes 
[\[24b.7\]]pa'i bar la skye ba ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzugs kyi phung por ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_
[\[25a.2\]]chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis 
[\[25a.3\]]te/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos kyi de bzhin 
[\[25a.4\]]nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/btsun 
[\[25a.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_
[\[25a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/_snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 
[\[25a.7\]]bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis gzugs la spyod cing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod na/_de lta na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /_de bzhin du tshor 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te/_mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin cing /_
[\[25b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' shes 
[\[25b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis de gzugs la spyod cing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod na/_de lta na 
[\[25b.4\]]gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /_de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags la/_mngon par 
[\[25b.5\]]'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 
[\[25b.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa'i yid kyis de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_ting nge 
[\[25b.7\]]'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar la spyod na gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te/_mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis/_de bzhin du tshor ba 
[\[26a.2\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/gzugs kyi gzung ba ma mchis pa/_de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du gzugs ma lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang /_
[\[26a.3\]]'du shes gang lags pa dang /_'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_ting nge 
[\[26a.4\]]'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma 
[\[26a.5\]]lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par 
[\[26a.6\]]nye bar brtag par bgyi ste/_ci nas kyang chos gang la yang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar nye bar brtag par bgyi ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yangs pa/_tshad ma mchis pa 
[\[26a.7\]]tshad ma nges pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[26b.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[26b.3\]]du zhe na/_de ni mtshan mas bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/mtshan ma yang gang lags she na/_'di lta ste gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang reg 
[\[26b.4\]]bya dang /_chos ni mtshan ma lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar du ni mtshan ma lags te/_de ni mtshan ma zhes bgyi'o/_/nyon mongs pa yang de lags te de ni gzung bar mi bgyi/_goms 
[\[26b.5\]]par mi bgyi lags so/_/de lta ma lags na ni kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad par mi 'gyur lags so/_/dad pa de yang gang zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yid ches pa dang /_rtog pa dang mos pa dang rten pa dang sems pa dang 
[\[26b.6\]]'jal ba dang dpyod pa ste/_de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags te/_de ltar na mtshan ma de gzung bar mi bgyi lags so/_/kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du shes pas zhugs nas/_gzugs yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[26b.7\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan mar yongs su ma bzung ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la yongs su gzung ba mi skye ba'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]ltar des shes pa de nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_phyi'i mngon par rtogs pa thob pa dang /_phyi nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/_nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa 
[\[27a.2\]]de shes pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des gang gis shes par bgyid pa dang /_gang shes par bgyid pa dang /_gang las shes par bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_shes pa de gzugs 
[\[27a.3\]]nas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang 
[\[27a.4\]]dang /_phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_gzugs las gzhan du shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par 
[\[27a.5\]]rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/_de chos 'di la mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/_/de lta bas na chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid tshad mar bgyis nas/_mtshan ma 
[\[27a.6\]]yid la mi bgyid pas ci nas kyang des chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa de ltar mos lags so/_/chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang gzung bar bgyi ba'am/_gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/_chos thams cad rlom 
[\[27a.7\]]sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/_de mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni/_pha rol nas pha rol 
[\[27b.2\]]du 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so/_/de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[27b.3\]]kyi chos sam 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba nas/_de bzhin du 
[\[27b.4\]]sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i slad du ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_
[\[27b.5\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas/_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[27b.6\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[27b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bgyi ste/_kye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang /_gang gis na 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_'di gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/_de ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa zhes brtag par bgyi ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na yang 'di snyam du chos gang yang med cing mi dmigs pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o snyam du nges par sems par bgyid do/_/
[\[28a.2\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos med cing mi dmigs pa gang yin/_smras pa/_nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_stong 
[\[28a.3\]]pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_
[\[28a.4\]]dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[28a.5\]]phyir dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ni med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dang /_tshe 
[\[28a.6\]]dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ni med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med 
[\[28a.7\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[28b.2\]]brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa drug med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[28b.3\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa med cing mi dmigs pa nas/_dgra bcom pa'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs 
[\[28b.4\]]rgyas med cing mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[28b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_de ltar nye bar rtog par byed cing nges par sems par byed la/_de ltar nye bar rtog par byed cing /_de ltar nges par sems pa na/_gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang 
[\[28b.6\]]bar mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na byang chub sems 
[\[28b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[29a.2\]]ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[29a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[29a.4\]]pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[29a.5\]]la spyod pa na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[29a.6\]]'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/_yang dag 
[\[29a.7\]]pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_ji ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang 
[\[29b.2\]]bzhin dang bral ba de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba/_mtshan nyid kyang rang bzhin dang 
[\[29b.3\]]bral ba yin la/_rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid dang bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di 
[\[29b.4\]]la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[29b.5\]]nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[29b.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/_de la ni skyes pa yang med cing 'byung ba yang dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la ni skyes pa 
[\[29b.7\]]yang med cing 'byung ba yang dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de la ni skyes pa yang med cing 'byung ba yang dmigs su med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mi gnas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thabs la 
[\[30a.2\]]mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/yang gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/_mi rtag ces 
[\[30a.3\]]bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/_mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te 
[\[30a.4\]]gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni 
[\[30a.5\]]mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la bdag mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la bdag 
[\[30a.6\]]mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la stong zhes bgyi ba'am/_mi stong zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[30a.7\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bgyi ba'am/_mi stong zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_smon pa ma mchis 
[\[30b.2\]]zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/
[\[30b.3\]]gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_
[\[30b.4\]]de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba'am/_mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la dben zhes 
[\[30b.5\]]bgyi ba'am/_mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba'am/_rnam par byang zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[30b.6\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba'am/_rnam par byang zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la skye zhes bgyi ba'am/_mi skye zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la 
[\[30b.7\]]spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la skye zhes bgyi ba'am/_mi skye zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la 'gag ces bgyi ba'am/_mi 'gag 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]ces bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la 'gag ces bgyi ba'am/_mi 'gag ces bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod 
[\[31a.2\]]pa lags so/_/gal te gzugs la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la dngos po 
[\[31a.3\]]mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/_dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thabs la mi mkhas pas dran pa nye 
[\[31a.4\]]bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa 
[\[31a.5\]]lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di snyam du sems 
[\[31a.6\]]te/_bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/_de bsgom par bya'o snyam na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/_/gal te 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags 
[\[31a.7\]]so/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o snyam na/_de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas pa lags par rig par 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bgyi lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_de 
[\[31b.2\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos la/_de gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[31b.3\]]pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa na/_gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs kyi mngon par 
[\[31b.4\]]'du byed pa la spyod pa nas rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i bar la spyod na de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la skye ba las yongs su mi thar zhing /_de ni rga ba nas 'khrug pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[31b.5\]]sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thabs la mi mkhas pas mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mngon par zhen la mos par byed na/_de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[31b.6\]]bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o/_/de bzhin du gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gal te chos kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na/_de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs 
[\[31b.7\]]su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o/_/gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na/_de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o/_/gal 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la gnas shing 
[\[32a.2\]]kun tu shes te mos par byed na/_de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o/_/de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[32a.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_thabs la mi mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /_thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces 
[\[32a.4\]]smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_thabs la mkhas par rig par bya de skad ces smras 
[\[32a.5\]]pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[32a.6\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin 
[\[32a.7\]]du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba'am/_bdag med 
[\[32b.2\]]ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan 
[\[32b.3\]]ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin 
[\[32b.4\]]du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[32b.5\]]shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs 
[\[32b.6\]]kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye 
[\[32b.7\]]zhes bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs 'gag ces bya ba'am/_mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba'am/_mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/_dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[33a.2\]]shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/_dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang 
[\[33a.3\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin/_gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med de/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang /_de 
[\[33a.4\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med de/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par 
[\[33a.5\]]shes pa yin la/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/_
[\[33a.6\]]stong pa nyid las gud na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med de/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid 
[\[33a.7\]]gang yin pa de/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med de/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar yang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las gud na yang stong pa nyid med stong pa nyid 
[\[33b.2\]]las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid 
[\[33b.3\]]gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad med de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[33b.4\]]brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/_mi spyod do/_/
[\[33b.5\]]zhes bya bar khas mi len/_spyod kyang spyod la/_mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/_spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar khas mi len na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[33b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[33b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thams cad du khas mi len/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]nyid yin pa'i phyir te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na khas mi len to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bur yang 
[\[34a.2\]]khas mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /_gzung ba med pa'i phyir te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad nye bar len pa med pa rgya che ba'i yo 
[\[34a.3\]]byad tshad med par gtogs pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[34a.4\]]rgya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[34a.5\]]kho na dang ma bral zhing ldan pa/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'tshang rgya/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag 
[\[34a.6\]]la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[34a.7\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[34b.2\]]yod do/_/zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i rgyal 
[\[34b.3\]]mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal 
[\[34b.4\]]po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la 'jug cing phyogs la 
[\[34b.5\]]rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[34b.6\]]nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[34b.7\]]dang /_bkod pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma 
[\[35a.2\]]med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[35a.3\]]'dzin dang /_nges par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba byed pa zhes 
[\[35a.4\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mchog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[35a.5\]]rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyis gnas pa'i spyi gtsug ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[35a.6\]]'dzin dang /_rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[35a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya 
[\[35b.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[35b.3\]]shin tu brtags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[35b.4\]]nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_srid pa'i 'dam bu thams cad phung po med par rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[35b.5\]]'dzin dang /_sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi 
[\[35b.6\]]mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa 
[\[35b.7\]]dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra bsgrags pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gal ba dang 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig rten thams cad la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i 
[\[36a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_g.yo ba med cing gnas pa med la dga' ba zhes bya 
[\[36a.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' ltar 
[\[36a.4\]]chags pa med la rnam par grol ba las rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[36a.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni de dag yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/a la la de ltar na byang chub 
[\[36a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa de ni/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin la/_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 
[\[36a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lung ston par rig par 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni snyoms par ma zhugs pa dag go/_/bdag ni snyoms par zhugs pa'o/_/snyoms par 'jug go/_/snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro snyam du ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rlom 
[\[36b.2\]]sems su yang mi byed la/_rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad de la med cing mi 'byung ngo /_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i 
[\[36b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa dag gis lung bstan par rig par bya'am/_
[\[36b.4\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhing /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzhan ma yin gyi/_byang 
[\[36b.5\]]chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/_ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[36b.6\]]ldan pa rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/_ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[36b.7\]]yin pa de gnyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na ni/_de lta na ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes shing /_kun tu shes pa med par yang 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'di nyid kyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de mi shes shing /_kun tu shes pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_ting nge 'dzin de dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa nyid 
[\[37a.2\]]kyi phyir mi shes shing kun tu shes pa yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis tshig 'di ni legs par smras so/_/'di ltar khyod ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par 
[\[37a.3\]]gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de la lung phog pa 'di ni khyod kyi tshul dang 'thun pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[37a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la de ltar bslab par bya ba nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[37a.5\]]brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[37a.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha 
[\[37a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la slob pa yin zhing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar slob na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar la slob pa yin pa nas/_de ltar slob na sangs 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la slob pa yin te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar 
[\[37b.2\]]slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[37b.3\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs sems can mi dmigs pa nas/_shes pa po dang /_
[\[37b.4\]]mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po rnams mi dmigs/_khams rnams mi dmigs/_skye mched rnams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs pa nas/_rga shi'i bar du mi dmigs 
[\[37b.5\]]so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs/_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs/_gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs/_gzugs med 
[\[37b.6\]]pa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[37b.7\]]bcu mi dmigs pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dag pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/_/
[\[38a.2\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[38a.3\]]chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_de bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa de ni rnam par dag pa yin no/_/
[\[38a.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa na chos gang dag la bslabs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa na chos 
[\[38a.5\]]gang dag la yang bslabs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag mngon par zhen pa de ltar chos 'di dag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di 
[\[38a.6\]]dag mngon par zhen pa de ltar ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/_de ltar med pas ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de dag mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi lags/_
[\[38a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med do/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir tshor ba dang /_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med do/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dngos 
[\[38b.2\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du med na/_de la byis pa so so'i skye bo ma rig pa dang sred pa'i dbang gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis mngon par zhen nas yod pa ma yin pa la yod par brtags so/_/de dag ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[38b.3\]]rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/_de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/_chos gang dag med pa de dag la kun tu rtog par byed do/_/brtags nas kyang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[38b.4\]]kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/_/de dag mngon par zhen pa nyid yin pas na yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog par byed pa'i phyir de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba dag yin no/_/de dag ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/_gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba 
[\[38b.5\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/gang gi phyir mi shes shing mi mthong ba de'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya 
[\[38b.6\]]ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/_gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/nyan 
[\[38b.7\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de dag ni yid mi ches pa dag yin te/_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]gzugs stong pa nyid du yid mi ches so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed rnams stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du yid mi ches pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang yid mi ches 
[\[39a.2\]]so/_/yang de dag ni mi gnas pa dag yin te/_gang la mi gnas zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la mi gnas so/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la 
[\[39a.3\]]mi gnas te/_rgyu des na byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya/_mngon par zhen pa zhes bya'o/_/ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhing de dag gang la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/_gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mngon par zhen to/_/de bzhin du mig la 
[\[39a.4\]]mngon par zhen pa nas/_de bzhin du yid kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang reg bya dang /_chos rnams la mngon par zhen to/_/de bzhin du khams rnams la mngon par zhen to/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug 
[\[39a.5\]]rnams la mngon par zhen to/_/lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom 
[\[39a.6\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu zhig lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[39b.2\]]dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag tu rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to/_/mngon 
[\[39b.3\]]par zhen nas kyang thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog par byed do/_/yongs su brtags nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par byed de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[39b.4\]]la slob pa ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[39b.5\]]la slob pa ma lags shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags mod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[39b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar slob na rnam pa thams cad 
[\[39b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_sha ra 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/mi dmigs pa 
[\[40a.2\]]yang gang zhe na/_gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid mi dmigs pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar de nyid mi dmigs pa dang /_byang chub kyi bar du mi 
[\[40a.3\]]dmigs pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing /_rnam 
[\[40a.4\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos 
[\[40a.5\]]thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das theg pa des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur 
[\[40a.6\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor theg pa des ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de nyid du gnas par 'gyur la/_de yang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so/_/
[\[40a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyi ga ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /_gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams ni nges par mi 'byung nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_nges par ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la 
[\[40b.2\]]nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad cing /_de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med 
[\[40b.3\]]pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/gang 
[\[40b.4\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni spong ba'i khams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang /_'gog pa'i 
[\[40b.5\]]dbyings dang /_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad pa dang /_de bzhin du de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs 
[\[40b.6\]]kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma 
[\[40b.7\]]yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rab 'byor gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg 
[\[41a.2\]]pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas/_de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[41a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[41a.4\]]rab 'byor 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du stong pa dang /_de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[41a.5\]]bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor 
[\[41a.6\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de 
[\[41a.7\]]bzhin du sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i 
[\[41b.2\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin 
[\[41b.3\]]pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[41b.4\]]'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[41b.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[41b.6\]]rab 'byor 'di la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /_rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan
