[\[101b.4\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di zab bo/_/de bzhin du byang chub rnam par dag 
[\[101b.5\]]pa'i phyir dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di zab bo/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni snang ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[101b.6\]]stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[101b.7\]]pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos 
[\[102a.2\]]rnam par dag pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs 'pho ba med pa dang /_shin tu 
[\[102a.3\]]rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa yin no/_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pa dang /_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa yin no/_/
[\[102a.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[102a.5\]]gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/_/de 
[\[102a.6\]]bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni thob pa ma mchis shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa 
[\[102a.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa ni thob pa ma mchis 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[102b.2\]]nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa la ni thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma grub pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin 
[\[102b.3\]]tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma grub pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa mngon par ma grub pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs mngon par ma grub pa ni chos rnam 
[\[102b.4\]]par dag pa yin no/_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par ma grub pa ni chos rnam par dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[102b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[102b.6\]]pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni gzugs kyi khams su mi skye lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[102b.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni gzugs kyi khams su mi skye'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams su mi skye'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_gsol 
[\[103a.2\]]pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par dag pa ni 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni shes pa med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji 
[\[103a.3\]]ltar na chos rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/_chos rnam par dag pa ni shes pa med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_ci zhig 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[103a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes pa med pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes pa med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[103a.5\]]thams cad rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos rnam par dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad 
[\[103a.6\]]rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_chos rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par 
[\[103a.7\]]bgyid pa yang ma lags/_gnod par bgyid pa yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par byed pa yang ma yin/_gnod par byed pa yang ma 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/_gnod par mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun 
[\[103b.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos ci yang yongs su mi 'dzin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos ci yang 
[\[103b.3\]]yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos ci yang yongs su mi 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[103b.4\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/_gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[103b.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_bdag rnam par dag pas/_gzugs rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[103b.6\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_bdag rnam par dag pas/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[103b.7\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de bzhin 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[104a.2\]]bdag rnam par dag pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam rnam par dag pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag 
[\[104a.3\]]pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[104a.4\]]ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/_rgyun du 
[\[104a.5\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags so/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /_rang byang chub dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[104a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[104a.7\]]'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag med pa'i phyir dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang /_shes pa po med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[104b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gnyis rnam par dag pas thob pa ma mchis shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i 
[\[104b.3\]]slad du gnyis rnam par dag pas thob pa ma mchis shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyin ci log las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_
[\[104b.4\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs 
[\[104b.5\]]dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir bdag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_de ltar 
[\[104b.6\]]rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 
[\[104b.7\]]de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa 'di snyam du gzugs kyis gzugs mi shes so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa mi shes so/_/'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 
[\[105a.2\]]'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams mi shes so/_/da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[105a.3\]]pa'i bar gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi shes so snyam du sems na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[105a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[105a.5\]]ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa la gnyis kyi 'du shes 'byung ngam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[105a.6\]]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[105a.7\]]dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]kyi phyir 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/'di la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sbyin pa 'di 'dra ba zhig sbyin par bya'o/_/bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o/_/tshul khrims 'di ltar bsrung bar bya'o/_/bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/bzod pa 'di ltar bsgom 
[\[105b.2\]]par bya'o/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus 'di ltar brtsam par bya'o/_/bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/_/bsam gtan la 'di ltar snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/_/bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o/_/shes rab 
[\[105b.3\]]'di ltar bsgom par bya'o/_/bdag gis bsod nams bskyed par bya'o/_/bsod nams 'di ltar bskyed par bya'o/_/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'di ltar 'jug par bya'o/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[105b.4\]]zhing yongs su dag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ltar yongs su dag par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/sems can rnams 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/_/bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par bya'o/_/rnam pa 
[\[105b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ltar rjes su thob par bya'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa med de/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[105b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa'i chags pa med pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[105b.7\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi chags pa gang dag yin par rig par bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ni rang gi sems 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]su kun tu shes/_sbyin par kun tu shes/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par kun tu shes/_tshul khrims su kun tu shes/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par kun tu shes/_bzod par kun tu shes/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par kun tu shes/_brtson 'grus su kun 
[\[106a.2\]]tu shes/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par kun tu shes/_bsam gtan du kun tu shes/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par kun tu shes/_shes rab tu kun tu shes/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par kun tu shes/_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes/_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[106a.3\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu shes pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhir kun tu shes pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du kun tu shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[106a.4\]]stobs bcur kun tu shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du kun tu shes/_sangs rgyas su kun tu shes/_sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun tu shes shing /_chos de dag thams cad kyang brtul cing bsdus te sems can thams cad dang /_
[\[106a.5\]]thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/_de yang yongs su bsngo bar kun tu shes pa ste/_kau shi ka de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi chags pa yin par rig par bya ste/_chags pa 
[\[106a.6\]]de dag dang kun tu 'brel na chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni 
[\[106a.7\]]yongs su bsngo bar mi nus shing /_de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan dag kun tu mgu ba dang /_chos 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'byung ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par dga' bar bya/_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/_yang dag par gzengs bstod 
[\[106b.2\]]par bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_bdag ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims bsrung ba'o/_/bdag ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[106b.3\]]pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab bsgom pa'o/_/bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[106b.4\]]bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la bsgom pa'o/_/bdag ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa'o snyam du mtshan ma las rnam par rtog pa dag yid la mi bya'o/_/de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan dag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[106b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par dga' bar bya/_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/de yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs 
[\[106b.6\]]bstod pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa des gzhan dag yang dag par dga' bar byed cing /_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs stod pa dang /_yang dag par ston par byed pa na/_bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba 
[\[106b.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa'i mtha' yongs su sbyong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang chags pa'i mtha' rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa ni legs so legs so/_/
[\[107a.2\]]rab 'byor de'i phyir chags pa'i mtha' ches phra ba gzhan dag kyang legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[107a.3\]]'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa la la zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar 
[\[107a.4\]]yid la byed na/_rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i 
[\[107a.5\]]bar skabs de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing mtshan mar yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_rab 'byor de ci tsam du mtshan mar 
[\[107a.6\]]yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[107a.7\]]dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/_ci tsam du sems can rnams mtshan mar yid la byed pa ni de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/_de tsam du chags pa yin no/_/de 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[107b.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[107b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa lags so/_/
[\[107b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin la ni gnyis su med de/_rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig kho nar zad do/_/rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig bo gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa yin no/_/rab 'byor rang bzhin gang 
[\[107b.5\]]yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i rang bzhin yin no/_/yang dag pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na/_chags 
[\[107b.6\]]pa'i mtha' thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[107b.7\]]'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos rnam par ma shes so/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems kyis ma bskyed/_gzugs kyis ma yin/_tshor bas ma yin/_'du shes kyis ma yin/_'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/_rnam par shes pas ma bskyed do/_/de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[108a.2\]]rnams kyis ma bskyed/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis ma bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma bskyed/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gis ma bskyed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_
[\[108a.3\]]rnam par dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i byed pa po lags so/_/bcom 
[\[108a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang /_chos thams cad kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi 
[\[108a.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_gang gi tshe gzugs la mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba 
[\[108a.6\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs 
[\[108a.7\]]rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar 
[\[108b.2\]]mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[108b.3\]]pa bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya ba mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[108b.4\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/
[\[108b.5\]]de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya ba mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya bar 
[\[108b.6\]]mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya ba mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs 
[\[108b.7\]]zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben 
[\[109a.2\]]zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[109a.3\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[109a.4\]]du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am/_mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs 'gag ces bya ba'am/_mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[109a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba'am/_mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba 
[\[109a.6\]]'am/_dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/_dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[109a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gzugs gtsang zhes bya ba'am/_mi gtsang zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtsang zhes bya ba'am/_mi gtsang 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba nas/_de bzhin du mig gi bar la gtsang zhes bya ba'am/_mi gtsang zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de 
[\[109b.2\]]ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[109b.3\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba'am/_stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya ba'am/_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/_mtshan ma med ces bya ba'am/_smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/_smon pa med ces bya ba'am/_zhi zhes bya ba 
[\[109b.4\]]'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba'am/_dben zhes bya ba'am/_mi dben zhes bya ba'am/_kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/_rnam par byang zhes bya ba'am/_skye zhes bya ba'am/_'gag ces bya ba'am/_dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/_dngos po med ces bya ba'am/_gtsang 
[\[109b.5\]]zhes bya ba'am/_mi gtsang zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba'am/_bde 
[\[109b.6\]]zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gtsang zhes bya ba'am/_mi gtsang zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[109b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs zhes 
[\[110a.2\]]bya ba'am/_yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi 
[\[110a.3\]]dmigs la/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs shing /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 
[\[110a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ma mchis pa de dag legs par bshad pa ni ngo 
[\[110a.5\]]mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams 
[\[110a.6\]]kyi chags pa med pa dag legs par bshad pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[110a.7\]]pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]dang /_yid chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_chos rnams chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi 
[\[110b.2\]]spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[110b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes 
[\[110b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[110b.5\]]chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[110b.6\]]phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags zhes bya ba'am/_ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod 
[\[110b.7\]]na/_gzugs chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shes so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shes so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags zhes bya bar yang dag 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]par shes so/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shes so/_/de 
[\[111a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos zab mo 'di ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis la/_bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[111a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos zab mo 'di ma bshad kyang 'grib pa med la/_bshad kyang 'phel ba med do/_/rab 'byor dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[111a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod na/_nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni bsngags 
[\[111a.5\]]pa brjod pas 'phel ba med la/_bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos de ni bshad kyang 'phel ba med la/_ma bshad kyang 'grib pa med de/_bshad kyang de kho nar zad la/_ma bshad kyang de kho nar zad do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[111a.6\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na/_mi zhum mi 'gong ste/_zhum par 'gyur 
[\[111a.7\]]ba ma mchis la/_zhum pa ma mchis shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang snyoms par 'jug la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te/_nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni 
[\[111b.2\]]gzugs ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis pa nas/_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni 
[\[111b.3\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis pa nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du ma mchis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma 
[\[111b.4\]]mchis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[111b.5\]]dpa' chen po gang dag go cha chen po 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang /_'bad par 'tshal ba dang /_rtsol bar 
[\[111b.6\]]'tshal ba dag lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams 'khor ba las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal zhing go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can 
[\[111b.7\]]rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni bar snang 'degs par 'tshal ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag ni brtson 'grus 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]kyi stobs chen po thob pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni dpa' ba dang /_
[\[112a.2\]]rtul phod pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni 
[\[112a.3\]]go cha chen po 'tshal ba lags shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[112a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag gis dper bgyi na/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'bras sA lu'i zhing ngam/_mda' rgyu'i tshal ltar yongs su bltams par gyur cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bskal pa 
[\[112a.5\]]'am/_bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs te/_chos bshad par gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis/_tshad ma mchis pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par gyur kyang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems 
[\[112a.6\]]can gyi khams la ni bri ba'am/_gang bar mi mngon lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du dang /_sems can dben pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyas par sbyar bar bgyi 
[\[112a.7\]]ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bdag 'di skad du gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po 'tshal nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su thar bar bgyi 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bar 'tshal ba lags so zhes mchi lags so/_/de nas 'khor de nyid na dge slong zhig 'di snyam du/_kye ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' yang mi skye mi 'gag kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mchis/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang mchis/_shes rab kyi phung po yang mchis/_
[\[112b.2\]]rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang mchis/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang mchis shing /_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa yang mchis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[112b.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mchis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang mchis/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang mchis/_chos dkon mchog kyang mchis/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mchis/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 
[\[112b.4\]]yang mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du snyoms 
[\[112b.5\]]par 'jug pa de/_gang la rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pa yin no/_/de nas 
[\[112b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[112b.7\]]du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya ba gang 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na/_de nyid de dag gi bsrung ba dang /_
[\[113a.2\]]bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya bar 'gyur te/_de dag la ni mi dang /_mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral 
[\[113a.3\]]bar rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya bar sems pa yin no/_/kau shi 
[\[113a.4\]]ka khyod kyis rmi lam dang /_smig rgyu dang /_mig yor dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus sam/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[113a.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya bar sems pa ni 'di lta ste/_mi 'grub pa dang ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[113a.6\]]pa dang /_sba bar nus sam/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba bya bar sems pa de ni 'di lta ste/_mi 'grub 
[\[113a.7\]]pa dang /_ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus sam/_smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]rab 'byor ma yin no/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_mi 'grub pa dang /_ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[113b.2\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas re shig rmi lam lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur chos rnams de ltar yongs su shes pa yin/_de shes nas byang chub 
[\[113b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[113b.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gzugs su rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs kyi rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed cing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[113b.5\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes par rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pa'i rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed la/_de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[113b.6\]]du rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[113b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos rnams rmi lam lta bu nas/_chos rnams sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes pa yin te/_de shes nas rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]su mi byed pa nas/_sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa'i rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[114a.2\]]'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /_tshangs 'khor rnams 
[\[114a.3\]]dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od gsal gyi lha rnams nas/_gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis lha'i me tog dag dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang /_spos kyi phye ma dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gtor nas bcom 
[\[114a.4\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs 
[\[114a.5\]]na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing /_ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu bar byed la/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di 
[\[114a.6\]]nyid yongs su zhu bar byed pa dag mthong bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_steng gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas stong stong mthong 
[\[114a.7\]]bar gyur te/_gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rgya cher thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing shes rab 
[\[114b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags 
[\[114b.3\]]gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[114b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang /_
[\[114b.5\]]mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong 
[\[114b.6\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma 
[\[114b.7\]]zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par byang zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs skye zhes bya ba 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]dang /_'gag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs gtsang zhes bya ba dang /_mi gtsang zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 
[\[115a.2\]]bcings zhes bya ba dang /_grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dang /_grol zhes bya ba'i bar du chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 'das zhes 
[\[115a.3\]]bya ba dang /_ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang /_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba dang /_ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang /_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 
[\[115a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das zhes bya ba dang /_ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang /_da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba dang /_shin tu rnam par ma dag 
[\[115a.5\]]ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba dang /_shin tu rnam par ma dag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[115a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba dang /_shin tu rnam par ma dag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[115a.7\]]pa ni yongs su dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[115b.2\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[115b.3\]]pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[115b.4\]]ba med pa'i phyir/_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[115b.5\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' yongs 
[\[115b.6\]]su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs gos pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gos pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[115b.7\]]phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de bzhin du nam mkha' la tha snyad gdags su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor dper na nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra 
[\[116a.2\]]grag pa de bzhin du/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad gdags su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[116a.3\]]pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la ci yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa 
[\[116a.4\]]med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[116a.5\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[116a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[116a.7\]]kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_rna ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_sna nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_lce nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_yan lag ma tshang bar mi 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]'gyur/_lus ha cang 'khogs par mi 'gyur/_gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur lags so/_/'di lta ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas/_gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha dag dang /_lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur 
[\[116b.2\]]lags so/_/tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la gang na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos ston pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton bgyid pa dang /_'chad par lha'i tshogs mang po mchi bar 'gyur zhing /_bsod nams dpag tu ma 
[\[116b.3\]]mchis/_grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis/_bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa mang po dag kyang bskyed par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[116b.4\]]de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa dang /_'chad par byed pa na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med/_grangs med 
[\[116b.5\]]tshad med/_bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa mang po dag bskyed par 'gyur zhing /_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa dang /_'chad par byed pa na lha'i 'khor mdun du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[116b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de la rin po che ni 'di yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba las yongs su thar bar byed pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi dbul po dang /_
[\[116b.7\]]gnod sbyin dbul po dang /_klu dbul po las yongs su thar bar byed pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha 
[\[117a.2\]]rnams kyi nang du skye ba sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[117a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de la bslabs nas/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[117a.4\]]du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa nas/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 
[\[117a.5\]]kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_de bzhin du tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /_tshangs 'khor rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chen rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_
[\[117a.6\]]'od gsal rnams dang /_dge ba rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa 
[\[117a.7\]]dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ba dang /_rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]tu phyin pa de la ni bsam gtan bzhi bstan pa yod pa dang /_de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bstan pa yod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yod pa dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[117b.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yod pas de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid bstan pa yod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid bstan pa yod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[117b.3\]]te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bstan pa yod pa dang /_gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod de/_de la bslabs nas de bzhin 
[\[117b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa'i phyir te/_des na 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni skye ba'am/_'gag pa 
[\[117b.5\]]'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'i chos gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par 
[\[117b.6\]]byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba de med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung bstan du yod pa'am/_lung bstan du med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten 
[\[117b.7\]]las 'das pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su med pa yin no/_/rab 'byor rin 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gang dag gis rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa gos par 'gyur ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems 
[\[118a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_de ltar yang kun tu mi 'dzin cing /_de ltar yang rnam par rtog par mi byed la/_de ltar yang spros par mi byed na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[118a.3\]]ldan 'das rnams la bkur sti dang /_ri mo dang /_mchod pa byed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na/_sems can 'bum dag kyang yongs su smin par byed la/_sangs rgyas 
[\[118a.4\]]kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston par byed pa'am/_mi ston par byed pa'am/_'dzin par byed pa'am/_sbyin par byed pa'am/_skye bar byed pa'am/_'gag par byed pa 
[\[118a.5\]]'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/_rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/_'grib pa'am/_'phel bar byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[118a.6\]]phyin pa de ni/_'dod pa'i khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/_'dod pa'i khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no/_/gzugs med pa'i khams nas 
[\[118a.7\]]'gro bar byed pa ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/
[\[118b.2\]]nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/
[\[118b.3\]]de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_rang byang chub sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa 
[\[118b.4\]]sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa 
[\[118b.5\]]ma yin no/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_
[\[118b.6\]]'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas 
[\[118b.7\]]kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]yang chos kyi dbyings de ni brjed ngas pa med pa dang /_yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur bar byed pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing gzha'i sgra ring zhes bton nas/_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad 
[\[119a.2\]]ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gtor te/_tshig 'di skad ces a la la 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo zhes 'dzer to/_/der lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de 
[\[119a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di ni dang po ma yin no/_/gnyis pa ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[119a.4\]]chos gang yang bskor bar bya ba'i phyir ram/_ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos 
[\[119a.5\]]gang yang bskor bar bgyi ba'am/_ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[119a.6\]]rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid ni/_nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_
[\[119a.7\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]stong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis stong /_so so'i skye bo ni so so'i skye bos stong /_rgyun du 
[\[119b.2\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /_dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[119b.3\]]kyis stong /_rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang 
[\[119b.4\]]ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags te/_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yang chos thams cad kyis 
[\[119b.5\]]stong la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bgyid kyang skor bar bgyid pa'am/_
[\[119b.6\]]ldog par bgyid pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis te/_chos gang gis kyang chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'am/_skor bar bgyid pa ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar stong pa nyid la chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/_ldog 
[\[119b.7\]]par bgyid pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar stong pa nyid ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/_ldog par bgyid 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa ma lags/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/_ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/_smon pa ma mchis pa ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/_ldog par bgyid pa ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_gang de ltar shes rab 
[\[120a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjod pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_'dogs pa dang /_'jog pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_rnam par 'grel pa dang /_gsal bar bgyid pa dang /_'jug par bgyid pa dang /_'chad par bgyid pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa yongs su 
[\[120a.3\]]dag pa lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa 'di ni sus kyang bshad pa ma mchis la bstan pa yang ma mchis te/_sus kyang dris pa yang ma mchis/_sus kyang mngon sum du bgyid pa yang ma mchis lags so/_/de la ni gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa ma 
[\[120a.4\]]mchis te/_chos bstan pa 'di la ni yon gnas su bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_byed pa po dang /_byed pa po med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[120a.5\]]pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun 
[\[120a.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[120a.7\]]stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ming med pa dang /_lus med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dbugs dbyung ba dang /_
[\[120b.2\]]rngub pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma 
[\[120b.3\]]mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchi ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[120b.4\]]chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad ni gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi bas pa lags so/_/
[\[120b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad gtan zad cing byang ba'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[120b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad bems po nyid yin pa'i 
[\[120b.7\]]phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[121a.2\]]ni brag ca lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sgra dang rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_me long dang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[121a.3\]]ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa dmigs su 
[\[121a.4\]]med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma 
[\[121a.5\]]mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gos pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[121a.6\]]'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rlom sems 
[\[121a.7\]]thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[121b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'dod chags dmigs su 
[\[121b.3\]]med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal 
[\[121b.4\]]pa/_mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun tu rtog pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin 
[\[121b.5\]]pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sems can yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spang du ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir 
[\[121b.6\]]ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa lags so/_/bka' stsal 
[\[121b.7\]]pa/_chos thams cad 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' 
[\[122a.2\]]stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[122a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad skyo ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[122a.4\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams 
[\[122a.5\]]cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad ldog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid
