[\[122a.6\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol 
[\[122a.7\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_phyi nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[122b.2\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun 
[\[122b.3\]]pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/
[\[122b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med 
[\[122b.5\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba ma mchis pa stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags 
[\[122b.6\]]so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_nang dang phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[122b.7\]]ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams dben pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_lus dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos 
[\[123a.2\]]dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[123a.3\]]gyi rkang pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[123a.4\]]ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[123a.5\]]dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[123a.6\]]ni stong pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 
[\[123a.7\]]ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rnam 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[123b.2\]]ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med 
[\[123b.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gnod sems dang /_bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags so/_/bka' 
[\[123b.4\]]stsal pa/_le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[123b.5\]]ni shes rab lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[123b.6\]]ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyis brdzi ba med pa'i phyir dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa de la zhum pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang 
[\[123b.7\]]dag par rig pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shes pa thams cad la chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su ma 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]btang ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir 
[\[124a.2\]]ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_skad thams cad du de bzhin du gsung ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so/_/
[\[124a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[124a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_rgya spos dang /_spri ka dang /_a ka ru nag po'i phye 
[\[124a.5\]]ma dag 'thor zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i 
[\[124a.6\]]lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_de skad ces 
[\[124a.7\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no/_/lha dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_smon 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/lha dag de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[124b.2\]]rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/lha dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi don du ming dang /_brda dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad kyis 
[\[124b.3\]]tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad de/_lha dag de dag don dam par ni ma yin te/_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dkrug par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de'i mtshan nyid 
[\[124b.4\]]kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha dag de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes/_mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa yang rab tu mi shes/_mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes/_mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid med pa yang rab tu mi shes te/_
[\[124b.5\]]lha dag de ltar na mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_de dag gnyi ga gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang /_gang shes par 'gyur ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro/_/lha dag mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma 
[\[124b.6\]]yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/_phyi stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/_phyi 
[\[124b.7\]]nang stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni mi rnams sam/_mi ma yin pa rnams sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam/_zag pa med pa rnams sam/_'jig rten pa rnams sam/_'jig rten las 'das 
[\[125a.2\]]pa rnams sam/_'dus byas rnams sam/_'dus ma byas rnams kyang ma yin no/_/yang lha dag gang la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhes zer na/_ci khyed de la yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[125a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lags so zhes yang dag par mi smra lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ni 'dus ma bgyis lags pa'i slad du mtshan nyid gang dang yang ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags 
[\[125a.4\]]te/_ma mchis shing dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang 
[\[125a.5\]]rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid yin te/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[125a.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa ma mchis pa 
[\[125a.7\]]gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid gang la gnas nas/_chags pa thams cad las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ni zab lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_gang la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi sku tshe rabs dag tu byang chub sems dpar gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa lnga brnyes shing /_sku tshe 
[\[125b.2\]]'di la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[125b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ngo mtshar lags so/_/chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa ni gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[125b.4\]]thugs su chud pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[125b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad 
[\[125b.6\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/lha dag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/_'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/_'du byed 
[\[125b.7\]]rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par shes pa ni so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de/_
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_brtson 
[\[126a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brdzi ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i mtshan nyid/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[126a.3\]]mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon 
[\[126a.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni nges par 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni rnam par 
[\[126a.5\]]grol ba'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni 'dzin pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni don du gnyer ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/_btang snyoms ni 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par thar pa brgyad ni mi 
[\[126a.6\]]'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni zhum pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/_snying rje chen po ni snying brtse ba'i mtshan nyid/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni zil gyis mi non 
[\[126a.7\]]pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin la sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha dag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas des na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chags pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya'o//_//
[\[126b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po nyi shu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[126b.3\]]rnams skyed pa dang /_ston par byed pa yin te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nye bar brten nas gnas so/_/nye bar brten nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos de la bkur stir mdzad/_bla mar mdzad/_ri mor 
[\[126b.4\]]mdzad/_mchod par mdzad de/_rab 'byor de ltar na dam pa'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bkur stir mdzad/_bla mar mdzad/_ri mor mdzad/_mchod par mdzad pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de 
[\[126b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung la/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[126b.6\]]gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smras na/_de ni byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor bar yang dag par smra bas smras pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa gzo ba dang /_
[\[126b.7\]]byas pa tshor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa gang gis byon pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa de dang /_lam de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]pa rgyun kho nar bkur stir mdzad/_bla mar mdzad/_ri mor mdzad/_mchod pa mdzad cing /_de bzhin du rjes su 'dzin cing /_rjes su skor bar mdzad pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin par 
[\[127a.2\]]blta bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byed pa po med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dam pa'i chos byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin du lus med pa'i phyir chos thams cad byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_
[\[127a.3\]]rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten nas/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_de 
[\[127a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la byas pa med par mkhyen pa 'jug cing rang bzhin dang brdas ni ma yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa 
[\[127a.5\]]dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du chos thams cad ni shes pa 
[\[127a.6\]]med pa dang /_mig med pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal lags na/_'o na ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par bgyid pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[127a.7\]]pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad shes pa med pa dang /_mig med pa'o/_/zhes ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad shes pa med pa dang /_mig med pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]chos thams cad ni rten pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad shes pa med pa dang /_mig med pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig 
[\[127b.2\]]rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/_/de yang gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 
[\[127b.3\]]gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[127b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs ma mthong ba'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin du ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_ji ltar na 'du shes dang /_ji ltar na 'du byed rnams dang /_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i slad 
[\[127b.5\]]du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mthong ba'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[127b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na/_de ltar na gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba la dmigs pa dang /_'du 
[\[127b.7\]]shes la dmigs pa dang /_'du byed rnams la dmigs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]sbyar te/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na/_de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin te/_rab 
[\[128a.2\]]'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten rnams la phung po lnga po stong ngo zhes rjod par byed do/_/
[\[128a.3\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[128a.4\]]'jug pa bzhi stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[128a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[128a.6\]]'jig rten rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do/_/'jig rten rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[128a.7\]]stong ngo zhes rjod de/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams la ston par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas 'jig rten rnams la phung po lnga stong ngo zhes ston te/_'jig rten yang stong ngo khong du chud cing rig la/_kun tu shes shing 'jig rten dag la yang de kho na bzhin du rjod par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab 
[\[128b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams la ston par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 
[\[128b.3\]]'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston par byed do/_/'jig rten stong par ston pa de gang zhe na/_phung po lnga'i 'jig rten de stong par ston to/_/de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis kyi 'jig rten de stong par ston to/_/de bzhin du khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'jig rten de stong par ston 
[\[128b.4\]]to/_/de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten de stong par ston par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa 
[\[128b.5\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston par byed do/_/'jig rten gang zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin zhe na/_
[\[128b.6\]]'di lta ste/_phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[128b.7\]]na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba nas/_stong zhes bya ba'i bar du ston pa de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po lnga nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[129a.2\]]de bzhin du phung po lnga nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang /_'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[129a.3\]]gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di la 'jig rten du 'du shes pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la 'jig rten du 'du shes pa med par 'jig rten gyi 
[\[129a.4\]]'du shes ston par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos gang dag gis 'jig rten 'dir 'du shes pa'am/_'jig rten pha rol tu 'du shes par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[129a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[129a.6\]]mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mdzad pa dpag tu ma mchis pas nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa chen 
[\[129a.7\]]pos nye bar gnas pa yin zhing /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mdzad pa gzhal du med pa dang /_mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa chen po dang /_mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa chen po ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_sems can 
[\[129b.2\]]thams cad bskyab par bya ba'i don dang /_yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 
[\[129b.3\]]'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de 
[\[129b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[129b.5\]]'gro ba lnga po dag na/_sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa la gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/_rang byung ba nyid dam/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam pa'am/_gzhal bar nus pa'i sems can ni 'ga' 
[\[129b.6\]]yang med la/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas pa 
[\[129b.7\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor dpag tu med pa ni 'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung ba nyid dang /_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin te/_rab 'byor 'gro ba lnga po dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa la/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_mnyam pa'i sems can ni 'ga' yang med 
[\[130a.2\]]na/_lhag pa lta ga la yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu phye ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[130a.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pa nas/_mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i bar gyis nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[130a.4\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma 
[\[130a.5\]]mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_
[\[130a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'di ni gzhal du med pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[130a.7\]]pa nyid yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ni dpag tu med pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/_
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]'di lta ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_
[\[130b.2\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 
[\[130b.3\]]sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/_de dag la ni sems dang 
[\[130b.4\]]sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[130b.5\]]yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/_/de skad 
[\[130b.6\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam 
[\[130b.7\]]pa dang mnyam pa lags te ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du lags te 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du lags te ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[131a.2\]]gzugs la yang tshad med de/_de'i phyir gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang tshad med de/_de'i phyir 
[\[131a.3\]]rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang tshad med de/_de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[131a.4\]]pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do/_/gsol pa/_ci'i slad du gzugs tshad ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa tshad ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam 
[\[131a.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/_de'i phyir gzugs la tshad med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 
[\[131a.6\]]gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/_de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshad med do/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[131a.7\]]nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gang yin pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod snyam 'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yin te/_'di lta ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal 
[\[131b.2\]]du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam pa dang bral ba/_gzhal du med pa/_gzhal ba dang bral ba/_dpag tu med pa/_dpag pa dang bral ba/_mi 
[\[131b.3\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bral ba yin no/_/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/dpag tu 
[\[131b.4\]]med pa zhes bya ba de ni dpag tu med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin no/_/rab 'byor dper na nam mkha' 
[\[131b.5\]]ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dag yin te/_de dag kyang lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma 
[\[131b.6\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am/_gzhal ba'am/_bgrang bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du dpag tu med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi 
[\[131b.7\]]khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]rnam par grol lo/_/dge bsnyen drug brgya dang /_dge bsnyen ma sum brgya ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_de dag kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di 
[\[132a.2\]]nyid la lung bstan to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_yon tan gyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha 
[\[132a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags shing /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba gzhal du ma mchis pa 
[\[132a.4\]]dang /_bgyi ba dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bgyi bas nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad 
[\[132a.5\]]smras pa de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyi bya bas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir 
[\[132a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa lnga 'dus pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du 'dus pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[132a.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus pa dang /_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi mi la spyod pa thob pa'i rgyal 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]po'i dgos pa dang /_rgyal po'i bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni bka' la gtogs pa'i mi la yod cing /_blon po chen po'i mi la yod pa yin te/_rgyal po ni bya ba de dag la snying las chung ba dang /_khur bor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos 
[\[132b.2\]]rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[132b.3\]]ni de dag gi bya ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par bya ba'i bar dang /_gzugs la yongs su 'dzin 
[\[132b.4\]]pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[132b.5\]]kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing /_mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[132b.6\]]tu phyin pa 'di gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_ji ltar na 'du shes dang /_ji ltar na 'du byed rnams dang /_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /_
[\[132b.7\]]mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /_mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor ci khyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[133a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci khyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba de dang /_'du shes de dang /_'du byed de dag dang /_rnam par 
[\[133a.3\]]shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci khyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i 
[\[133a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor ngas 
[\[133a.5\]]kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du ngas kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba de dang /_
[\[133a.6\]]'du shes de dang /_'du byed de dag dang /_rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du ngas kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[133a.7\]]bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs la yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]nyid kyi bar la yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing 
[\[133b.2\]]mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/_brtag par mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags la/_zhib zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pas rig par bgyi ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[133b.3\]]gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par gyur pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[133b.4\]]'das gang gi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur cing /_de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_
[\[133b.5\]]phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag tu gyur kyang de dag gi shes pa gang lags pa dang /_spong ba gang lags pa bas ni gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyin gcig tsam zhig bzod pa'am/_'dod pa'am/_'jal 
[\[133b.6\]]ba'am/_nye bar rtog par bgyid na/_de'i shes pa dang /_spong ba de nyid ches mang ba lags kyi snga ma dad pas rjes su 'brang ba nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar de dag gi shes pa dang /_spong ba ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba 
[\[133b.7\]]rnams kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spong ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]spyod pa'i lha de dag dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la bka' stsal pa/_lha dag legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_lha dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[134a.2\]]zab mo 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur la/_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/_de bzhin du 'chang zhing ston pa nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed na/_
[\[134a.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis ches myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar nga smra'i/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde 
[\[134a.4\]]gzhan dag la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par spyod pas ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dag 'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams nas/_dgra bcom pa'i bar dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos gang la bslab par bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[134a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos gang la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag phul gyi chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas_
[\[134a.6\]]'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[134a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nas/_
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[134b.2\]]dbyings su nges par 'byung lags so/_/'di la bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su 
[\[134b.3\]]mya ngan las 'da' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bri ba'am/_gang bar mngon pa ma mchis lags so/_/zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/_rjes su yi rangs nas 
[\[134b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo /_/de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu rdzu 'phrul gyis dong nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 
[\[134b.5\]]de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[134b.6\]]theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/_thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing gong du yang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa nas/_rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid pa zhig 
[\[134b.7\]]lags na/_de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]'di thos nas/_thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing /_gong du yang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa dang /_gang las shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[135a.2\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor dper na ba drus ma be'u sar pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_thos ma 
[\[135a.3\]]thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing /_gong du yang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni mi rnams kyi nang kho na nas shi 
[\[135a.4\]]'phos nas mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_bzung zhing bcangs la/_kun chub par byas pa nas/_
[\[135a.5\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin zhing /_gong du yang yi ger bris te/_glegs bam du chud par byas nas/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[135a.6\]]ba dan dag gis bkur stir byas shing /_de bzhin du btsun par byas/_ri mor byas te/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs nas/_mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[135a.7\]]rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/_de nas 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]shi 'phos te 'dir skyes la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/_thos ma thag tu mos par bgyid la/_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_de bzhin du 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid 
[\[135b.2\]]par 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[135b.3\]]ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_de de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par byed la/_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin du 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[135b.4\]]'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa yang yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes 
[\[135b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/_de bzhin du bzung zhing bcangs te/_kun chub par byas pa nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin te/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[135b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa de/_de tshun chad las mi dge ba bsags pa zad par byas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[135b.7\]]tu phyin pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa'i rgyus mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa de yang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]gang zag dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dris shing yongs su zhus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang 
[\[136a.2\]]zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/_chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[136a.3\]]'di nyid la som nyi nyid du gyur cing /_the tshom nyid du gyur te/_sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[136a.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi zab mo 'di thos la/_chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_
[\[136a.5\]]som nyi nyid du gyur cing /_the tshom nyid du gyur te/_sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu nang stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[136a.6\]]de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'di thos la/_chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la som nyi nyid du gyur 
[\[136a.7\]]cing the tshom nyid du gyur te/_sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin 
[\[136b.2\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du thos la/_chos gsal bar ston pa de la ma dris shing yongs su ma zhus pa 'dir skyes pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[136b.3\]]zab mo 'di nyid la som nyi nyid du gyur cing /_yid rtul ba nyid dang /_the tshom nyid du gyur te/_sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[136b.4\]]theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/_'di lta ste/_nyi ma gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum 'am/_bzhi'am/_nyi ma lngar yang nyams su ma blangs shing ma bsgoms pa ni 'di lta ste/_nyi ma gcig 
[\[136b.5\]]gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum 'am/_bzhi'am/_nyi ma lngar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'phrogs par mi 'gyur gyi/_de'i 'og tu ni the tshom gyis 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nan tan snying por mi byed pa'i gang zag 
[\[136b.6\]]ni chos de dag ma bsgoms shing nan tan ma byas pas de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni theg pa la zhugs nas ring po ma lon pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[136b.7\]]mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing ma bzung la/_ma bcangs te/_kun tu chub par ma byas pa dang /_ma klags pa dang /_kha ton du ma byas pa dang /_lung ma mnos pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]la ma byas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang ma bslabs pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 
[\[137a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs pa yin pa dang /_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs pa nas/_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs pa dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma 
[\[137a.3\]]bslabs pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[137a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la ma bslabs par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[137a.5\]]'di yi ger mi 'dri zhing /_yi ger 'drir mi 'jug pa dang /_mi 'dzin pa dang /_mi 'chang ba dang /_kun chub par mi byed pa dang /_mi klog pa dang /_kha ton du mi byed pa dang /_lung mi nod pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa de/_ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi 
[\[137a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang nyams su mi len la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis sems can la yang phan mi 'dogs te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug na/_de ni sa gnyis po 'di lta ste/_
[\[137a.7\]]nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing /_yi ger 'drir ma bcug_/ma bzung /_ma bcangs/_kun chub par ma byas/_ma klags/_kha 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]ton du ma byas/_lung ma mnos/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/_des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji skad bstan pa la nan tan du ma byas pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dper na rgya mtsho'i gru'am/_gru bo che chag cing zhig na/_de na mi gang dag 'tsho 
[\[137b.2\]]bar 'dod pa dag shing leb dag gam/_shing dag gam/_rkyal pa dag gam/_mi ro dag la mi 'ju zhing /_'dzin par mi byed pa de dag ni/_rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor dper na rgya mtsho'i gru'am/_
[\[137b.3\]]gru bo che chag cing zhig na/_de na mi gang dag 'tsho bar 'dod pa dag shing leb dag gam/_shing dag gam/_rkyal pa dag gam/_mi ro dag la 'ju zhing 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni bde ba dang /_bde legs su ma smas ma nyams par rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gnas par rig 
[\[137b.4\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa tsam dang /_dga' ba tsam dang ldan la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi 'dri zhing /_yi ger 'dir 
[\[137b.5\]]mi 'jug pa dang /_mi 'dzin pa dang /_mi 'chang ba dang /_kun chub par mi byed pa dang /_mi klog pa dang /_kha ton du mi byed pa dang /_lung nod par mi byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ji skad bstan pa la 
[\[137b.6\]]nan tan du mi byed pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma phyin par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[137b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yang yi ger 'dri zhing /_de bzhin du 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ji skad bstan pa la nan tan du byed na/_de ltar 
[\[138a.2\]]na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag gi dad pa de dang /_bzod pa de dang /_dang ba de dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa de dang /_'dod pa de dang /_mos pa de dang /_gtong ba de dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba de shes rab 
[\[138a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de ni 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur la/_de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[138a.4\]]kyi zhing dag kyang yongs su dag par byas nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dper na skyes pa'am/_bud med cig bum pa so ma btang bas chu bcu bar sems na/_skyes pa 
[\[138a.5\]]'am/_bud med de ni mi mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya ste/_bum pa so ma btang ba de ni ring po mi thub par 'gyur te/_myur du sa tha mal par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bum pa de so ma btang ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_snyi ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 
[\[138a.6\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan dag kyang dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong 
[\[138a.7\]]ba yod du zin kyang /_'on kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral na/_de dag de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang /_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang bral zhing /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang /_de bzhin du de dag dran pa nye bar 
[\[138b.2\]]gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[138b.3\]]kyi bar du bsgom pa dang bral zhing /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa dang bral ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral na/_de dag ni bar ma do kho nar tshul ma yin pas chos de dag las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[138b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag gi bar ma do kho nar tshul ma yin pas chos de dag las nyams par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/rab 'byor dper na skyes pa'am/_bud med cig gis bum pa so btang bas 
[\[138b.5\]]'di lta ste/_chu klung ngam/_'bab chu'am/_mtsho'am/_mtshe'u 'am/_lteng ka'am/_khron pa nas chu chu na/_skyes pa'am/_bud med der chu chu ba de ni mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya ste/_bum pa de ni shin tu chur bcug kyang zhig par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[138b.6\]]skyes pa'am/_bud med des ni gar dga' bar bum pa des chu bcu bar nus so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag la dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba 
[\[138b.7\]]dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang ma bral ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang yang ma bral bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_rab 'byor de las gzhan 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par rig par bya zhing /_de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[139a.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'di 
[\[139a.3\]]lta ste/_bar ma do kho nar tshul ma yin pas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar chos de dag las nyams par mi 'gyur te/_ma smas ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[139a.4\]]dper na rgya mtsho'i gru bcos legs ma byas par rdzas kyis kun tu bkang nas/_rgya mtsho rgal bar byed na/_rab 'byor de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i tshong pa de las gzhan pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can rnams kyis gru 'di bde ba dang /_bde legs su rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur 
[\[139a.5\]]te/_gru 'di ni bar ma do kho nar rgya mtshor 'jig par 'gyur la/_gru yang gzhan du snod dang rdzas kyang gzhan du thabs la mi mkhas pa'i tshong pa yang gzhan du 'gyur te/_tshul ma yin pas nyam nyes su 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byed pa'i tshong pa 
[\[139a.6\]]thabs la mi mkhas pa de dag ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_rin po che chen po las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag la dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_
[\[139a.7\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba yod kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral na/_de'i phyir byang chub 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis rigs kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[139b.2\]]yongs su ma zin pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag gis yongs su ma zin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag ni bar ma do kho nar tshul ma yin pas chos de dag las 
[\[139b.3\]]nyams par 'gyur zhing gnod pa chen po dang ldan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog rin po che chen po dag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams 
[\[139b.4\]]kyi bar ma dor tshul ma yin pas chos de dag las nyams par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yin no/_/rab 'byor dper na rgya mtsho'i tshong pa mkhas pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig gis rgya mtsho'i gru de legs 
[\[139b.5\]]par btsems shing /_legs par bcos/_legs par byas la/_legs par byi dor bya ba byas nas/_rgya mtshor 'jug par byed la/_bcug nas kyang snod rdzas sna tshogs brdzangs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i tshong pa de las gzhan pa mkhas 
[\[139b.6\]]pa'i rang bzhin can rnams kyis gru 'di ni rgya mtshor 'jig par mi 'gyur te/_tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de dag gling gang du 'dod par gru 'di bde ba dang /_bde legs su phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[139b.7\]]gang zag de dag la dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/_de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]phyin pa dang yang ma bral ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur na/_rab 'byor de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rigs kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[140a.2\]]dang /_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[140a.3\]]gyis yongs su zin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar tshul ma yin pas/_chos de dag las nyams par mi 'gyur te/_ma smas ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[140a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor dper na skyes bu la la zhig skyes nas lo nyis stong lon te/_rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig de'i lus la yang 'di lta ste/_rlung las gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa las gyur pa 
[\[140a.5\]]'am/_bad kan las gyur pa'am/_'dus pa las gyur pa'am/_nad gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de gcig pu khri de las ldang bar nus snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci ste mi de ldang rngo thogs su lags 
[\[140a.6\]]kyang des ni rgyang grags gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum 'am/_de las lhag pa'i shul du mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi de ni rgas pa dang /_bro nad kyis nyam smad pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[140a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du ci ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag la dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba yod du zin kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kye ma rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[140b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 
[\[140b.3\]]ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag ni 'di lta ste/_tshul ma yin pas bar ma do kho nar nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar chos de dag las nyams par 'gyur 
[\[140b.4\]]ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dper na mi la la zhig skyes nas lo nyis stong lon te/_rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa de nyid de'i lus la yang 'di lta ste/_rlung las 
[\[140b.5\]]gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/_bad kan las gyur pa'am/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad gang yang rung ba zhig byung la/_de yang khri de las ldang bar 'dod pa dang /_mi stobs dang ldan pa gnyis shig lhags nas/_glo g.yas g.yon nas brten 
[\[140b.6\]]te/_de la 'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur shog_/khyod gar dga' ba dang /_sems gar 'dod pa dang /_gar dga' bar kho bo cag gis brten pas ji srid du gnas su ma phyin gyi bar du khyod 'gyel du dogs pa cung zad kyang mi 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du/_rab 'byor 
[\[140b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag la dad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod la/_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba yin na/_de'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rigs kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du brtson 
[\[141a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par 
[\[141a.3\]]rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bar ma do kho nar chos de dag las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni shes 
[\[141a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag kha cig dang po nyid du 
[\[141a.5\]]thabs la mi mkhas pas sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims srung bar byed/_bzod pa sgom par byed/_brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed/_thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab 
[\[141a.6\]]sgom par byed cing /_de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed pa'o/_/sbyin pa ni 'di dag sbyin par bya'o/_/'di dag la ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag cag ni tshul khrims srung ba'o/_/bdag cag ni tshul khrims 
[\[141a.7\]]dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bzod pa sgrub par byed pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/_/bdag cag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]cag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni shes rab sgom pa'o/_/bdag cag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du sems shing /_de dag sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/_sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed/_sbyin pa la rlom sems su byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims 
[\[141b.2\]]dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab de rlom sems su byed/_shes rab des rlom sems su byed/_shes rab la rlom sems su byed do/_/de dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[141b.3\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab rnams kyis 'khor ba nyid rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/de dag ni skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag las yongs su mi 'grol lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[141b.4\]]'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[141b.5\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang 
[\[141b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/_dmigs pa'i pha mtha' mi shes na de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa 
[\[141b.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa na dmigs pa'i pha mtha' mi shes na/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa yin no/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis yongs su ma zin na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]pa nyid kyis yongs su ma zin pa yin te/_de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag thabs la mi mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang 
[\[142a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mkhas pa dag yin te/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu 'dzin pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[142a.3\]]gang zag dag dang po nyid du thabs la mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin par ma lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin par ma lhung ba'i sems kyis shes 
[\[142a.4\]]rab kyi bar du sgom par byed do/_/sbyin pa de dag sbyin pa na 'di snyam du bdag cag ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed pa'o/_/sbyin pa ni 'di dag sbyin par bya'o/_/slong ba 'di dag la ni sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag cag ni tshul khrims srung bar byed pa'o/_/bdag cag ni 
[\[142a.5\]]tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bzod pa sgrub par byed pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa'o/_/bdag cag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bsam gtan la mnyam par 
[\[142a.6\]]'jog par byed pa'o/_/bdag cag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag cag ni shes rab sgom par byed pa'o/_/bdag cag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du mi sems te/_de dag ni sbyin pa de la rlom sems su mi byed/_sbyin pa des rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[142a.7\]]sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sbyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims de dang /_bzod pa de dang /_brtson 'grus de dang /_bsam gtan de dag dang /_shes rab de la rlom sems su mi byed/_shes rab des rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_shes rab la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/_des na rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[142b.2\]]rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/_des na rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[142b.3\]]ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa mngon par shes pa dang /_de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis legs par 
[\[142b.4\]]yongs su zin pa'i phyir/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid legs par yongs su zin pa yin no/_/legs par yongs su zin pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[142b.5\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mkhas pa yin te/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun tu 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[142b.6\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi lags/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[142b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 
[\[143a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin 
[\[143a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsten par bya zhing bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang 
[\[143a.4\]]ci gtong yang rung /_de thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig_/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de gzugs su ma rtog shig de 
[\[143a.5\]]bzhin du tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes par ma rtog shig_/de bzhin du tshul khrims gang ci srung yang rung /_bzod pa gang ci sgom yang rung /_brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang rung /_bsam gtan gang ci la snyoms par 
[\[143a.6\]]'jug kyang rung /_shes rab gang ci sgom yang rung /_de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig_/de bzhin du khyod bla na med pa yang dag
