[\[143a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de gzugs su ma rtog shig_/de bzhin du tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes par ma rtog shig_/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ma rtog shig_/
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma rtog shig_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de 
[\[143b.2\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag tu ma rtog shig_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong 
[\[143b.3\]]ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam dag tu ma rtog shig_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[143b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma rtog shig ces ston te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa nyid kyis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_snga ltas kyi le'u zhes bya ste/_
[\[143b.5\]]nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'tshal ba dang /_
[\[143b.6\]]de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'tshal bas/_gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[143b.7\]]'di yang dag par ston par bgyid pa dag dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dag 'di skad du/_
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]kye rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/khyod sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang rung /_de thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[144a.2\]]byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig_/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig_/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[144a.3\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[144a.4\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las rtog par ma byed cig_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang 
[\[144a.5\]]po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam las rtog par ma byed cig_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma rtog cig_/ces ston 
[\[144a.6\]]pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsten par bgyi zhing bsnyen par bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs las mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[144a.7\]]de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams las mi rtog cing rnam par shes pa las mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las mi rtog cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid 
[\[144b.2\]]dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_
[\[144b.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs 
[\[144b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar las mi rtog na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir yang dag par bstan pa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[144b.5\]]dpa' de la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di skad ces 'doms shing rjes su ston te/_kye rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/_gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[144b.6\]]pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rigs kyi bu gzugs ni 'dod pa med cing /_'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du kye rigs kyi bu khyod shes 
[\[144b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[145a.2\]]gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de 
[\[145a.3\]]bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rigs kyi bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 
[\[145a.4\]]'dod pa med pa dang /_'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la 'dod 
[\[145a.5\]]pa ma skyed cig_/kye rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rigs kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'dod pa med pa dang /_'dod 
[\[145a.6\]]par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[145a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing /_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams las bla na med 
[\[145b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta 
[\[145b.3\]]bu dang /_rmi lam lta bur shes nas/_'jig rten rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/_bdag cag ni 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas dang /_skyob pa dang /_skyabs dang /_
[\[145b.4\]]dpung gnyen dang /_gling dang /_sgron ma 'dzin pa dang /_'od byed pa dang /_ded dpon dang /_yongs su 'dren pa dang /_rten du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na 
[\[145b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' dag 'jig rten rnams kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dag sbyin pa gang gtong ba de thams cad sems can rnams la sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir gtong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshul khrims 
[\[145b.6\]]gang srung ba dang /_bzod pa gang sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gang dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang sgom pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir byed de/_rab 
[\[145b.7\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la phan par yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod la/_sems can thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[146a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la phan par yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[146a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la gnas la/_de'i 'og tu sems can gzhan rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig 
[\[146a.4\]]rten rnams la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhe na/_gnas par 'os pa'i phyir dang /_'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du phyin par byed pa'i 
[\[146a.5\]]phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyob pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[146a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ngan song gsum du skyes pa dag mthong nas/_ngan song de dag nas skyob par byed cing /_zhi ba'i gnas kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[146a.7\]]dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyob pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rten med pa'i chos 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]ston te/_'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten par mi byed la/_sems can de dag chos de thos nas skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[146b.2\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam 
[\[146b.3\]]po nyi shu gnyis pa/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag lam gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa dag dang /_lam ngan par zhugs 
[\[146b.4\]]pa'i sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos ston te/_gzugs kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du mig gi pha rol 
[\[146b.5\]]ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya 
[\[146b.6\]]dang /_chos rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i 
[\[146b.7\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du ma rig pa'i pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga shi'i 
[\[147a.2\]]bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[147a.3\]]pa'i stobs bcu'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam 
[\[147a.4\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa 
[\[147a.5\]]ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mig gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs rnams 
[\[147a.6\]]ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi khams ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi 
[\[147a.7\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]de bzhin du sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_
[\[147b.2\]]yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/de bzhin du ma rig pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_ma rig pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rga 
[\[147b.3\]]shi'i bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_rga shi ma yin no/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_
[\[147b.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi pha 
[\[147b.5\]]rol gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma yin no/_/de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[147b.6\]]rab 'byor chos 'di dag gi pha rol ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de lta bu yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi pha rol ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de lta bu lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta na ni byang chub sems 
[\[147b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur ma lags sam/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni 'du shes so/_/'di dag ni 'du byed rnams 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yin no snyam du gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis/_de bzhin du tshor ba'i pha rol dang /_'du shes kyi pha rol dang /_
[\[148a.2\]]'du byed rnams kyi pha rol dang /_rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na/_rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[148a.3\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/_chos 'di dag 'di ltar zhi ba 'di ltar zab pa la nges par sems 
[\[148a.4\]]kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te/_de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste/_de ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'di ltar zab pa'i chos 'di dag 
[\[148a.5\]]sems can rnams la bstan par bya'o snyam du sems pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams 
[\[148a.6\]]kyi gling yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chu klung dag gam/_mtsho'am/_mtsho chen po dag gam/_rgya mtsho dag gis phyogs 'di dag chus kun tu chod pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi 
[\[148a.7\]]ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]pa sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[148b.2\]]bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i chos 
[\[148b.3\]]yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa yin no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba gya nom pa ji lta ba bzhin yin te/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_dmigs su med pa 
[\[148b.4\]]dang /_lam yongs su chad pa dang /_sred pa zad pa dang /_lhag ma ma lus pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams 
[\[148b.5\]]kyi gling yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang /_'od byed pa yin zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dag gis de dag gi don de kho na la de kho nar rtogs nas de kho na bzhin du 'dzin cing /_
[\[148b.6\]]sems can rnams la yang ston la/_sems can rnams kyang de yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang /_'od byed pa 
[\[148b.7\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang /_yongs su 'dren pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa 'gro ba ngan 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba dag la/_sems can rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_gnod pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dag nub par bya ba dang /_rigs pa'i chos rtogs par 
[\[149a.2\]]bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ston par byed do/_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas 
[\[149a.3\]]nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam 
[\[149a.4\]]par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye 
[\[149a.5\]]ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang /_yongs su 
[\[149a.6\]]'dren pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di 
[\[149a.7\]]lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pas sems can rnams bsdus nas sems can de dag nyid la gzugs nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to/_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to/_/gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni stong pa nyid de/_de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba 
[\[149b.2\]]med la/_gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni stong pa nyid de de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la gang du yang 'gro ba med 
[\[149b.3\]]par sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni stong pa nyid de/_de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/_gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang 
[\[149b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 
[\[149b.5\]]'da' ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub 
[\[149b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[149b.7\]]ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_
[\[150a.2\]]mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_sprul pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_
[\[150a.3\]]sprul pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba med pa dang /_bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[150a.4\]]rab 'byor dbri ba med pa dang /_bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/
[\[150a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos thams cad ni blang du med pa dang /_dor du med pa'i bar gyi tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[150a.6\]]dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor blang du med pa dang /_dor du med pa la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[150a.7\]]dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dre ba med pa la 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bdag la ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_chos thams cad ni sems can med pa dang /_skye ba po med pa dang /_srog med pa 
[\[150b.2\]]dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa dang /_shed las skyes pa med pa dang /_shed bu med pa dang /_slong ba po med pa dang /_kun nas slong ba po med pa dang /_byed pa po med pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po med 
[\[150b.3\]]pa'i tshul can te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed 
[\[150b.4\]]las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i 
[\[150b.5\]]tshul can no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul can dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshul can dang /_bdag gi tshul can dang /_bdag med pa'i tshul can dang /_stong pa'i tshul can dang /_mi stong pa'i tshul can dang /_mtshan ma'i tshul can dang /_
[\[150b.6\]]mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can dang /_smon pa'i tshul can dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshul can dang /_zhi ba'i tshul can dang /_dben pa'i tshul can dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul can dang /_rnam par byang ba'i tshul can dang /_skye ba'i tshul can dang /_skye ba med pa'i 
[\[150b.7\]]tshul can dang /_'gag pa'i tshul can dang /_'gag pa med pa'i tshul can dang /_dngos po'i tshul can dang /_dngos po med pa'i tshul can dang /_sdug pa'i tshul can dang /_mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_sdug pa'i bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs te/_de'i phyir de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi gzhi can dang /_zhe sdang gi gzhi can 
[\[151a.2\]]dang /_gti mug gi gzhi can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi gzhi dang /_zhe sdang gi gzhi dang /_gti mug gi gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[151a.3\]]chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni de 
[\[151a.4\]]bzhin nyid kyi tshul can dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 
[\[151a.5\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa'i tshul 
[\[151a.6\]]can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gang 'gro ba'am/_'ong bar 'gyur ba'i g.yo ba nyid gang yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni 
[\[151a.7\]]tshor ba'i tshul can dang /_'du shes kyi tshul can dang /_'du byed rnams kyi tshul can dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs med cing mi dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan 
[\[151b.2\]]med cing mi dmigs na/_de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/_rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi tshul can dang /_bzod pa'i tshul can dang /_brtson 'grus kyi tshul can dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul can dang /_shes rab kyi tshul 
[\[151b.3\]]can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[151b.4\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[151b.5\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshul can dang /_de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[151b.6\]]bar gyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 
[\[151b.7\]]tshul can no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshul can no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[152a.2\]]kyi bar gyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs 
[\[152a.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu'i tshul can no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[152a.4\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga 
[\[152a.5\]]la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/_tshul de las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gtan med cing mi dmigs 
[\[152a.6\]]na/_de dag gi 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab mo 'di la su dag 
[\[152a.7\]]mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad pa dag dang /_sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]sangs rgyas dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[152b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid de ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[152b.3\]]po de dag gi rtags ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_mtshan ma ni ci 'dra ba zhig_/dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 
[\[152b.4\]]la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dul ba yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par 
[\[152b.5\]]yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rtags dang /_mtshan ma dang /_dbyibs kyi dben pa dag tu 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes 
[\[152b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can du 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[152b.7\]]mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa sgom pa dag ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa lags la/_
[\[153a.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa yang 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad gang dag rnam 
[\[153a.3\]]par 'jig pa yin/_gsol pa/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_nang gi skye mched drug dang /_phyi'i skye mched drug dang /_khams 
[\[153a.4\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag dang /_sems can dang /_skye ba po dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po 
[\[153a.5\]]dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_
[\[153a.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin 
[\[153a.7\]]du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_dran pa 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[153b.2\]]pa bsgom pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir 
[\[153b.3\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[153b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_tshor 
[\[153b.5\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_mig rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[153b.6\]]pa de ni/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_gzugs rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[153b.7\]]pa de ni/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mig gi khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]pa de ni gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[154a.2\]]khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom 
[\[154a.3\]]pa de ni/_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[154a.4\]]rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_
[\[154a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[154a.6\]]pa bsgom pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[154a.7\]]du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/_chos thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'jig pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor shes 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[154b.2\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas nye bar brtag par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/de 
[\[154b.3\]]bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa 
[\[154b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/_gzhan gyis smras pa'i tshig dag la snying po med pa dang /_de kho na ma yin par 
[\[154b.5\]]khong du chud par byed de/_gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'o/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang /_sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[154b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[154b.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/_mi zhum mi 'gong ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' 
[\[155a.2\]]zhing /_thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_kun chub par byed pa nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya ste/_
[\[155a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dri ba byas pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_kun chub par byas pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[155a.4\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba na/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/_mi zhum mi 'gong ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las de'i yid phyir ldog par mi 
[\[155a.5\]]'gyur ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_kun chub par byed pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[155a.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/_mi zhum mi 'gong ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur 
[\[155a.7\]]ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ji ltar spyad par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[155b.2\]]stsal pa/_stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o/_/de bzhin du nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_skye ba 
[\[155b.3\]]med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba dang /_chos 
[\[155b.4\]]kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /_de bzhin du sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi 
[\[155b.5\]]lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[155b.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sgyu ma dang /_smig 
[\[155b.7\]]rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzugs la spyod pa lags 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]sam/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod pa lags sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[156a.2\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni gzugs la spyod pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[156a.3\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni sus kyang ma byas/_'gyur 
[\[156a.4\]]bar yang ma byas/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song /_gang la yang mi gnas/_yul na yang mi gnas/_phyogs na yang mi gnas te/_de la ni grangs dang /_rtsis kyang mi gnas mi dmigs so/_/gang la grangs dang /_rtsis mi dmigs pa 
[\[156a.5\]]de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan 
[\[156a.6\]]dag gam/_shes rab bam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/_de bzhin du tshor 
[\[156a.7\]]ba dang /_de bzhin du 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de 
[\[156b.2\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/_de bzhin du rnam pa 
[\[156b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las bsgom pa'i le'u 
[\[156b.4\]]zhes bya ste/_nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dag gis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang /_rgya spos dang /_ta la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag dang /_lha'i ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma 
[\[156b.5\]]dkar po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang lha de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[156b.6\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rtogs par dka' ba/_brtag par mi nus pa/_rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags pa/_zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pas 
[\[156b.7\]]rig par bgyi ba lags pa dang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags te/_'di ltar gzugs nyid rnam pa 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_de bzhin du 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/
[\[157a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[157a.3\]]de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/'di ltar mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam 
[\[157a.4\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig lags so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te/_mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam 
[\[157a.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[157a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[157a.7\]]gzugs rnams lags so/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chos rnams lags so/_/'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa 
[\[157b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig gi khams lags te/_mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/'di 
[\[157b.3\]]ltar gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_
[\[157b.4\]]ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad 
[\[157b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te/_de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de 
[\[157b.6\]]bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lags 
[\[157b.7\]]so/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba gang lags pa dag dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags te/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[158a.2\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang dag lags pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/_rnam pa thams 
[\[158a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i 
[\[158a.4\]]de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha dag de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_gzugs 
[\[158a.5\]]nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_de bzhin du 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[158a.6\]]yin la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_
[\[158a.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/lha dag don gyi dbang 'di yang dag 
[\[158b.2\]]par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni thugs kyi phrin las chung ba la gzhol bar mdzad kyi chos ston pa la ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dag kye ma chos 'di ni zab ste/_mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_brtag par mi nus pa/_
[\[158b.3\]]zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin te/_de ni sus kyang 
[\[158b.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/_gang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/_gang du yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_lha dag 'di ni gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba yang med pa'i chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha dag 
[\[158b.5\]]nam mkha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_mtha' 
[\[158b.6\]]yas shing mthar thug pa med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/
[\[158b.7\]]lha dag de bzhin du bdag zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du gzugs zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du mig zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag gzugs 
[\[159a.2\]]rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[159a.3\]]khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[159a.4\]]khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par 
[\[159a.5\]]shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_tshul 
[\[159a.6\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid 
[\[159a.7\]]zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo 
[\[159b.2\]]nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs 
[\[159b.3\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha dag de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[159b.4\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das 
[\[159b.5\]]kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos 'di bstan to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[159b.6\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid 
[\[159b.7\]]gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_gzugs rnams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_
[\[160a.2\]]sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[160a.3\]]bstan pa ma lags/_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_
[\[160a.4\]]mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba 
[\[160a.5\]]'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung 
[\[160a.6\]]ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[160a.7\]]dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa 
[\[160b.2\]]ma lags/_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags 
[\[160b.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[160b.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa 
[\[160b.5\]]ma lags/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[160b.6\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gzugs so/_/de bzhin du bdag tshor ba'o/_/bdag 'du shes so/_/bdag 'du byed rnams so/_/bdag gi 'du byed rnams so/_/bdag rnam par shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag mig go/_/bdag gi mig go/_/bdag rna 
[\[160b.7\]]ba'o/_/bdag gi rna ba'o/_/sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du bdag cag ni gzugs rnams so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/bdag cag chos rnams so/_/bdag cag gi chos 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]rnams so/_/mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du bdag rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams 
[\[161a.2\]]dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams 
[\[161a.3\]]dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[161a.4\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[161a.5\]]dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa 
[\[161a.6\]]nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_bdag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[161a.7\]]bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/bdag cag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/de bzhin du bdag cag yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/bdag cag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[161b.2\]]brgyad kyi bar dag go/_/de bzhin du bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i bar dag go/_/bdag rang byang chub bo/_/bdag 
[\[161b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod pa lags so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_de skad ces 
[\[161b.4\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha dag de de bzhin te/_lha dag de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_lha dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_tshor ba 
[\[161b.5\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_
[\[161b.6\]]yid gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_gzugs rnams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[161b.7\]]bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams 
[\[162a.2\]]dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_yid kyi 
[\[162a.3\]]khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[162a.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[162a.5\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[162a.6\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/_mi gzung 
[\[162a.7\]]bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]byang chub kyi yan yag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs 
[\[162b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin zhing /_lha dag chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 
[\[162b.3\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'am/_mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin na/_lha 
[\[162b.4\]]dag gang zag gang dag gzugs gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus 
[\[162b.5\]]so/_/de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[162b.6\]]bsgom par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang /_sgra rnams 
[\[162b.7\]]dang /_dri rnams dang /_ro rnams dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_chos rnams gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i 
[\[163a.2\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_
[\[163a.3\]]de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_
[\[163a.4\]]de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[163a.5\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med 
[\[163a.6\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong 
[\[163a.7\]]ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/_spang 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom par mi nus/_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[163b.2\]]gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus la/_de dag gis ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_de dag gis 
[\[163b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus/_de dag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[163b.4\]]ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang 'thun pa lags so/_/ji ltar na chos 'di chos thams cad dang 'thun pa lags she na/_'di lta ste/_chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[163b.5\]]pa dang 'thun pa lags so/_/de bzhin du chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di 
[\[163b.6\]]ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun pa nas/_chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'thun pa nas/_chos 'di 
[\[163b.7\]]ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang 'thun pa lags so/_/de bzhin du chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang 'thun pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags so/_/
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so/_/de bzhin du chos 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni dgra 
[\[164a.2\]]bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so/_/chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags te/_chos 'di ni gang du yang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/ji ltar 
[\[164a.3\]]na thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_btsun 
[\[164a.4\]]pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_de bzhin du chos gnas pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi slad du dang /_de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[164a.5\]]mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so/_/btsun 
[\[164a.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[164a.7\]]pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/_chos 'di skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]shes pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/_chos 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod
