[\[205b.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod gnas pa 'dis gnas na/_gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas dang /_gling med pa rnams kyi gling dang /_mun pa na 'dug pa'i sems can rnams kyi snang ba byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes spro ba skyed par 'gyur 
[\[205b.5\]]ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med tshad med pa dag na/_sangs 
[\[205b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes la chos ston pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming dang /_rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod 
[\[205b.7\]]pa mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dper na/_nga da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi ming dang /_rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug tor can gyi 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ming dang rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa ched du rjod pa dang /_nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[206a.2\]]'di nyid la brten nas tshangs par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang /_rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed pa bzhin no/_/rab 'byor shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[206a.3\]]'das bzhugs shing gzhes la chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las brtsams te/_tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag gi ming dang /_rus 
[\[206a.4\]]yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lho phyogs na gang dag yin pa dang /_nub phyogs na gang dag yin pa dang /_byang phyogs na gang dag yin pa dang /_phyogs mtshams bzhin gang dag yin pa dang /_'og gi phyogs na gang dag yin pa 
[\[206a.5\]]dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes la chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha 
[\[206a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las brtsams te/_tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[206a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi ming dang rus kyang yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni de ltar dka' ba byed pa yin te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun 
[\[206b.2\]]mi gcad par bya bar zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ci re zhig phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags sam/_
[\[206b.3\]]'on te phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi lags sam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gi ming dang rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[206b.4\]]to/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa yang yod do/_/phyir mi ldog pa yang yod do/_/rab 'byor lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[206b.5\]]mo 'di la spyod pa yang yod de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de dag gi ming dang rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[206b.6\]]gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[206b.7\]]ldan 'das rnams ni de dag gi ming dang /_rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la shin tu 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa rnams dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa rnams dang /_chos thams cad gsog dang /_gso ba dang /_ya ma brla dang /_snying po med pa dag yin no zhes mos la/_mi skye ba'i chos la 
[\[207a.2\]]bzod pa ni ma thob pa dag ste/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang 
[\[207a.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa yin te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi ming dang rus yongs su rjod cing chos ston 
[\[207a.4\]]la/_ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod par mdzad pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa yin te/_de la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[207a.5\]]zab mo 'di bshad pa na don thos nas nem nur med la/_the tshom mi za ste/_rmongs par mi 'gyur la/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin no snyam du de ltar yid rnams kyis sems par gyur na/_de dag ni dam pa'i chos thos pa'i sems dang ba de yang rim gyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[207a.6\]]pa mi 'khrugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya cher thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur la/_der gnas nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/_
[\[207a.7\]]rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la de ltar gces spras byed pa yin na/_gang dag klog pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_byang chub 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]sems dpa' de dag ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur zhing /_myur ba kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos gang yang mi dmigs shing 
[\[207b.2\]]ma mchis na/_de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la gnas nas myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur zhing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe de bzhin nyid 
[\[207b.3\]]ma gtogs par chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa de'i tshe/_su zhig de bzhin nyid 'di la gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'am/_su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/_sems can rnams la chos 
[\[207b.4\]]ston par 'gyur te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis pa lags na/_su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin nyid kho na la gnas nas/_chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 
[\[207b.5\]]'tshal te/_de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gang la yang dmigs su ma mchis na/_su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 
[\[207b.6\]]'gyur ba'am/_su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'am/_su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/_de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na/_su zhig de 
[\[207b.7\]]bzhin nyid la gnas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin nyid la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de ni gnas ma mchis lags so zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de de bzhin 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/_gang 
[\[208a.2\]]zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par byed pa'i chos gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni skye ba med/_'gag pa med/_gzhan du 'gyur ba dmigs su med de/_rab 'byor chos gang la skye ba med/_'gag pa med/_
[\[208a.3\]]gzhan du 'gyur ba dmigs su med pa'i chos de la su zhig gnas par 'gyur/_su zhig chos de la gnas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_su zhig chos de la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/_de ni 
[\[208a.4\]]gnas med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa rnams ni 
[\[208a.5\]]dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i chos ni gang yang dmigs su ma mchis la/_chos gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yang gang yang ma mchis gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[208a.6\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyang gang yang ma mchis/_gang sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyang gang yang ma mchis te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_de ltar nye bar rtog cing sgom 
[\[208a.7\]]par bgyid kyang chos 'di la zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/_de dag chos 'di dag la nem nur ram/_rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dag chos 'di dag la nye bar rtog par bgyid kyang chos 'di dag la nem nur ram/_rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so zhes smras pa ni/_kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa la su zhig 'dir nem nur ram/_rmongs par 'gyur/_
[\[208b.2\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor ni chos gang dang gang kho na ston pa de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid kho na las brtsams nas ston la/_chos gang la yang thogs pa med de/_dper na bar snang la mda' 
[\[208b.3\]]'phangs pa ni gang du yang thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du btsun pa rab 'byor yang chos gang la yang thogs pa med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[208b.4\]]'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[208b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems mi skye/_sbyin pa de sbyin pa na ser sna'i sems mi skye la/_sbyin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las nye bar gnas pa 
[\[208b.6\]]yin/_de bzhin du byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las nye bar gnas pa yin te/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[208b.7\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_len pa po dag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]brgyad bkag pa dag dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig rnams kyis spyos brgyad kyang /_sems zhum pa nyid du mi 'gyur la/_len pa po bsam pa ngan pa can mtshang 'dru ba de dag la sems sdang bar yang mi byed kyi/_de dag nyid la byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems 
[\[209a.2\]]skyed par byed cing /_snyan par smra bar byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[209a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa dag sbyin pa na/_len pa po rnams kyis yang dag 
[\[209a.4\]]pa ma yin pa'i brgyad bkag pa dag dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig rnams kyis spyos brgyad na yang sbyin pa de la bzod pa kho na yin te/_gang zhig las ci 'dra bar byed par 'gyur ba de/_de 'dra ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba las bdag gir bya ba nyid shes pas de de ltar gtong ba'i blo 
[\[209a.5\]]kho na dang /_yongs su gtong ba'i blor 'gyur la/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad la sbyin pa rgya cher sbyin pa kho nar bya'o snyam nas/_des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin pa kho nar byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor 
[\[209a.6\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[209a.7\]]nas/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyis len pa dag la sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_yul rnams su yongs su 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]sngo bar mi byed/_'dod pa'i khams su yongs su sngo bar mi byed/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su yongs su sngo bar mi byed/_nyan thos kyi sar yongs su sngo bar mi byed/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo bar mi byed kyi/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du 
[\[209b.2\]]byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[209b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_
[\[209b.4\]]de dag la rtag tu sgyu ma'i blo kho na nye bar gnas te/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir des sems can gang la yang phan pa'am/_gnod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_shes 
[\[209b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar 
[\[209b.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin cing /_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[209b.7\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_de'i lus sam/_ngag gam/_sems kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa'i mngon par 'du 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]byed pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed cing /_srog gi phyir yang sems can rnams srog dang bral bar mi byed do/_/ma byin par len par yang mi byed do/_/mi tshangs par spyod par mi byed do/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi smra'o/_/phra ma 
[\[210a.2\]]mi zer ro/_/tshig rtsub po mi smra'o/_/tshig kyal pa can du mi 'gyur ro/_/brnab sems can du mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems can du mi 'gyur ro/_/log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas/_sbyin pa gang sbyin par byed pa 'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa 
[\[210a.3\]]rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/_rten 'dod pa rnams la ni rten/_mar me 
[\[210a.4\]]'dod pa rnams la ni mar me/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'dod pa rnams la yo byad thams cad sbyin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du 'dod pa rnams la mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed cing /_sbyin pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[210a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing /_ci nas kyang yongs su sngo ba des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_
[\[210a.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[210a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad de phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dong na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing /_gnod sems su byed par mi 'gyur te/_de 'di snyam du 'di ltar sems can 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]thams cad kyis bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad nas/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dong ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin te/_lus rnag can yongs su gtang ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi sku rdo rje'i rang bzhin bzang po bdag gis thob par bya'o snyam du sems te/_rab 
[\[210b.2\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_'di ltar snying 
[\[210b.3\]]rje chen po'i go cha gyon par byed de/_bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa mi bzad pa las bsgral bar bya/_'chi ba med pa'i dbyings la dgod par bya'o snyam nas/_nam du yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gtong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[210b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bsam 
[\[210b.5\]]gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug par byed/_de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed cing /_de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la snyoms par 
[\[210b.6\]]'jug par byed mod kyi/_sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pa'i phyir/_re zhig nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed kyi/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye 'di la bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_
[\[210b.7\]]sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa mi bzad pa las bsgral bar bya/_'chi ba med pa'i dbyings la yang dgod par bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_chos thams cad chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba ma gtogs par chos dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung 
[\[211a.2\]]du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dngos po'i grangs su chud pa'am/_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[211a.3\]]grangs su chud pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos gang yang yod pa'am/_med pa nyid du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ste/_rab 
[\[211a.4\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[211a.5\]]la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[211a.6\]]rab 'byor 'di la gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i drung du sems can thams cad lhags nas/_sdig pa can gyi tshig yang dag pa ma yin pa dag gis brgyad bkag ste/_yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad par gyur na 
[\[211a.7\]]yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal bar gyur pa/_nad kyis thebs pa/_mgon med pa dag ste/_bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad la rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin pa kho nar bya'o snyam nas/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed/_
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi'i yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad yongs su bsdoms nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[211b.2\]]gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/_de yang ji ltar yongs su sngo zhe na/_'di la su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[211b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[211b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du srog gi phyir yang 
[\[211b.5\]]sems can 'ga' yang srog dang 'bral bar mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_log par lta ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ro/_/nam du yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la de'i sems mi 'jug go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa 
[\[211b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[211b.7\]]phyin pa la gnas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_'di ltar bdag re zhig dpag tshad dam/_dpag tshad brgya'am/_dpag tshad stong du song ngam/_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[212a.2\]]gcig tu yang song ba nas/_'jig rten gyi khams 'bum du yang song nas/_tha na sems can 'ga' tsam yang bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad po dag la gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /_brgyad pa'i chos dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[212a.3\]]kyi bar dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la bkod nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad yongs su bsdoms te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo 
[\[212a.4\]]bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[212a.5\]]tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[212a.6\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam 
[\[212a.7\]]gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes 'gog pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug cing /_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba byung ngo cog sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar 
[\[212b.2\]]byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[212b.3\]]phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_gang gi tshe chos rnams la 'di lta ste/_dben 
[\[212b.4\]]pa'i rnam pa'am/_zhi ba'i rnam pa'am/_zad pa'i rnam pa'am/_'gog pa'i rnam par rjes su lta zhing gnas la byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su ma thob kyi bar du chos thams cad zhi bar mngon sum du mi byed do/_/de nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug 
[\[212b.5\]]pa las langs nas/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[212b.6\]]'dzin pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom 
[\[212b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam nas/_
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]nam du yang dge ba'i chos btsal ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'dor zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brtson pa mi gtong ste/_de sems can rnams kyi ched du dpag tshad brgya'am/_dpag tshad stong ngam/_dpag tshad 'bum 'am/_dpag tshad bye ba phrag 'bum du song /_
[\[213a.2\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang song /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum du yang song nas/_sems can gcig tsam yang theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung ba la 'jog par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang thams cad bsdoms te/_sems can thams 
[\[213a.3\]]cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i sems rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[213a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar tshul 
[\[213a.5\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du 
[\[213a.6\]]bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_srog gcod pa spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod par byed la/_gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[213a.7\]]sbyar te/_bdag kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod par byed la/_gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]dga' bar byed do/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pa'i khams don du mi gnyer/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams don du mi gnyer/_nyan thos kyis don du mi gnyer/_rang sangs rgyas kyis don du mi gnyer gyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad bsdoms te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du 
[\[213b.2\]]byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo ba'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[213b.3\]]po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[213b.4\]]phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mi'am mi ma 
[\[213b.5\]]yin pa dag lhags nas/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad de/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dong na yang /_de 'di snyam du bdag gis yan lag dang nying lag rnams gcod par byed pa'am/_'bigs par byed pa su zhig yin snyam du mi sems kyi/_'di snyam du 'di 
[\[213b.6\]]ltar bdag gis de dag gi ched du lus 'di bzung ba yin na bdag gi drung du lhags te/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad nas 'dong bar byed pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam 'ba' zhig sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin legs par yid la 
[\[213b.7\]]byas pa'i phyir te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo bar mi byed kyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[214a.2\]]su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang 
[\[214a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang 
[\[214a.4\]]po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi'i bar dang /_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas mod kyi/_de bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[214a.5\]]'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin par yang mi 'dzin te/_gzhan du na gang du sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba der sems can de dag gi don du skyes te/_des sems can de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdus nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[214a.6\]]rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar byed la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gtan dag las brten te byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i bar de dag thams cad bsdoms te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong 
[\[214a.7\]]du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi 
[\[214b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ming du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du sbyin pa'i 
[\[214b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos po dang /_mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming du 
[\[214b.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du dngos po dang /_mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du ming du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[214b.5\]]du dngos po dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ming du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dngos po dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du yang dag par rjes 
[\[214b.6\]]su mi mthong ngo /_/chos thams cad dngos po dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_chos gang la yang gnas par mi byed de/_ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no/_/des dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad yongs su bsdoms te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_
[\[214b.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang de la su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'byung ba de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[215a.2\]]chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las 
[\[215a.3\]]dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang snga nas nub pas 
[\[215a.4\]]sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam 
[\[215a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas/_rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/de chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa de yang sbyin par byed de/_de bdag kyang rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_gzhan 
[\[215a.6\]]dag kyang chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod la/_gzhan gang dag chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' 
[\[215a.7\]]bar byed la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo bar mi byed kyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad yongs su bsdoms te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]'ba' zhig tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[215b.2\]]nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[215b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ni nam du yang 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/_rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa 
[\[215b.4\]]dang /_ser sna dang ldan pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/_gzhan du na rgyun kho nar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang lhan cig gnas la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[215b.5\]]su sngo bar mi byed par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad yongs su bsdoms te/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo 
[\[215b.6\]]ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[215b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog par byed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba la chu bur lta bu dang /_'du shes la smig rgyu lta bu dang /_'du byed rnams la chu shing lta bu dang /_rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta 
[\[216a.2\]]bur so sor rtog par byed do/_/de de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'du byed thams cad stong pa la 'di la gnod par bya ba'am/_bcad par bya ba'am/_dbug par bya ba ni gang yin/_su zhig 'bigs par byed pa'am/_gcod par byed de/_gzugs ni su'i yin/_tshor ba ni su'i yin/_'du shes 
[\[216a.3\]]ni su'i yin/_'du byed rnams ni su'i yin/_rnam par shes pa ni su'i yin/_gang la brgyad bkag pa'am/_spyos pa byas pas gnod sems skyed par byed pa 'di la brgyad bkag pa'am/_spyos pa'am/_gnod sems skyed par byed pa su zhig yin snyam du rtag tu phung po lnga po dag 
[\[216a.4\]]la snying po med pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo bar mi byed kyi/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas 
[\[216a.5\]]kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[216a.6\]]yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[216a.7\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan mar bzung nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed pa dag rgya cher sbyar 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/lha'i rna ba mi'i las 'das pas 'di lta ste/_lha'i dang mi'i sgra rnam pa du ma'i bar dag thos so/_/de bzhin du sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag 
[\[216b.2\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dag rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar dag mthong ngo /_/de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas nas/_sangs 
[\[216b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed pa dang /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/_dge ba'i 
[\[216b.4\]]rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_ci nas kyang su zhig yongs su sngo bar byed pa'am/_gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gnyis su yang mi 'jug pa de ltar yongs su sngo bar 
[\[216b.5\]]byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi 
[\[216b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_gzugs mi dmigs so/_/de 
[\[216b.7\]]bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]de ltar chos thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed na/_chos gang la'ang mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/mngon par 'du mi byed na/_chos gang yang len par mi byed/_mi len par yang mi byed do/_/skye bar yang mi byed/_'gag par yang mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[217a.2\]]'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid yin pas de la ni skye ba'ang med/_'gag pa yang med la/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[217a.3\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnam par ma g.yengs pas rtag tu bsgrubs nas gnas te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[217a.4\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[217a.5\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong 
[\[217a.6\]]pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs 
[\[217a.7\]]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong 
[\[217b.2\]]pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid de dag la gnas nas/_gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya 
[\[217b.3\]]bar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du 'phags 
[\[217b.4\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi 
[\[217b.5\]]dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa ni 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin yang rung zas sam/_skom 'am/_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing /_
[\[217b.6\]]de'i sbyin pa de yang stong zhes bya ba'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_su zhig sbyin par byed pa'am/_gang la sbyin par bya ba'am/_gang sbyin par bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_de thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[217b.7\]]gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de la ni rtag tu ser sna'i sems dag gam/_kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyi go skabs med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]de dag thams cad mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nam du yang ser sna'i sems sam/_kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems mi 'byung ba ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[218a.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa de la yang de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sbyin 
[\[218a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[218a.4\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi go skabs kyang mi 'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa de dag mi dmigs la/_
[\[218a.5\]]des lus dang ngag dang /_sems kyi tshul khrims nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du srog gcod pa spangs nas/_srog 
[\[218a.6\]]gcod pa las phyir ldog pa yin/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod cing /_gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[218a.7\]]te/_bdag kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spong bar byed cing /_log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]byed do/_/de tshul khrims des kyang 'di lta ste/_'dod pa na spyod pa'am/_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa'am/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la yang don du gnyer ba med kyi/_gzhan du na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de kho na 
[\[218b.2\]]don du gnyer zhing gnas te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[218b.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_rjes su 'thun 
[\[218b.4\]]pa'i bzod pa skyes te/_bzod pa de thob na de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye 'di la skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_skye ba'am/_rga ba'am/_'chi ba'am/_spyo ba'am/_brgyad bkag pa'am/_bcad pa'am/_dbug pa'am/_gnod pa'am/_gsad pa'am/_bcing bar bya ba 
[\[218b.5\]]gang yang med do snyam mo/_/de lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i gan du gal te sems can thams cad lhags nas/_spyos sam/_brgyad bkag pa'am/_bong ba'am/_dbyig pa'am/_mtshon gyis bsnun tam/_yan lag dang nying lag thams 
[\[218b.6\]]cad bcad na yang de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur gyi/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin te/_kye 'di la chos gang yang chos gang la yang spyo ba'am/_brgyad bkag pa'am/_bcad pa'am/_dbug pa'am/_gnod pa'am/_gsod pa'am/_bcing 
[\[218b.7\]]bar bya ba med do snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_
[\[219a.2\]]brtson pa mi gtong bar sems can rnams la chos ston te/_ci nas kyang sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par byed pa nas/_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la 'god par byed pa de lta de ltar chos ston par byed la/_ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la 
[\[219a.3\]]yang mi 'god/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la yang mi 'god pa de lta de ltar 'god par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/gsol 
[\[219a.4\]]pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[219a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par de las gzhan pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[219a.6\]]gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par byed do/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad po dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo /_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[219a.7\]]lta ste/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par 
[\[219b.2\]]thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' 
[\[219b.3\]]yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te 
[\[219b.4\]]gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_
[\[219b.5\]]lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo /_/de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang /_lugs dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo /_/dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[219b.6\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa ste dgu po de dag go/_/de rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag so sor phye nas/_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[219b.7\]]'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs nas/_yid bde ba dang /_
[\[220a.2\]]yid mi bde ba yang snga nas nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang /_dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go/_/
[\[220a.3\]]de nas 'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[220a.4\]]par 'jug pa las langs nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bsam gtan dang po'i bar la snyoms par zhugs par gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin te/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 
[\[220a.5\]]rjes su 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsdu ba'i le'u 
[\[220a.6\]]ste/_nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing mtshan ma ma mchis te/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag 
[\[220a.7\]]sgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/_'di dag ji ltar tha dad par gdags lags/_chos 'di dag las tha dad du dbye ba ji ltar mchis lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]pa mchis lags/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ji 
[\[220b.2\]]ltar mchis lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par gdags par mdzad lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[220b.3\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i 
[\[220b.4\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas te/_sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed/_de bzhin du tshul khrims srung bar byed/_bzod pa sgom par byed/_brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par byed/_shes rab sgom par byed 
[\[220b.5\]]do/_/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i 
[\[220b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_rmi lam la ni ngo bo nyid ci yang med la/_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa la ni ngo bo nyid ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de la ni mtshan nyid kyang med do/_/gang la mtshan nyid med pa de ni 'di lta ste/_mtshan 
[\[220b.7\]]nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig go/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des na/_khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa dang /_sbyin pa po'i mtshan nyid med pa dang /_len pa po'i mtshan nyid med par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/gang gis de ltar shes nas sbyin pa sbyin par 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]byed pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las mi 'da'o/_/
[\[221a.2\]]de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag 
[\[221a.3\]]par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[221a.4\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nas/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga 
[\[221a.5\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs 
[\[221a.6\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par smin pa las byung ba/_'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos de dag la gnas nas/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_yo byad thams 
[\[221a.7\]]cad kyis kyang bkur sti byed do/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi don yang byed do/_/sems can gang dag sbyin pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni sbyin pas sdud par byed do/_gang dag tshul khrims dang /_gang dag bzod pa dang /_gang dag brtson 'grus dang /_gang dag bsam gtan dang /_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]gang dag shes rab kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni shes rab kyis sdud par byed do/_/sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis sdud par byed de/_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa ni 'khor ba len par byed mod kyi/_
[\[221b.2\]]'khor ba'i nyes pas kyang mi gos so/_/sems can rnams kyi ched du lha dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag 'dzin cing len par byed de/_de dag dang ldan pas sems can de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po dag gis sdud par byed la/_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par yang 
[\[221b.3\]]dag par shes nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par bya'o snyam du sems te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor 
[\[221b.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor 
[\[221b.5\]]lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung 
[\[221b.6\]]po lnga po dag shes nas/_mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag shes nas/_
[\[221b.7\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa dang /_skyon med pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_nag nog med pa dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /_dbang 'byor pa dang /_mkhas pas bsngags pa dang /_shin tu rdzogs pa dang /_shin tu legs 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]par blangs pa dang /_'phags pa zag pa med pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la gnas nas yang dag par blang ba/_brda can gyi tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/de bzhin du chos nyid kyis thob pa dang /_
[\[222a.2\]]sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims dang /_kun tu spyod pa'i tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang tshul khrims 'dis bdag rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce'am/_de bzhin du bram 
[\[222a.3\]]ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce'am/_de bzhin du tshul khrims 'dis bdag khams kyi rgyal por gyur cig ce'am/_de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i bdag por gyur 
[\[222a.4\]]cig ce'am/_de bzhin du tshul khrims 'dis bdag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce'am/_de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 
[\[222a.5\]]dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce'am/_de bzhin du tshul khrims 'dis bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub nyid kyi 'bras bu'am/_byang 
[\[222a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su thob par gyur cig snyam du chos gang la yang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu brtan par gnas pa'i phyir te/_
[\[222a.7\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos mi 'thob cing /_mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos mi 'thob la/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos mi 'thob cing /_mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos kyis kyang 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos mi 'thob ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med 
[\[222b.2\]]pa la zhugs nas/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/_/de nas rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/_/gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya yang 'thob cing /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 'thob bo/_/de nas sangs 
[\[222b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/de nas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rgyu mod kyi/_'khor 
[\[222b.4\]]ba'i skyon rnams kyis kyang mi gos so/_/dper na sprul pa'i skyes bu ni 'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'chag pa dang /_nyal bar yang byed mod kyi/_las kyi yon tan dang /_skyon de dag gis kyang mi gos la/_sems can gyi don yang byed de/_sems 
[\[222b.5\]]can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so/_/dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya bas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba 
[\[222b.6\]]'ga' yang mi dmigs te/_de sprul pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/_tshe'i 'du byed rnams btang ste/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can 
[\[222b.7\]]dang /_sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs mod kyi/_sems can rnams kyi don yang byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]par byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung 
[\[223a.2\]]po lnga po dag la gnas/_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[223a.3\]]rdzogs par byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang /_chos rtogs pa'i bzod pa'o/_/de la dang du len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ba ni/_gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[223a.4\]]dpa' chen po de la gal te sems can thams cad lhags te/_tshig ngan pa dag gis spyos shing brgyad bkag gam/_bong ba'am/_dbyug pa'am/_mtshon cha'am/_lag cha dag gis bsnun na yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[223a.5\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa des/_'khrug par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa'am/_gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya bar sems can de dag nyid la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dag ste/_
[\[223a.6\]]lhag par snying rje bya zhing bdag gis sdig pa can gyi sems ni bskyed par mi bya'i/_bdag nyid kyis dgrar gyur pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag bzung bar zad do snyam du de ltar so sor rtog cing /_byams pa dang /_snying rje byed na/_de ni dang du len pa'i bzod pa zhes 
[\[223a.7\]]bya'o/_/chos rtogs pa la bzod pa gang zhe na/_ji ltar yod pa de dag kyang don dam par mi dmigs na/_'di la su zhig bdag la tshig ngan pa dag gis gshe bar byed pa'am/_brgyad bkag par byed pa'am/_su zhig bdag la dbyug pas brdeg par byed/_mtshon 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]gyis 'debs par byed/_lcag gis gzhu bar byed de/_'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_gsog dang /_gsob dang /_ya ma brla dang /_nam mkha' lta bu dag yin te/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_skye ba po dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed 
[\[223b.2\]]las skyes dang /_shed bu dang bral ba dag yin la/_rnam par rtog pa thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/_kun tu rtog pa las byung ba yin na/_'di la su zhig bdag la gshe ba'am bsnun par byed de/_bdag gis ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[223b.3\]]kyi phyir de ltar rnam par brtag pa mi bya'o snyam du sems na/_de ni chos rtogs pa la bzod pa zhes bya ste/_bzod pa de gnyis la sgom zhing nye bar rtog la/_rnam par dpyod na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob la/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de skad 
[\[223b.4\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni ji lta bu lags/_'di'i tshad ni ci tsam zhig lags/_'di'i shes pa ni gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[223b.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la sdig pa can gyi chos rdul tsam yang mi skye zhing /_de la bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa yang mi 'byung la/_rmi 
[\[223b.6\]]lam lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi 'du byed thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa thob ste/_des na de ni mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[223b.7\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang lags pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa gsum po 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'di dag la khyad par ram/_tha dad du bgyi ba ci mchis lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa 
[\[224a.2\]]de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gang yin pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang yin pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod 
[\[224a.3\]]pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/_nyan thos kyi bzod pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i khyad par ni de yin no/_/tha dad du dbye ba ni 
[\[224a.4\]]de yin no/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa de lta bu de dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzod pa de la gnas nas/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_lam 
[\[224a.5\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de dang ldan na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[224a.6\]]mngon par shes pa de dag dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed la/_yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byed cing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/_sangs 
[\[224a.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/de nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[224b.2\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul 
[\[224b.3\]]mngon par bsgrubs te/_rdzu 'phrul de dang ldan pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_yo byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byed la sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed/_
[\[224b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_theg pa gsum po dag la sbyor zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'god do/_/sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag dang /_lam du 
[\[224b.5\]]gtogs pa dang ldan pas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[224b.6\]]sgo gsum dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[224b.7\]]rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de yongs su rdzogs 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de spangs shing mtshan nyid med pa yongs su grub pa yongs su rdzogs la snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthu bsgrubs nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas te/_rnam pa bcu gnyis su 
[\[225a.2\]]bskor ba skor bar 'gyur te/_de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_kun tu rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_'gul bar 'gyur/_rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/_kun tu rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/_
[\[225a.3\]]ldeg par 'gyur/_rab tu ldeg par 'gyur/_kun tu rab tu ldeg par 'gyur zhing /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la sgra skad 'byung 
[\[225a.4\]]bar 'gyur te/_des sgra thos par byed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad theg pa gsum po dag las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[225a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni de ltar gces spras byed pa yin te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/_rnam 
[\[225a.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
