[\[225a.7\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar rmi lam lta bu nas/_sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi bar la nye bar gnas nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs 
[\[225b.2\]]te gnas pa nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs te gnas so/_/stong 
[\[225b.3\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin gang yang rung ba nyan thos 
[\[225b.4\]]kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs gzhan gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/_ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /_ting nge 'dzin de dag gi 'bras bu yang myong bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i 
[\[225b.5\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa'i phyir te/_ji ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar mi byed cing /_dngos po med pas dngos po med 
[\[225b.6\]]pa'i ro myong bar mi byed de/_ro myong bar mi byed pas na ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang 'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des khams mi dmigs pas na/_gang 
[\[225b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_cis snyoms par 'jug pa de thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ma dmigs pas/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des nyan 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 
[\[226a.2\]]bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nang stong pa nyid la legs par bslabs shing /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la legs par bslabs pa yin te/_stong pa nyid de dag las 
[\[226a.3\]]chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs la/_de dag gis gnas pas na/_gang la gnas na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[226a.4\]]chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang stong pa nyid du sems so/_/de stong pa nyid de dag dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/_/gsol pa/_btsun 
[\[226a.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni gang lags/_skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon yin no/_/dmigs pa med pa thams cad ni byang chub sems 
[\[226a.6\]]dpa'i skyon med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags/_dmigs pa ma mchis pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/
[\[226a.7\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o/_/de bzhin du mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs pa'o/_/dmigs pa med pa 
[\[226b.2\]]ni gang la chos de dag rgyu ba med pa ste/_'di lta ste/_gang la gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_de bzhin du gzugs dang /_
[\[226b.3\]]sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams dang /_de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i 
[\[226b.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams 
[\[226b.5\]]dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/_de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[226b.6\]]te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos de dag dmigs su med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni brjod du med la/_de bzhin du tshor 
[\[226b.7\]]ba'i gang yin pa dang /_'du shes kyi gang yin pa dang /_'du byed rnams kyi gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni brjod du med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa'i 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]phyir te/_bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi dbang gis skye bar lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/
[\[227a.2\]]skye ba gang la gnas nas/_las gang dag mngon par 'dus byas pas/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung ba'i las rnams mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gnas med de/_gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed rnams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas nas/_rtag tu sems can 
[\[227a.3\]]rnams kyi don byed mod kyi/_sems can ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs/_sgyu ma yang mi dmigs so/_/des sems can dang /_sgyu ma mi dmigs pas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/_rab 'byor de 
[\[227a.4\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_'di lta ste/_dmigs su med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[227a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag nas/_sprul pa'i bar lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu nas/_chos 
[\[227a.6\]]thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[227a.7\]]pa na/_ji ltar chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu nas/_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/_rmi lam rmi ba po yang ma yin no/_/brag ca thos pa ma yin/_brag ca nyan pa po yang ma yin no/_/mig yor mthong ba yang ma yin/_mig yor mthong ba po yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa 
[\[227b.2\]]mthong ba po yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rmi lam dang /_de bzhin du brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phyin ci log yin te/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/_rmi 
[\[227b.3\]]lam rmi ba po yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sprul pa mthong ba yang ma yin/_sprul pa mthong ba po'i bar du ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/_
[\[227b.4\]]rmi lam rmi ba po yang ma yin la/_sprul pa mthong ba ma yin/_sprul pa mthong ba po'i bar du ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni yongs su ma grub pa/_yang dag par ma byung ba yin na/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[227b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dngos po'i 'du shes can du 'gyur ba'am/_yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes can nam/_yang dag par byung ba'i 'du shes can nam/_yang dag pa'i 'du shes can du lta ga la 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal 
[\[227b.6\]]te chos 'ga' zhig gi ngo bo nyid dmigs sam/_de bzhin du yongs su grub pa'am/_yang dag par byung ba dmigs na/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 
[\[227b.7\]]gzugs la mi chags so/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar la mi chags so/_/de bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams la mi chags so/_/gzugs kyi khams la mi chags so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la mi chags so/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_rnam par 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi chags so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la mi chags so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mi chags so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi chags so/_/
[\[228a.2\]]de sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyang mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des sa dang po de yang mi dmigs na/_de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sa bcu'i bar du yongs su 
[\[228a.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyang mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des sa bcu pa'i bar de dag ma dmigs na/_de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod la/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[228a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par mthong la/_chos de dag kyang ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag dang /_shes 
[\[228a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad la bye brag ci yang med do/_/chos kyi dbyings bstan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pas chos thams cad tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[228a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa la dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams ji ltar rnam par gzhag 
[\[228a.7\]]lags/_de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ji ltar rnam par gzhag lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 
[\[228b.2\]]'das pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[228b.3\]]kyi bar gyi chos 'ga'i brjod pa yang yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni tha dad pa ma yin pa/_mtshan nyid med 
[\[228b.4\]]pa/_skye ba med pa/_'gag pa med pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas kyang 'di lta ste/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_
[\[228b.5\]]'dus ma byas sam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du chos 'ga'i ngo bo nyid kyang ma dmigs te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[228b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pa ni byang chub kyi 
[\[228b.7\]]lam yongs su dag par byed/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_ci nas 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]kyang sems can rnams phyis sa gsum du rgyu bar mi 'gyur bar 'dul bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[229a.2\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnams rmi lam lta bu dang dngos po ma mchis pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la 'di lta ste/_'di dag ni 
[\[229a.3\]]dge ba'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni lung du bstan pa dag go/_/'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa dag go/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/'di dag ni zag pa ma mchis pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dag go/_/
[\[229a.4\]]'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas dag go/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so/_/chos 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba dag go/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[229a.5\]]byed par 'gyur ba dag go/_/'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba dag go/_/'di dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba dag go/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub tu 'gyur ba dag go/_/chos 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[229a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba dag go zhes ji ltar rnam par gzhag par 'gyur lags/_de bzhin du rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dang /_brag ca lta bu'i chos rnams dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_gzhi ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma 
[\[229a.7\]]mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la/_'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so zhes bgyi ba nas/_chos 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'gyur ba dag go zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar rnam par gzhag lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni/_rmi lam dmigs 
[\[229b.2\]]rmi lam rmi ba po yang dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sprul pa dmigs/_sprul pa mthong ba po'i bar du yang dmigs so/_/de rmi lam dang /_rmi lam rmi ba po yang dmigs pa nas/_de bzhin du sprul pa dang /_sprul pa mthong ba po'i bar du dmigs pas lus dang /_ngag 
[\[229b.3\]]dang /_yid kyis phyin ci log tu gtogs pa mi dge ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis dge ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do/_/de bzhin du lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis bsod nams dang /_bsod 
[\[229b.4\]]nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'dus byas la stong pa nyid gnyis kyis brtags nas/_stong pa nyid gnyis po de nyid la gnas te/_byis pa 
[\[229b.5\]]so so'i skye bo rnams la chos ston to/_/stong pa nyid gnyis po gang la gnas te ston ce na/_'di lta ste/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'o/_/chos ci skad ston ce na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs de ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de 
[\[229b.6\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du skye mched 'di dag ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du khams rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/kye phung po rnams ni rmi lam 
[\[229b.7\]]lta bu nas/_sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o/_/skye mched de dag ni rmi lam lta bu nas/_sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o/_/khams 'di dag ni sprul pa'i bar dag lta bu ste/_kye 'di dag la phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched ni ci yang med do/_/'di la rmi lam mam/_rmi lam rmi ba po 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]'ga' yang med do/_/brag ca 'am/_brag ca nyan pa po'am/_mig yor ram/_mig yor mthong ba po'am/_de bzhin du smig rgyu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sprul pa mthong ba po yang med de/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa'i 
[\[230a.2\]]ngo bo nyid yin no/_/khyed ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes par 'gyur/_khams med pa la khams su 'du shes pa dang /_skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes par zad do/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las 
[\[230a.3\]]skyes pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na/_'di la khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin zhes ston par byed cing /_sems can ser sna can gang dag yin pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[230a.4\]]dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa des ser sna de las bzlog nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de yang longs spyod chen po nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de las kyang bzlog nas/_tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed 
[\[230a.5\]]do/_/de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba de yang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/des kyang bzlog nas/_ting nge 'dzin dag la sbyor bar byed de/_de dag gi ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang po las 
[\[230a.6\]]bzlog nas/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzlog nas/_bsam gtan gsum pa la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las bzlog nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la rab tu 'god par 
[\[230a.7\]]byed do/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzlog nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_ci rigs par 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'god par byed do/_/de las kyang bzlog nas/_theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/de nas sems can kha cig sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu de las bzlog nas/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/_rab tu 
[\[230b.2\]]'god par byed do/_/sems can kha cig ni tshul khrims kyi phung po de las bzlog nas/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/_rab tu 'god par byed do/_/sems can kha cig ni bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu de dag 
[\[230b.3\]]las rnam grangs du mas bzlog cing /_'dun pa bzlog nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/_rab tu 'god par byed do/_/sems can kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[230b.4\]]de dag las rnam grangs du mas bzlog cing /_'dun pa bzlog nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/_rab tu 'god par byed do/_/sems can kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 
[\[230b.5\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[230b.6\]]dgu po dag la 'dzud par byed/_rab tu 'god par byed do/_/sems can kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[230b.7\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la 'dzud par byed/_rab tu 'god par byed do/_/de zag pa med pa'i chos bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa de dag dang ldan pas/_sems can kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/sems can kha cig ni 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/_kha cig ni rang byang chub la rab tu 'god par byed do/_/gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[231a.2\]]chub don du gnyer ba de dag la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam rjod par byed/_ston par byed/_sems can de dag la yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[231a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dang /_sprul pa'i bar lta bu'i chos rnams dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin 
[\[231a.4\]]no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la spyod pa ni/_rmi lam lta bu'i 
[\[231a.5\]]chos rnams dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams la 'di lta ste/_'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni ma dge ba'i chos 
[\[231a.6\]]rnams so/_/'di dag ni lung du bstan pa dag go/_/'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa dag go/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dag go/_/'di dag 
[\[231a.7\]]ni 'dus byas so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so zhes rnam par 'jog par bgyid pa 'di ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang chos rnams kyi rnam par 'jog par byed pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/
[\[231b.2\]]rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag yin pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la med pa dag shes na ni de'i phyir nyan 
[\[231b.3\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lan du phan gdags par sla ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ngo mtshar 
[\[231b.4\]]rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yid la zung shig dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[231b.5\]]po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag yin pa bshad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas shing /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_
[\[231b.6\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[231b.7\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song ste/_de dag tu sems can gang dag sbyin pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/_/gang dag tshul khrims kyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /_gang dag bzod pas bsdu bar bya ba dang /_
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /_gang dag bsam gtan gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /_gang dag shes rab kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do/_/de bzhin du sems can gang dag tshad med pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[232a.2\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis bsdu bar bya ba dang /_gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_
[\[232a.3\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis yongs su sdud do/_/de bzhin du gang dag stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /_gang dag mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar 
[\[232a.4\]]bya ba dang /_gang dag smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni/_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam par smin pa las byung 
[\[232a.5\]]ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas nas/_sems can gang dag sbyin pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ji ltar sbyin pas yongs su sdud ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[232a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/_
[\[232a.7\]]me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog_/phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/_rten 'dod pa rnams la ni rten/_mar me 'dod pa rnams la ni mar me/_/na ba'i 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]gso sman 'dod pa nas mi'i yo byad ci yang rung ba'i bar du 'dod pa rnams la ni sbyin par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji ltar 'bul ba de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang chos gos dang /_
[\[232b.2\]]bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gso sman dang /_yo byad rnams sbyin par byed do/_/me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_mar me dag 
[\[232b.3\]]sbyin par byed do/_/ji ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la yang sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du mi rnams la yang sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams la yang sbyin pa 
[\[232b.4\]]sbyin par byed do/_/de snod dang snod ma yin par yongs su mi rtog gi_/sems can thams cad la tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi 'du shes nye bar gzhag nas/_sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir yongs su 
[\[232b.5\]]shes shing mngon du byas nas/_de tha dad pa med pa'i sbyin pa byin pas/_tha dad pa med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog 
[\[232b.6\]]chags mthong na/_'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems bskyed na/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang gi sems yongs su 
[\[232b.7\]]dag na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin gnas yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni bdag gis sems can dbul po 'di dag sbyin pas bsdus na/_gzhan gyi rdzas dag la rku bar mi 'gyur zhing chog shes par gyur nas 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]gzhan dag la yang sbyin pa byed par 'gyur/_de bzhin du sbyin pas bsdus na srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod par mi 'gyur/_de bzhin du sbyin pas bsdus na/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi zer/_phra ma mi smra/_ngag rtsub po mi smra/_tshig 'khyal pa 
[\[233a.2\]]mi smra bar 'gyur te/_de dag rgyu des lus zhig pa'i 'og tu/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i 
[\[233a.3\]]khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_de dag rgyu de nyid kyis 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[233a.4\]]'das pa'i bar du 'gyur ro snyam nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon dang /_gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas dang /_yongs su 'dren pa med pa rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bar 
[\[233a.5\]]bya'o zhes sngon yi dam 'di ma bcas sam/_phyir rgol ba'am/_gsod pa gzhan gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus bslangs na yang des sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam du sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'i/_'khrug pa med pa'i sems 
[\[233a.6\]]kyis phyir rgol ba dang /_gsod pa de dag la rang gi lus sbyin par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyi/_lus 
[\[233a.7\]]dang srog gi phyir ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur na ni/_de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de las 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gzhan pa 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis kyang de la khyod la sus gsol ba btab na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang dpung gnyen dang yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o 
[\[233b.2\]]zhes sngon gyi tshe rabs su yi dam 'di bcas zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/_nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad 
[\[233b.3\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[233b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/de la 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 
[\[233b.5\]]gang zhe na/_gang 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rab tu ston pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mi sdug pa'i le'u dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[233b.6\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga brjod pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rab tu ston pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa ste/_'di ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa yin zhe na/_'jig rten las mi 'phags pas/_de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes 
[\[233b.7\]]bya'o/_/de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa de byin nas/_rnam grangs du mas sems can de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de dag las 'byed par byed zlog par byed de/_phye zhing bzlog 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nas kyang thabs la mkhas pas/_'phags pa'i chos la 'god par byed de/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'god 
[\[234a.2\]]par byed do/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la 'god par byed de/_'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa yin no/_/ci'i phyir de 'jig rten las 'das pa yin zhe na/_'jig rten las rgal ba dang /_'jig 
[\[234a.3\]]rten rnams kyi gong na 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_
[\[234a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag go/_/'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag ni 'di lta ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[234a.5\]]chub kyi bar dag go/_/rab 'byor de lta mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang /_rang byang chub shes pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[234a.6\]]sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du shes pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du shes pa dang /_de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /_'jig rten 
[\[234a.7\]]pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/_gang nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[234b.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[234b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob lags na/_'o na 
[\[234b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par ci mchis/_tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[234b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_gdod de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa kho na yin la/_byang chub sems 
[\[234b.6\]]dpa' ni rjes su 'gro ba yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mun pa med pa nyid thob pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rjes su 'thob pa yin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[234b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyad par yin no/_/'di ni tha dad du bya ba yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i rten 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]yin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas/_'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sems can rnams btsud nas/_'phags pa'i gnas 
[\[235a.2\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la 'dzud par byed/_'god par byed do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god par byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_rab 
[\[235a.3\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dang thun mong ma yin pa dag gang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[235a.4\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[235a.5\]]dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu 
[\[235a.6\]]rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams te/_de dag rjod pa dang /_'chad 
[\[235a.7\]]pa dang /_rab tu ston pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du phyi'i lus dang /_de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i tshor 
[\[235b.2\]]ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du sems dang chos la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/_de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa 
[\[235b.3\]]rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed 'bad/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed 'bad/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_sems rab tu 'dzin 
[\[235b.4\]]yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed 'bad/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang /_mi nyams 
[\[235b.5\]]par bya ba dang /_shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /_phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed 'bad/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog ste/_'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya'o/_/
[\[235b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la 
[\[235b.7\]]gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang /_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa ste/_de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[236a.2\]]dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/_/stobs lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 
[\[236a.3\]]'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs te/_de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs 
[\[236a.4\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag 
[\[236a.5\]]pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[236a.6\]]gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ste/_de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_stong 
[\[236a.7\]]pa nyid kyi rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs 
[\[236b.2\]]can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te/_bsgrubs nas 
[\[236b.3\]]gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam 
[\[236b.4\]]nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du 
[\[236b.5\]]shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa'i bar dag ste/_de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/_'di la 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig 
[\[236b.6\]]pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi 
[\[236b.7\]]pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/_de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la/_gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas 
[\[237a.2\]]ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang /_las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi sgo dang /_rgyu'i sgo nas 
[\[237a.3\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa/_khams du ma pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang /_
[\[237a.4\]]gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs pa dang /_mos pa du ma pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 
[\[237a.5\]]dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 
[\[237a.6\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba nas bde 'gror 
[\[237a.7\]]'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i bar dag mthong zhing /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_'di lta ste/_tshe rabs 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma'i bar dag kyang rnam pa dang bcas/_yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dran pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med cing sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab 
[\[237b.2\]]rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing /_bdag gi skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad/_bya ba ni byas/_srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes so zhes bya ba ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[237b.3\]]bcu zhes bya'o/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_'dir chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas 
[\[237b.4\]]pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba 'thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/_mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas 
[\[237b.5\]]kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du ma 
[\[237b.6\]]bskor ba bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/_'dir zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes bya ba rgya cher sbyar bar bya ba dang /_ngas 
[\[237b.7\]]nyan thos rnams la bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa de dag bstan kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes rgya cher sbyar 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bar bya ba dang /_ngas nyan thos rnams la nges par 'byin pa/_nges par 'byed pa de byed pa sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lam gang bshad pa de la lam 'di ni nges par 'byin pa ma yin/_nges par rtogs pa ma yin/_
[\[238a.2\]]byed pa po'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba ma yin zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes rgya cher sbyar bar bya ba ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[238a.3\]]pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par 
[\[238a.4\]]rig pa ste/_de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/byams pa chen po gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la dgra bo dang /_mdza' bshes la 'dra bar mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[238a.5\]]de la snying rje chen po gang zhe na/_sems can ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa mi gtong ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[238a.6\]]'khrul pa med pa dang /_ca co med pa dang /_bsnyel ba med pa dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /_'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /_brtson 
[\[238a.7\]]'grus nyams pa med pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /_shes rab nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /_'das pa'i dus 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_lus kyi las thams cad ye 
[\[238b.2\]]shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[238b.3\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa ni 'di yin te/_zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil 
[\[238b.4\]]gnyis thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg pa ste/_dper na za ma tog zhabs shin tu mnyam zhing phyang nge ba/_sa gzhi shin tu mnyam pa la bzhag na/_'og gi zhabs thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa 
[\[238b.5\]]yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni kun nas mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa ni 'di yin te/_zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang bcas pa/_lte ba dang bcas pa/_mu khyud dang bcas pa dag mnga' ste/_
[\[238b.6\]]thams cad kyang kha dog gser lta bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil ni 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa'o/_/de dag la phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/_ras bal gyi 
[\[238b.7\]]'da' ba lta bu ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni sor mo ring ba'o/_/de la sor mo ring ba ni 'di yin te/_de'i phyag dang zhabs rnams kyi sor mo dag lhag par ring ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs dra ba dang ldan pa yin te/_de'i phyag dang zhabs la dra ba lhag pa dag mnga' ba ni ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de 
[\[239a.2\]]la rting pa yangs pa ni 'di yin te/_de'i zhabs kyi rting pa gnyis kyi mthil yangs pa ni ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa yin no/_/de la zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa ni 'di yin te/_rting 
[\[239a.3\]]pa yangs pa la yang dag par sbyor la/_rting pa yangs pa yang zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon pa la sbyor ba ste/_ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[239a.4\]]e ne ya'i lta bu ni 'di yin te/_de'i byin pa byin gyis phra rab skyes shing /_byin gyis phra bar yang dag par byung ba ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po e ne ya'i lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa yin no/_/de la 
[\[239a.5\]]bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa ni 'di yin te/_bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs na sku ma btud par phyag gnyis kyis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la yang dag par reg par mdzad cing /_kun tu nyug par mdzad pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mdoms 
[\[239a.6\]]kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no/_/de la mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_dper na rigs btsun pa'i glang po che cang shes sam/_rta cang shes kyi lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ba spu re re nas mdzes par skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil pa 
[\[239a.7\]]yin no/_/de la ba spu re re nas mdzes par skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_de'i spu khung bu re re nas/_spu re re mthon ting la lcang lor 'khyil pa 'jam zhing snum la/_g.yas su 'khyil cing mdzes par skyes pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]ni sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_de'i dbu dang sku las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang /_spu rnams ni kha gyen du bltas shing mthon ting la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil pa 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 
[\[239b.2\]]'khyil pa mdzes par skyes pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa yin no/_/de la pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa ni 'di yin te/_de'i sku la chu'am/_rdul kun tu mi chags shing mi gnas pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 
[\[239b.3\]]mdog gser lta bu dang ldan te/_dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mchod sdong la rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa ltar gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yin te/_des na gser gyi mdog lta bu zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdun mtho ba yin no/_/de 
[\[239b.4\]]la bdun mtho ba nyid ni 'di yin te/_de'i zhabs gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du phyag gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug 
[\[239b.5\]]pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /_thal gong gnyis su gnyis mtho bar gyur pa dang /_gnya' gong du mtho ba gcig gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/_sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[239b.6\]]ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni sku shin tu drang por 'khrungs pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni sku n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no/_/de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar sku chu zheng 
[\[239b.7\]]gab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_chur ji srid pa zheng du yang de srid la/_zheng du ji srid pa chur yang de srid de/_de ni n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshems thags bzang ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshems rtse mo mtho zhing rno la dkar ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin te/_de'i mgur drang por mid pa drang zhing ma yo la 
[\[240a.2\]]thogs pa med par mid du rung bar gyur pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no/_/de la ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na zhal nas ljags phyung ste/_shangs kyi bu ga gnyis dang /_spyan 
[\[240a.3\]]gyi khung bu gnyis dang /_snyan gyi bu ga gnyis su reg par mdzad cing /_yongs su nyug par mdzad la/_dbu'i mtshams su thug pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang khebs par mdzad pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[240a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ni spyan yangs shing rdzi ma ba'i lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan mthon ting lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'od 'dom gang ba yin no/_/bcom 
[\[240a.5\]]ldan 'das ni zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mdzod spu smin mtshams su 'khrungs la/_shing bal ltar 'jam zhing me tog kun da dang /_zla ba dang /_dung dang /_pad ma'i rtsa lag dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_ba mo'i mdog lta bu yin no/_/
[\[240a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa yin no/_/de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan de dag dang ldan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rang bzhin 
[\[240a.7\]]gyis snang bas khyab par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na/_mtshan de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med tshad med pa dag snang bas khyab par mdzad cing /_de nas de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams gdul 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas/_'od 'dom gang bar byin gyis rlob po/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma mdzad du zin na/_zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyang 'jig rten na yod par mi 'gyur/_zla ba gcig dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus dang lo 
[\[240b.2\]]khyud khor rnams kyang 'jig rten na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams gdul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gsung gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar mdzad do/_/bzhed na gong du yang gsung 
[\[240b.3\]]chen pos kyang go bar mdzad do/_/yon tan dang /_phan yon de dag thams cad ni nga sngon du byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas bsgrubs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[240b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_sbyin pa gnyis po zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed de/_rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[240b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa na/_snyan par smra bas ji ltar sems can rnams sdud ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa na/_thog ma kho nar sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[240b.6\]]tu phyin pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas so/_/de'i 'og tu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas so/_/de'i 'og tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas so/_/de'i 'og tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas so/_/de'i 
[\[240b.7\]]'og tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed de/_rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don spyod pas/_ji ltar sems can rnams sdud ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la yun 
[\[241a.2\]]ring por spyod pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las gzhan mi byed par rtag tu sems can rnams sdud par byed de/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pas sdud par byed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[241a.3\]]gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/sred med kyi bu'i ltar sku grims pa yin no/_/pus mo'i lha nga dag mdzes par grub pa yin no/_/sku 
[\[241a.4\]]gtsang ba dag yin no/_/sku 'jam pa dag yin no/_/sku mnyen pa dag yin no/_/sku snum bag can dag yin no/_/sku ma btud pa dag yin no/_/sor mo rnams ring ba dang /_byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sor mo rnams 
[\[241a.5\]]zlum pa dag yin no/_/sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/_/rtsa rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/long bu rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/sku dbyibs legs pa dag yin no/_/sku shin tu legs par 'brel ba dag yin no/_/skye mched rnams 
[\[241a.6\]]shin tu yongs su dag pa dag yin no/_/mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa dag yin no/_/spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dpal dang /_blo gros dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/blta bar 'os pa dag yin no/_/zhal 
[\[241a.7\]]ha cang mi ring ba dag yin no/_/zhal rkang rkong med pa dag yin no/_/sgros bim pa ltar dmar ba dag yin no/_/zhal yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no/_/dbyangs zab pa dag yin no/_/lte ba zab pa dag yin no/_/lte ba shin tu zlum pa dag yin no/_/lte ba 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]g.yas su 'khyil pa dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/phyag gi mthil mnyam pa dag yin no/_/phyag gi ri mo bar ma chad pa 
[\[241b.2\]]dag yin no/_/phyag gi ri mo mtho ba dag yin no/_/sku la dri ma med cing dri mi zhim pa med pa dag yin no/_/mdog gsal ba dag yin no/_/skye mched kyi sgo bzang ba dag yin no/_/zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu dag yin no/_/gsong por gsung ba dag yin no/_/zhal 
[\[241b.3\]]khro gnyer gyi rim pa med pa dag yin no/_/spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dag yin no/_/de dag gi zhal gyi dri zhim pa dag yin no/_/seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no/_/glang po che'i dbang po'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin 
[\[241b.4\]]no/_/ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no/_/dbu gdugs dang 'dra ba dag yin no/_/gsung snyan cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag yin no/_/tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/shangs mtho ba dag yin no/_/ljags dmar 
[\[241b.5\]]ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ljags srab cing che ba dag yin no/_/spu mthon ting can dag yin no/_/spu gtsang ba dag yin no/_/spyan yangs pa dag yin no/_/bu ga'i sgo rnams yongs su ma nyams pa dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs 
[\[241b.6\]]kyi mthil dmar ba dag yin no/_/lte ba ma bye ba dag yin no/_/dku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no/_/phyal phyang nge ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku la gnyer ma med pa dag yin no/_/tshigs mdzes pa dag yin no/_/tshigs ring ba dag 
[\[241b.7\]]yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs yongs su dag pa dag yin no/_/'od 'dom gang mnyam pa dag yin no/_/'od kyis gsal bar mdzad cing gshegs pa dag yin no/_/lha dang mi gang dag de dag gi sku mthong ba de dag tshim par 'gyur ro/_/srog chags thams 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]cad kyis mthong yang brnyas par mi byed do/_/sems can rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad do/_/de dag gi gsung ni 'khor dang 'thun par khyab par mdzad kyi/_'khor gyi phyi rol du gsung mi 'gro'o/_/ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dag yin no/_/sku'i tshigs legs par 'brel pa dag yin no/_/
[\[242a.2\]]spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dag yin no/_/dbu skra mthon ting la 'jam zhing ring ba dag yin no/_/dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dag yin no/_/dbu skra gyen du phyogs shing bzang la lcang lor 'khyil pa dag yin no/_/dbu 
[\[242a.3\]]skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no/_/thugs khar dpal gyi be'us legs par brgyan pa dag dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi mtshan dpal gyis 'bar ba dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/mtshal dang /_ldong ros dang /_tsin bi sta dang /_thing shing dang /_zangs 
[\[242a.4\]]g.ya'i kha dog gis bris pa lta bu'i mtshan rnams dang ldan pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yin te/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku legs par brgyan nas/_lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[242a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dag yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms 
[\[242a.6\]]shing 'di skad rjes su ston te/_rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog_/khyed cag yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig_/'di lta ste/_yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gnyis la mkhas par gyis shig_/de bzhin du gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_
[\[242a.7\]]lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_de bzhin du nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu'i bar dang /_yi ge brgya dang /_yi ge stong gi bar la mkhas par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig gis ngag gi rang bzhin thams cad 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]rtogs par gyis shig_/de bzhin du gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_yi ge brgya dang /_stong gi bar dag gis ngag gi rang bzhin thams cad rtogs par gyis shig_/de bzhin du yi ge gcig tu yi ge'i phyi mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po dag 'dus par gyis shig_/yi ge bzhi 
[\[242b.2\]]bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du yi ge gcig 'dus par gyis shig ces 'doms shing rjes su ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po dag 'dus par gyis shig_/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du 
[\[242b.3\]]yi ge gcig 'dus par gyis shig_/yi ge gcig gis yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la mkhas par byas la/_de bzhin du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yi ge gcig la mkhas par byas nas/_yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/yi ge mngon par 
[\[242b.4\]]bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas/_yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/_yi ges yi ge med pa'i 
[\[242b.5\]]chos ston kyang /_rab 'byor yi ge dang yi ge med pa la ma rtogs pa'i chos gang yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[242b.6\]]med pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du/_sems can yang gtan dmigs su ma mchis la/_chos kyang dmigs su ma mchis shing /_chos kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[242b.7\]]drug la spyod cing /_de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[243a.2\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_de bzhin du rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par 
[\[243a.3\]]shes pa drug gis sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid lags/_sems can dang /_sems can du gdags pa ni dmigs su ma mchis lags te/_/sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams dmigs su ma mchis/_
[\[243a.4\]]de bzhin du sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dmigs su ma mchis/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis/_sems can dmigs 
[\[243a.5\]]su ma mchis pas/_sems can du gdags pa ma mchis/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched du gdags pa ma mchis/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[243a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i chos de gang lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams mchis pa ma lags 
[\[243a.7\]]pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing /_de sems can rnams la phyin ci log la sbyor bar bgyid pa'am/_gcig tu mi 'gyur lags grang /_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs lags na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces 
[\[243b.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[243b.3\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_phung po stong pa nyid dang /_skye mched stong pa nyid dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /_rten 
[\[243b.4\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_bdag stong pa nyid dang /_sems can stong pa nyid dang /_skye ba po stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin du gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_
[\[243b.5\]]shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po dag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[243b.6\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[243b.7\]]de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang /_byams pa chen po stong pa nyid dang /_snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[244a.2\]]brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du stong pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub stong pa nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[244a.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong 
[\[244a.4\]]nas/_phyin ci log gis zin pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston par byed la/_sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so/_/chos de yang 'di ltar ci nas kyang stong pa nyid de dag las mi 'da' ba de ltar ston par byed do/_/de ltar mthong ste/_chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa 
[\[244a.5\]]nyid du shes nas/_de chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed cing gnyis su yang mi 'byed par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston to/_/rab 'byor dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa stong phrag du ma mngon par sprul nas/_sprul pa de dag nyid kha 
[\[244a.6\]]cig ni sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed cing /_kha cig ni tshul khrims la/_kha cig ni bzod pa la/_kha cig ni brtson 'grus la/_kha cig ni bsam gtan la/_kha cig ni shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing /_kha cig ni tshad med pa dag la/_kha cig ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[244a.7\]]'jug pa dag la/_kha cig ni mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyor bar byed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa des gang yang bye brag tu byas pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par byed pa de ltar sems can de dag kyang sa la rab tu 'god par byed la/_
[\[244b.2\]]sems can de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul gyis phyin ci log dag las yongs su thar bar byed pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid kyis ma bcings ma grol ba yin la/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[244b.3\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin nyid kyis ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol 
[\[244b.4\]]ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin du 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas 
[\[244b.5\]]kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can rnams la chos ston par byed kyang sems can du dmigs pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 
[\[244b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de chos thams cad dmigs su med pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing /_de gzugs dang de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /_'dus 
[\[244b.7\]]byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas la/_rab 'byor 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni gang na yang mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag dang /_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]stong pa nyid de dag la gang la gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med cing dmigs su med de/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa la mi gnas la/_rang gi dngos po yang rang gi dngos po la mi gnas te/_gzhan gyi dngos po yang gzhan gyi 
[\[245a.2\]]dngos po la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/_dmigs su med pa gang yin pa de ni gang na yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[245a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa stong pa nyid de dag thams cad kyis chos 'di dag la rab tu sgom par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[245a.4\]]pa'i nyan thos rnams dang /_'phags pa thams cad la nyes pa med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[245a.5\]]gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis kyang chos nyid 'di nyid rjes su sangs rgyas shing rtogs te/_de kho na bzhin du chos de dag dang /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da' bar sems can rnams la bstan cing ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni 
[\[245a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[245a.7\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi 'da' ba lags na/_'o na ci gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan nyid rnam par shes pa'i bar 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]du yang gzhan la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan pa zhig lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[245b.2\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang gzhan ma lags la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags te/_'dus byas dang 
[\[245b.3\]]'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bgyi ba lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ni las dkar gnag rnams kyi rnam par smin par rnam par dgod pa dang gda' bar ji ltar 'gyur te/_las nag po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po sems can 
[\[245b.4\]]dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang na gda' ba dang /_las dkar po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na gda' ba dang /_de bzhin du las dkar gnag rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar gnag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur 
[\[245b.5\]]pa rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi nang na gda' ba dang de bzhin du las mi dkar mi gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi dkar mi gnag pa ni 'di lta ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[245b.6\]]dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas nas/_'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ston par mdzad 
[\[245b.7\]]kyi/_don dam pa'i bden par ni 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar don dam pa'i bden par gzugs dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa 'di lta ste/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos de ni rnam par mi rtog cing brjod du med pa yin pa'i 
[\[246a.2\]]phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/_'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa lags na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur lags sam/_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[246a.3\]]bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi 
[\[246a.4\]]bden pa'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/_de dag la ni 'di lta ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rnam par gzhag pa yang med do/_/rab 'byor gang gi phyir byis pa so so'i skye 
[\[246a.5\]]bo thams cad la/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa med la/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'bras bu med pa de nyid kyi phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag 
[\[246a.6\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bsgom pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bsgom pa'i 'bras bu yang yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i 
[\[246a.7\]]gang zag de dag nyid la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci lam bsgom na/_'bras bu thob lags sam 'on te 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]lam ma bsgoms pa 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor lam bsgoms na yang 'bras bu mi 'thob la/_lam ma bsgoms pa yang 'bras bu 'thob 
[\[246b.2\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu mi 'thob ste/_lam med par yang 'bras bu thob pa med la lam la gnas te yang ma yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[246b.3\]]la spyod pa sems can rnams la 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa byed mod kyi/_'dus byas kyi khams la'am/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la tshar gcad pa'i tshul gyis 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus
