[\[246b.4\]]byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la tshar gcad pas 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/_'o na de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yin no/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems 
[\[246b.5\]]bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no/_/'og ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no/_/gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga sbyangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/kun 
[\[246b.6\]]'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pa ni rang byang chub yin no/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yin no zhes ma bstan lags sam/_
[\[246b.7\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la tshar gcad pas 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ni ma yin no zhes/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub 'am/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[247a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas yin nam/_'on te 'dus ma byas yin/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni 'dus ma bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci 'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[247a.3\]]chos rnams la tshar gcad du yod dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/rab 'byor ci rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi tshe 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig 
[\[247a.4\]]par rtogs pa de'i tshe 'di lta ste 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang tshar gcod par byed dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[247a.5\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa tshar gcad du med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing /_bdag kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed 
[\[247a.6\]]la/_gzhan dag kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par byed du mi 'jug ste/_'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ram/_bsam gtan dang po'am/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ram/_byams pa la snyoms 
[\[247a.7\]]par 'jug pa'am/_snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ram/_dran pa 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'am de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed de de dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed pas chos gang 
[\[247b.2\]]la yang chags pa med do/_/dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang nyams su myong bar byed sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la yang mi gnas te/_sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba kho na'i don du pha rol 
[\[247b.3\]]tu phyin pa drug gi bar la spyod cing /_de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la spyod mod kyi/_chos gang la yang mi gnas so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[247b.4\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos thams cad la spyod mod kyi chos gang la yang mi gnas shing chags pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro//_//
[\[247b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po sum cu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i mchog lags te/_mtshan ma ni btags 
[\[247b.6\]]pa tsam kun tu rtog pa las byung ba lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_ji ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'thob par 'gyur la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos khyad par du 'thob 
[\[247b.7\]]pa la sbyor bar bgyid cing /_dge ba'i chos rnams kyis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid la/_sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag la sbyor bar bgyid cing /_rab tu 'god par bgyid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po'am/_dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig sgom zhing /_dngos po med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa mi sgom na ni/_byang chub 
[\[248a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag kyang khyad par 'thob par mi 'gyur la/_gzhan dag kyang khyad par la spyod par byed cing /_rab tu 'god par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 
[\[248a.3\]]mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_gal te mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul 
[\[248a.4\]]gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_de bzhin du gal te mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/_gal te mtshan ma med pa'i kho na'i tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[248a.5\]]'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de bzhin du gal te mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du sgom zhing yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de 
[\[248a.6\]]bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/_mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis phyi 
[\[248a.7\]]stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]byed/_mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[248b.2\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed na/_de ltar na de de dag la mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis chags par mi byed la/_phyin ci log tu yang mi 'gyur te/_de dge ba'i chos 'di dag bsgoms 
[\[248b.3\]]nas gzhan dag kyang 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos de dag nyid la sbyor bar byed cing rab tu 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang chos kyi 
[\[248b.4\]]mtshan ma zhig yod par gyur na yang /_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang dran pa med pa dang /_yid la byed pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[248b.5\]]'di lta ste/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin nyid du 'god par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_dran pa med pa dang yid la byed pa med pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[248b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis rtag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang dran pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[248b.7\]]yid la byed pa ma mchis pa lags na ci'i slad du 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni zag pa med pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dag go/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas dag go/_/'di dag 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]ni 'dus ma byas dag go/_/'di dag ni thun mong ba dag go/_/'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa dag go/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams 
[\[249a.2\]]so/_/'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes chos rnams la tha dad pa mang por gdags pa mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/_nyan thos kyi chos 
[\[249a.3\]]rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan/_yang 
[\[249a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 
[\[249a.5\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub nyid mtshan ma med pa yin nam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid mtshan ma med pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[249a.6\]]de lta lags te/_btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis rnam grangs des na/_'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i 
[\[249a.7\]]chos 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[249b.2\]]chos thams cad kyi bar gyis rtag tu rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par mi bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[249b.3\]]rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa yin la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang 
[\[249b.4\]]bral ba yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni smon lam thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin pa'i phyir te/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phung po lnga po dag la skye ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing slob pa 
[\[249b.5\]]yin/_de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa la slob pa yin te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa rtogs par khong du chud pa la slob pa yin/_de nas nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa 
[\[249b.6\]]nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la 
[\[249b.7\]]slob pa yin/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_chos kyi sbyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[250a.2\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa na phung po lnga po dag la ji ltar skye ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing slob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[250a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la slob pa/_gzugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_gzugs gang las kyang mi skye ba dang gang du yang 'gag pa med pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gzugs ji ltar yang dag 
[\[250a.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_dper na dbu ba rdos pa la snying po gtan med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di lta ste/_shin tu gse tshags dang shin tu gsong ldong du rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes she na/_gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba 
[\[250a.5\]]med la gang du yang 'gro ba med de/_gzugs gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa nyid dang gang du yang 'gro ba med pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi 'gag pa ji ltar rab tu shes she na/_gzugs de gang nas 
[\[250a.6\]]kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can dang ldan pa de ltar gzugs kyi 'gag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin 
[\[250a.7\]]nyid la skye ba yang med 'gag pa yang med gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med 'phel ba yang med/_'grib pa yang med pa de ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]tshor ba ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_chu'i chu bur gyi gnas pa bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shin tu 'bras yin pa dang shin tu zug rngu yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_de 
[\[250b.2\]]ni gsum 'dus pa las kyang 'byung ba de ltar tshor ba'i skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can dang yang ldan pa de ltar tshor ba'i 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[250b.3\]]du rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med/_'phel ba yang med/_'grib pa yang med pa de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du shes ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[250b.4\]]bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_dper na smig rgyu ni chu 'dod pa la slu bar byed pa yin te/_smig rgyu la chu dmigs su med pa de ltar 'du shes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du shes gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_log par kun tu rtog pa las 
[\[250b.5\]]kyang 'byung zhing gdags pas/_tha snyad du 'dogs par byed pa de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can yang ldan pa de ltar 'du shes kyi 'gog 
[\[250b.6\]]pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med/_'phel ba yang med/_'grib pa yang med pa de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[250b.7\]]'du byed rnams ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/_snying po dmigs su med pa de ltar 'du byed yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du byed rnams gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]la/_log par kun tu rtog pa las kyang 'byung ba de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos dang yang ldan pa de ltar 'du byed rnams 
[\[251a.2\]]kyi 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med/_'phel ba yang med/_'grib pa yang med pa de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi de 
[\[251a.3\]]bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis lam gyi bzhi mdor 'dug nas/_skye bo phal po che'i mdun du byis pa la 'drid par byed pa dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[251a.4\]]bzhi po 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs ston par byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_
[\[251a.5\]]'du byed las kyang rab tu 'byung ba dang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis kyang bskyed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med la/_zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos dang yang ldan pa de 
[\[251a.6\]]ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa dang /_'grib pa med pa de ltar 
[\[251a.7\]]rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/khams rnams ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi khams ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]shes pa'i khams ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes te/_de ltar na khams rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa yin 
[\[251b.2\]]no/_/skye mched rnams ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_'di lta ste/_nang gi skye mched drug ni nang gi skye mched drug gis stong pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du phyi'i skye mched drug ni phyi'i skye mched drug gis stong par yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[251b.3\]]bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na skye mched rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ni nyams su gnod pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 
[\[251b.4\]]ni rab tu skye ba'o/_/'gog pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhi ba'o/_/lam gyi mtshan nyid ni nges par 'byin pa ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa gnyis las rnam par grol ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa gnyis ma yin par yang 
[\[251b.5\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha 
[\[251b.6\]]dad pa ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_spros pa dang bral ba dang /_zhi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[251b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_de ltar phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos rnams de ltar rab tu 'tshal na/_'o na des chos kyi dbyings 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rnam par dkrugs par mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig yod na ni/_rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma 
[\[252a.2\]]gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang dmigs su med de/_gal te dmigs su yod na ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de 
[\[252a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/ma dmigs pas de ston par mi byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_
[\[252a.4\]]chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa rnam par dkrug tu med pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la 
[\[252a.5\]]bslabs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas ni chos thams cad la bslabs pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su 
[\[252a.6\]]'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung chos thams 
[\[252a.7\]]cad kyi chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid de/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de yang chos thams cad de/_'di lta ste/_dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung du bstan pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams yin te/_de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub 
[\[252b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji 
[\[252b.3\]]ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar bsam gtan dang po dang /_ji ltar gnyis pa dang /_ji ltar gsum pa dang /_ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar byams pa dang /_ji ltar snying rje dang /_ji ltar dga' 
[\[252b.4\]]ba dang /_ji ltar btang snyoms la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar dran pa nye bar 
[\[252b.5\]]gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab 
[\[252b.6\]]par bgyi/_ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /_ji ltar mtshan ma med pa dang /_ji ltar smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[252b.7\]]pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byams pa chen po dang /_ji ltar snying rje chen po dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar skyes bu 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_ji ltar dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag yongs su grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag yongs 
[\[253a.2\]]su grub par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag yongs su grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i ris su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris su skye bar 
[\[253a.3\]]bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin du ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi bar du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lha'i ris su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'od gsal dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu 
[\[253a.4\]]che ba'i lha'i ris su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can lha'i ris su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi zhing der skye bar yang mi bgyid lags/_ji 
[\[253a.5\]]ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i ris su skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi zhing der yang skye bar mi bgyi lags/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i ris kyi bar du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi zhing /_der yang skye 
[\[253a.6\]]bar mi bgyi lags/_ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang po la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnyis pa dang /_ji ltar gsum pa dang /_ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bcu pa'i bar la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin 
[\[253a.7\]]du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i bar la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad kyi rnam pa 'tshal bar 
[\[253b.2\]]'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam la bslab par bgyi/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings de la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/_gcig tu mi 'gyur 
[\[253b.3\]]lags grang /_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings de la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi skye mched 
[\[253b.4\]]dang /_chos kyi skye mched kyi bar yang ma lags/_mig gi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la yang ma lags/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa las gud 
[\[253b.5\]]na yang ma mchis/_mig gi skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis/_mig gi khams las gud na yang ma mchis/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid chos kyi dbyings 
[\[253b.6\]]lags la/_chos kyi dbyings nyid gzugs lags so/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid chos kyi dbyings lags la/_chos kyi dbyings nyid rnam par shes pa lags te/_le'u snga mar ji ltar bsgres pa de bzhin du/_chos thams cad la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi lags so/_/
[\[253b.7\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med de/_gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma yin la/_
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings med/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma yin la/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings med de/_gzugs nyid chos kyi dbyings 
[\[254a.2\]]yin la/_chos kyi dbyings nyid gzugs yin no/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar nyid chos kyi dbyings yin la/_chos kyi dbyings nyid rnam par shes pa yin te/_phung po rnams kyi skabs su ji ltar bsgres pa de bzhin du skye mched rnams la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[254a.3\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang 
[\[254a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi mthong ste/_de'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes na/_chos thams cad ming med pa la 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor 
[\[254a.5\]]ba'o/_/'di ni 'du shes so/_/'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bya ba'i bar du ming gi brdas ston par byed do/_/rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi 
[\[254a.6\]]slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis gzugs mthong ba 'ga' zhig kho na la byin gyis brlabs nas/_skye bo phal po che'i mdun du gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_skyes pa'i gzugs sam/_bud med kyi gzugs sam/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_glang gi gzugs rnams sam/_
[\[254a.7\]]skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba'am/_chu klung nyams dga' ba'am/_rdzing bu nyams dga' ba'am/_ljon shing nyams dga' ba sna tshogs bstan la/_der yang gding ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gam/_gos bgo ba dag kyang bstan/_me tog phreng ba sna tshogs dag kyang bstan/_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_zan dang /_btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang bstan/_glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra mang pos skye bo phal po che de mngon par dga' bar byed cing /_bdag nyid sbyin pa sbyin par byed par bstan tam/_tshul khrims srung ba'am/_bzod 
[\[254b.2\]]pa sgom pa'am/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/_bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa'am/_bdag nyid shes rab sgom par yang bstan la/_yang de rnam pa de dag gis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar yang bstan/_de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA 
[\[254b.3\]]la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba yang bstan tam/_de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar yang bstan/_de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul 
[\[254b.4\]]dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar yang bstan tam/_de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar yang bstan/_bdag nyid nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba yang bstan tam/_bdag nyid 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar 
[\[254b.5\]]du nye bar 'gro bar yang bstan tam/_de bzhin du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas su bstan tam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[254b.6\]]nas bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_de 
[\[254b.7\]]bzhin du sa dang po la spyod pa dang /_sa bcu pa'i bar la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtsen cing /_'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rnam par rtsen par byed pa de dag dang /_bdag nyid 'dra bar yang bstan/_de bzhin du bdag nyid de bzhin 
[\[255a.2\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po thob pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs 
[\[255a.3\]]par brgyan pa dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus gsal bar byas par bstan na de na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo byis pa so so'i skye bo'i rang bzhin can de dag ni 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma mi 'di ji tsam du 'di ltar bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs 
[\[255a.4\]]kyi bar du yang bstan te/_mig tu sdug cing snying dga' bar byed pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dag gis skye bo 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni legs par bslabs pa yin zhing /_bya ba mdzes pa dag byed do snyam mo/_/de nas skyes pa dang bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo mkhas 
[\[255a.5\]]pa'i rang bzhin can shes nyen can rtog ge dang spyod par ldan pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar sgyu ma'i las 'di la chos 'ga' yang dmigs su med na/_mi 'di yod pa ma yin pa mig dang /_yid rmongs par byed pa'i chos 'di dag gis skye bo 'di dag 
[\[255a.6\]]dga' bar byed pa dang /_byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems can 'di dag yod pa ma yin pa la sems can du 'du shes shing /_rdzas med pa la rdzas su 'du shes pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no snyam mo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[255a.7\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs la/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos ni gang yang mi mthong ste/_sems can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs mod kyi/_thabs la mkhas pas bdag 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan gyi bar dang /_gzhan dag kyang shes rab bsgom pa'i bar du yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing shes 
[\[255b.2\]]rab kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi bar du sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar yang byed de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[255b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_thabs la mkhas pas bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan par byed la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs su ji ltar bsgres pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyi bar la yang de bzhin du 
[\[255b.4\]]sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can dang chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis 
[\[255b.5\]]na/_'o na de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[255b.6\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can dang chos gang yang dmigs su med do/_/rab 'byor gal 
[\[255b.7\]]te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin pa zhig tu gyur na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_sems can rnams la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gi phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa de'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas nas/_sems can rnams la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par ston to/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 
[\[256a.2\]]stong pa nyid kyang gang yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin 
[\[256a.3\]]gyis stong pa nyid la gnas nas/_phung po lnga po 'di dag rang bzhin gyis stong par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ltar rig nas kyang de kho na bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rang bzhin 
[\[256a.4\]]gyis stong par rig nas/_de kho na bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du rig nas/_de kho na bzhin du sems can rnams 
[\[256a.5\]]la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas/_de kho na bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du rnam par thar pa 
[\[256a.6\]]brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[256a.7\]]dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas/_de kho na bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas/_de kho na bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston 
[\[256b.2\]]to/_/rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po zhig yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par chos ston par mi 'gyur la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid bshig par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phyi stong 
[\[256b.3\]]pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 
[\[256b.4\]]dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po zhig yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par 
[\[256b.5\]]chos ston par mi 'gyur la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid bshig par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni nam du yang 'jig par mi 'gyur la/_ther zug tu gnas pa yang ma yin te/_'gro ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni yul na mi gnas/_
[\[256b.6\]]phyogs na yang mi gnas te/_de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid yin te/_de la ni sogs pa'am/_'jig pa'am/_'phel ba'am/_'grib pa'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon 
[\[256b.7\]]mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang med de/_de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yin no/_/rang bzhin de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bar byed mod kyi/_chos gang yang 'jug 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]par mi mthong la/_des chos thams cad zhugs pa med cing gnas pa med par mthong ste/_de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid yin no/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos thams cad 
[\[257a.2\]]rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de las phyir mi ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang la bdag dang sems can dang skye ba po dang /_gso ba po dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_
[\[257a.3\]]shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po dmigs su med pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su 
[\[257a.4\]]med pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du dmigs su med par rgya cher sbyar bar bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de la gnas nas/_chos gang la yang sgrib par mi mthong ste/_des chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[257a.5\]]dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i mi rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma zhig gis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par rgyun ma chad par chos bstan par gyur na/_rab 'byor 'di ji 
[\[257a.6\]]snyam du sems/_ci de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i mi de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'i skal ba yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[257a.7\]]'das ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de dag la dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la 'bras bu 'thob par ji ltar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]chos thams cad dngos po med pa la shes rab can su zhig 'di lta ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub nyid dam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[257b.2\]]chub la mngon par zhen par byed/_gzhan du na phyin ci log tu ltung ba'i skye dgu rnams phyin ci log med pa la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par byed de/_rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir de yang phyin ci log ma yin no/_/gang la phyin ci log med pa de la ni bdag med do/_/sems can med do/_/
[\[257b.3\]]shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du med do/_/de la ni gzugs med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed rnams med do/_/rnam par shes pa med do/_/gang la gzugs med cing tshor ba med pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du byed rnams med pa dang /_
[\[257b.4\]]rnam par shes pa med pa de la bdag med pa nas/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du med de/_de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin no/_/de la ni gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can rnams phyin ci log 
[\[257b.5\]]las rnam par grol bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_de bzhin du rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_sdug par 'du shes pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_
[\[257b.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'i bar las rnam par grol bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[257b.7\]]zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar de dag kyang don dam par 'dus ma byas ji lta ba de lta bu ni ma yin no/_/de ni ma skyes pa dang /_dngos po med pa yin te/_de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa 
[\[258a.2\]]nyid yin no/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yin te de la ni bdag med do/_/sems can med do/_/shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du med do/_/gzugs med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed rnams med do/_/rnam 
[\[258a.3\]]par shes pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi don ma gtogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi ched du ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[258a.4\]]chub don du gnyer bar mi byed do/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus kyi mthar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de la gnas nas/_sems 
[\[258a.5\]]can rnams kyi sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_'du shes thams cad las rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod par byed do/_/de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_yang 
[\[258a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam dang /_lam thams cad la spyod do/_/des lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byas te/_de'i tshe 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlabs 
[\[258a.7\]]nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshul de gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di nyid yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di nyid yin par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[258b.2\]]ldan 'das gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di nyid yin par 'gyur ro/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs 
[\[258b.3\]]shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di nyid yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ma gtogs par 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de lta 
[\[258b.4\]]bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya ste/_de ni byang chub kyi spyod pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams 
[\[258b.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_kye ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /_gzugs kyang gzhan/_tshor ba yang gzhan/_'du shes kyang gzhan/_'du byed rnams 
[\[258b.6\]]kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhing /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang gzhan/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang gzhan du rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 
[\[258b.7\]]de/_rnam par 'khrug par yang mi bgyid la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//_//shes rab kyi 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po sum cu gcig pa/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_de bzhin 
[\[259a.2\]]du tshor ba yang gzhan/_'du shes kyang gzhan/_'du byed rnams kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_byang chub kyi bar du yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin par gyur na ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[259a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gzugs yin zhing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams yin la/_rang 
[\[259a.4\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yin pa de'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 
[\[259a.5\]]stong par rig nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di la chos gang yang 'jig pa yang med/_ther zug tu gnas pa yang med/_'gro ba yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/byis pa 
[\[259a.6\]]'du shes sna tshogs can rnams ni gzugs kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan du yongs su rtog go/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan du yongs su rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[259a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan du yongs su rtog go/_/de dag de ltar yongs su rtog par byed pas gzugs la mngon par zhen to/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]shes pa la mngon par zhen to/_/de dag gzugs la mngon par zhen cing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod cing /_de la yang mngon par zhen to/_/mngon par zhen 
[\[259b.2\]]nas kyang yang gzugs skyed par byed cing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skyed par byed de/_de dag ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[259b.3\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su mi 'thar ro/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_gzugs stong ngam 'on te 
[\[259b.4\]]mi stong zhes bya bar khas mi len cing /_nye bar mi len la rnam par 'khrug par yang mi byed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong ngam/_'on te mi stong zhes bya bar khas mi len cing /_nye bar mi len la rnam par 'khrug 
[\[259b.5\]]par yang mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar du stong ngam/_'on te mi stong zhes bya bar khas mi len cing nye bar mi len la/_rnam par 'khrug par yang mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste/_'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par shes 
[\[259b.6\]]pa'i bar ro/_/'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yin no zhes gzugs rnam par 'khrug par yang mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dper na 
[\[259b.7\]]nam mkhas ni nam mkha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed de/_nang gi nam mkha'i khams kyis kyang phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams kyis kyang nang gi nam mkha'i khams rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/rab 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'byor de bzhin du gzugs kyis kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang gzugs rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_stong pa 
[\[260a.2\]]nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub kyi bar gyis kyang stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang byang chub kyi bar rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de 
[\[260a.3\]]dag la 'di ni stong ngo /_/'di ni mi stong ngo snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las rang bzhin gyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad 
[\[260a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/_rab 'byor yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa ni gang dag lags/_rtags ni gang dag lags/_mtshan ma ni gang dag lags/_bdag cag gis ji ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[260a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sa gang yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[260a.7\]]pa'i sa gang yin pa'i sa bshad pa de dag thams cad ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid de/_'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i de bzhin nyid de/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'jug par byed 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]la/_de bzhin nyid de chos kyi de bzhin nyid la mi rtog ste/_rnam par mi rtog pa kho na'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la 'jug go/_/de la zhugs nas kyang de'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de shes nas/_de bor te 'di ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin no snyam du chos gang la yang the tshom mi za 
[\[260b.2\]]zhing /_de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig kho na ste/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid do snyam mo/_/de ni byung rgyal du smra ba ma yin te/_tshig don dang ldan pa kho nar smra'i don dang mi ldan par ni ma yin no/_/gzhan gyis byas pa dang ma byas pa la 
[\[260b.3\]]mi lta zhing /_legs par gsungs pa tshol ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang 
[\[260b.4\]]dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par ston lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam pa med pa/_rtags med pa mtshan ma med pa yin no/_/
[\[260b.5\]]gsol pa/_gal te chos thams cad rnam pa ma mchis pa/_rtags ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag las phyir ldog na/_phyir mi ldog par ston lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[260b.6\]]'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs las phyir ldog pa yin zhing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par ston 
[\[260b.7\]]to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so'i skye bo'i sa las phyir ldog pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sa las phyir ldog pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir ldog pa de'i tshe phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[261a.2\]]te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar las phyir mi ldog pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 'di 
[\[261a.3\]]dag ni shes par bya ba shes shing mthong bar bya ba mthong ba'am/_yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dogs par byed pa'o/_/zhes 'di las phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gi ngor lta ba de ni gnas med de/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la the tshom bskyed par mi byed de/_tshul 
[\[261a.4\]]khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin par gyur pa ma yin no/_/lta ba ngan par mi ltung ngo /_/dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis la dag par mi 'dzin to/_/lha gzhan dag la phyag 'tshal bar mi byed cing /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me dang /_
[\[261a.5\]]bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag de dag la sbyin pa'am/_bya bar mi sems pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rigs dman pa dang /_
[\[261a.6\]]rigs ngan du mi skye ste/_'di lta ste/_gdol pa'i rigs rnams sam/_g.yung po'i rigs rnams sam/_smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs rnams sam/_de las gzhan pa'i rigs ngan rnams sam/_mi khom pa brgyad po dag gi bar rnams su mi skye/_bud med kyi dngos po yongs su mi 
[\[261a.7\]]'dzin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]blangs nas gnas te/_de bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs shing /_gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba sgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin/_srog gcod pa spong ba sgrub pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi 
[\[261b.2\]]bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag gis kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spangs shing /_gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba sgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin/_log par lta ba spong ba sgrub pa'i bsngags pa yang 
[\[261b.3\]]rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 
[\[261b.4\]]'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam kun tu mi spyod na sad pa na lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[261b.5\]]dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rtag tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[261b.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_sbyin pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi ched du sgom la/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_
[\[261b.7\]]mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_'di snyam du chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis sems 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du bsams nas/_des chos kyi sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang lhan cig thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/_de yang mi dmigs 
[\[262a.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[262a.3\]]chos zab mo rnams la som nyi dang yid gnyis dang the tshom med do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo rnams la som nyi dang /_yid gnyis dang the tshom ma mchis pa lags/_
[\[262a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni gang la de som nyi dang yid gnyis dang /_the tshom za bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'di lta ste/_gzugs sam/_
[\[262a.5\]]tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam 'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[262a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin ngag gi las 'jam pa dang /_yid kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sems 
[\[262a.7\]]can thams cad la yang zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po ni rtag tu byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_de bzhin du byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[262b.2\]]chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sgrib pa lnga dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/lnga po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_
[\[262b.3\]]gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom dang /_lhan cig mi gnas te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[262b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni bag la nyal thams cad kyi thams cad du med de/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[262b.5\]]yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro'am ldog kyang rung 'khrul pa'i sems kyis 'gro ba'am/_ldog par mi byed kyi de 'gro'am/_ldog na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'gro'am/_ldog par byed de/_dran bzhin kho nar 
[\[262b.6\]]'gro'am ldog par byed do/_/dran pa bzhin kho nar 'chag pa'am/_'greng ba'am/_'dug pa'am/_nyal bar byed do/_/gya tshom du rkang pa sa la mi 'jog_/gya tshom du rkang pa sa la mi 'deg gi dran bzhin kho nar rkang pa sa la 'jog cing dran bzhin kho nar rkang 
[\[262b.7\]]pa sa la 'deg la mthong bzhin du sa'i phyogs su 'gro ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i gos kyi spyod pa ni smad du med pa yin/_rtag tu gtsang sbra can yin zhing dri nga ba med la/_de nad nyung ba dang rdul dang /_dri ma dang bral ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[263a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i lus la ni mir gyur pa rnams kyi lus la srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri gang dag yod cing lus de nyid la za ba de dag med do/_/
[\[263a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las rab mchog tu gyur pa yin te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus la srin bu'i 
[\[263a.4\]]rigs de dag med do/_/rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag shin tu rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches rgya cher lus dang /_ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa yongs su 
[\[263a.5\]]'dzin to/_/grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_nyi ma dang /_rlung dang /_sha sbrang gi reg pa dag bzod pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi 
[\[263a.6\]]ldog par ston to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i lus yongs su dag pa de gang lags/_ngag yongs su dag 
[\[263a.7\]]pa gang lags/_yid yongs su dag pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]par 'phel ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi mi drang ba dang /_gya gyu dang /_ngag gi mi drang ba dang /_gya gyu dang /_sems kyi mi drang ba dang /_gya gyu rnams yongs su byang bar byed de/_de ji ltar lus kyis legs 
[\[263b.2\]]par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnam pa bzhi spyod pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs 
[\[263b.3\]]su dag pa yin no/_/de lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa des nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang 'da' bar byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang 'jug la/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[263b.4\]]mtha' mngon sum du yang mi byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa yin par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub 
[\[263b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la gdu ba ma yin/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal 
[\[263b.6\]]cha dang /_stan la gdu ba ma yin/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis po dag yang dag par blangs nas gnas te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[263b.7\]]gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nam yang ser sna'i sems mi skyed/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems dang /_rmongs pa'i sems mi skyed de/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blo brtan pa yin no/_/de ni gus par byas nas gzhan las chos nyan te/_gang ci nyan kyang rung /_de thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyor bar byed do/_/'jig 
[\[264a.2\]]rten pa'i las gang dag yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/_'bad pa med pa kho nar shes la/_de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyor bar byed cing /_gang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'byor pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong gi 
[\[264a.3\]]de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'byor par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[264a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i mdun du bdud sdig can gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag mngon par sprul nas/_sems can dmyal ba re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag mang po zhig 
[\[264a.5\]]bstan te/_dmyal ba'i mes bsreg cing btso ba dang /_bskol ba dang /_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po rtsub pa'i tshor ba dag myong bar mngon du sprul te bstan la/_byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni de bzhin 
[\[264a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa sha stag ste/_'di dag sems can dmyal ba 'di dag tu skyes so/_/kye khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bla na 
[\[264a.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa ni sems can dmyal bar 'gyur du zad na/_kye da dung yang khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di thong shig dang /_de ltar na khyod sems can dmyal ba 'di dag nas thar bar 'gyur zhing /_phyis 'dir 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]skye bar mi 'gyur la 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes zer yang /_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sems gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 
[\[264b.2\]]las mi dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu ni mi sdug pa yin par des chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni chos kyi gter thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'byung po thams cad la phan par bzhed pa yin pas/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung ba ma yin pa'i phyir 
[\[264b.3\]]ro/_/rab 'byor 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can dmyal ba rnams sam/_dud 'gro rnams sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang 
[\[264b.4\]]rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad kyis 'ongs te/_'di skad du sngon khyod kyis 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[264b.5\]]par bya'o/_/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/zhes thos pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni khyod kyis log par thos pa 
[\[264b.6\]]yin gyis/_de thams cad slar bshags par gyis shig_/khyod kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_
[\[264b.7\]]dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa thams cad slar bshags par gyis shig_/slar thong shig khyod dang de dag ni log pa'o/_/kye dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag slar 'chags shing gtong la kho bo'i tshig 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ltar byed na ni de ltar na khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis de skad thos pa gang yin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin te/_de snyan dngags su byas pa yin gyi/_kho bo khyod 
[\[265a.2\]]la ston pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par na/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no zhes zer la/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'khrug cing nem nur byed la/_the tshom za na byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung 
[\[265a.3\]]bstan pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/_de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bdud sdig can gyis 'dun pa zlog pa na mi 'khrug cing nem nur mi byed la/_the tshom mi za ste/_de'i tshig la yid ches 
[\[265a.4\]]par mi byed/_gzhan la yid ches par mi byed/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[265a.5\]]chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor dper na dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni chos rnams mngon sum du mthong ba'i phyir/_nam yang gzhan su la yang yid ches par mi byed cing /_bdud sdig can 
[\[265a.6\]]gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin na/_gzhan gyis lta ci smos/_rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzhan su la yang yid ches par mi byed la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_bdud sdig can gyis kyang mi rdzi 
[\[265a.7\]]zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/_/de ni su la yang yid ches par mi byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dad pas mi 'gro na/_gzhan dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu rnams sam/_bdud 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]sdig can la yid ches par lta ga la byed de/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni gang la yid ches par bya ba'i gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_/de bzhin du gang la yid ches par bya ba'i tshor 
[\[265b.2\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du gang la yid ches par bya ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin 
[\[265b.3\]]nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang la yid ches par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags 
[\[265b.4\]]dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad du 'di ni 'khor ba'i spyod pa yin gyi/_'di byang chub sems 
[\[265b.5\]]dpa'i spyod pa ni ma yin gyis/_kye khyod kyis 'di nyid du sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces zer zhing /_de byang chub sems dpa' de la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ltar bcos pa ston la lam ltar bcos pa de yang 'khor ba'i spyod pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsdus 
[\[265b.6\]]pa ste/_yang na rus gong du 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par sngos pa dang /_rnam par rnags pa dang /_rnam par bam pa dang /_rnam par dmar ba dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes sam/_yang na byams pa'am/_yang na snying rje'am/_yang na dga' ba'am/_yang na btang 
[\[265b.7\]]snyoms sam/_yang na bsam gtan dang po'am/_yang na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ram/_yang na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ston par byed cing /_tshe dang ldan pa lam 'di dang nan tan 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_dgra bcom 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]pa'i bar ram/_rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyis/_kye khyod kyis 'di nyid du sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig phyis 'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar gyur ta re/_yang na gal te khyod gzugs can gyi lus mi 'dod dam/_yongs su mi gzung 
[\[266a.2\]]bar sems na/_'di nyid du skye mched rnams yongs su sbyongs shig ces/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la de skad brjod kyang /_rab 'byor gal te sems mi 'khrug cing mi g.yo la/_gong du yang 'di snyam du bdag la lam ltar bcos pa gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[266a.3\]]'bras bu yang mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur zhing /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur la/_rang byang chub kyang mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam ltar bcos pa ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la gces spras byed pa yin no snyam du 
[\[266a.4\]]sems so/_/gong du yang bdag la chags pa de ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la gces spras byed pa yin te/_chags pa'i gnas de shes nas/_theg pa gsum po kun la bslab par bya'o snyam nas dga' ba skye'o/_/bdud sdig can gyis de dga' bar rig nas/_de la 'di 
[\[266a.5\]]skad ces kye rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi 
[\[266a.6\]]gso sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi drung du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgom zhing de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar 
[\[266a.7\]]du yang yongs su bsgoms la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag la bkur sti byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[266b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_de 
[\[266b.3\]]bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pas/_ji ltar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la gnas par bgyi zhes yongs su zhus shing dris pa rnams lta bar 'dod dam/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang bshad pa la de kho na bzhin du 
[\[266b.4\]]gnas te/_de kho na bzhin du spyad de kho na bzhin du rnal 'byor du byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_de ltar gdams pa dang de ltar rjes su bstan pa dang /_
[\[266b.5\]]de ltar slob pa rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da dung ma thob na/_khyod lta zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur zhes na de skad brjod na yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing /_
[\[266b.6\]]yid dngang bar mi 'gyur la/_gang du yang chags pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang 'thob par mi 'gyur/_rang byang chub kyi bar du yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba'i chags pa bdag la ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la gces spras byed pa yin no snyam nas 
[\[266b.7\]]dga' ba skye'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems zhum pa med pa nyid du shes nas/_skad cig de nyid las phyogs de nyid du dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig mngon par sprul nas/_dge slong 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa med pa sha stag ste/_gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa las de dag nyan thos nyid du gnas par gyur to/_/de bas na khyod lta zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[267a.2\]]bar lta ga la 'gyur zhes bstan kyang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam du kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig can lam ltar bcos pa ston pa dang /_sprul pa yin no snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
