[\[267a.3\]]pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo snyam ste/_gong du yang de 'di snyam du gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[267a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med la go 
[\[267a.5\]]skabs ma yin te/_de ni gnas med do snyam du sems na/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[267a.6\]]dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang ma bral zhing /_sems can rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug 
[\[267a.7\]]par byed 'jog par byed/_'god par byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par ston to snyam mo/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bdud kyi las rnams rig cing rtogs pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_bdud kyi las de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_yul lnga po dag la lhag par chags shing smon la/_de ltar pha rol tu 
[\[267b.2\]]phyin pa rnams la mngon par mi brtson pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par ston to snyam mo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[267b.3\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na gang las phyir mi ldog ces bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[267b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog na/_phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[267b.5\]]ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_skye mched kyi 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi 'du shes dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'du shes dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[267b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi 'du shes dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi 'du 
[\[267b.7\]]shes dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar phyir 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs te/_de chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs la mi dmigs pas chos gang yang mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/
[\[268a.2\]]mngon par 'du mi byed pas chos gang yang mi skyed de/_de'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gan 
[\[268a.3\]]du 'ongs nas mos pa zlog cing /_'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang 
[\[268a.4\]]gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[268a.5\]]rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs te/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/_'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o 
[\[268a.6\]]zhes bya ba 'di ni khyod nyon mongs shing don med par 'gyur ba ste/_de skad bstan pa 'di ni bdud kyi las so/_/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu yid la byed pa de dag thong shig_/khyod la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_
[\[268a.7\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_log par ltung bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/_de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshig de dag thos nas 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_gang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang 'bral bar byed pa 'di dag ni bdud kyi 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]las te/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi/_de dag sems can rnams kyis mi shes ma mthong zhing /_khong du ma chud kyis de'i phyir bdag gis nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dngos po 
[\[268b.2\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i go cha bgos la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/_sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i chos bstan par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 
[\[268b.3\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o snyam du bsams shing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[268b.4\]]rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_chos de dag thos na sems brtan par bya'o/_/sems mi g.yo bar bya'o sems mi 'phrogs par bya'o/_/de sems brtan pa dang /_sems mi g.yo ba dang /_sems mi 'phrogs pa de dag dang ldan pas pha rol tu 
[\[268b.5\]]phyin pa drug po dag la spyod na byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po sum cu gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[268b.6\]]ldan 'das phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi'am 'on te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[268b.7\]]stsal to/_/rab 'byor phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir mi ldog 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pa zhes bgyi/_ji ltar na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las log 
[\[269a.2\]]pa de ni/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las mi ldog pa de ni rab 'byor phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[269a.3\]]dpa' chen po yin te/_phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya ste/_rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan 
[\[269a.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig can gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus so/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de 
[\[269a.5\]]bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'dod na 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 
[\[269a.6\]]'jug go/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/mngon par shes pa lnga mngon par sgrub bo/_/de 'dod na bsam gtan bzhi po dag 
[\[269a.7\]]la snyoms par 'jug ste/_bsam gtan de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug ste/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo /_/de bzhin du 'du shes 
[\[269b.2\]]dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug ste/_'gog pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du yang mi byed cing /_yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/de 'dod na lus gang 'dod pa'i lus de dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/lus yongs su bzung ba des sems can 
[\[269b.3\]]rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs lhur len 
[\[269b.4\]]pa ma yin/_mtshan ma lhur len pa ma yin/_g.yog 'khor lhur len pa ma yin/_sbyin pa lhur len pa ma yin/_tshul khrims lhur len pa ma yin/_bzod pa lhur len pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus lhur len pa ma yin/_bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin/_shes 
[\[269b.5\]]rab lhur len pa ma yin/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lhur len pa ma yin/_mngon par shes pa lhur len pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lhur len pa ma yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[269b.6\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar lhur len pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas la blta ba lhur len pa ma yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba lhur len pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[269b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong zhing nam mkha' dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing gang zhig lhur len pa bskyed pa dang /_gang du bskyed pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong zhing /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[270a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa de dang ldan pas spyod lam bzhis 'gro'am/_ldog gam/_'greng ngam/_'dug gam nyal yang rung ste/_ji bzhin du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang /_'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed de/_rab 
[\[270a.3\]]'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gal te khyim na gnas na yang thabs la 
[\[270a.4\]]mkhas pas/_sems can rnams kyi don du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar bzung nas sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed do/_/mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba dag gi bar du 
[\[270a.5\]]sbyin par byed do/_/de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[270a.6\]]phyin pa'i bar du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de khyim du gnas na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su bkang ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 
[\[270a.7\]]sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du yongs su bkang ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed kyang 'dod 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa dag la yongs su mi spyod cing rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa yin te/_mi gtsang ba dang dri nga ba med do/_/de nam yang su la yang pha rol la brnyas pa dang /_khyad du gsod pa gang dag gis pha rol mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i pha rol la brnyas pa dang /_khyad du gsod pa mi byed de/
[\[270b.2\]]rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par bstan to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[270b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur te/_bla na med 
[\[270b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rdo rje'i rigs lnga brgya'i bar du yang bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/_de la mi rnams sam/_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis 
[\[270b.5\]]nam yang gnod par byed mi nus te/_de la 'jig rten na lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang nam yang chos dang 'thun par thub pa med do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub yid la byed pa 
[\[270b.6\]]las de'i sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nam yang de dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_mig gi dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po'i bar du ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nam du yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lnga 
[\[270b.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po'o/_/de ni skyes bu dam pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]chen po ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi sems rnam par rtog pa lnga dang sgrib pa lnga po dag gis nam yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rnam par g.yeng bar 
[\[271a.2\]]mi 'gyur ba ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[271a.3\]]yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu byang chub kyi sems de dang ldan pa ni bud med rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags dang /_sman dang /_sbyar sman dang /_gzhan la 'khu ba'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa de dag thams 
[\[271a.4\]]cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi sbyor zhing /_srog gi phyir yang bud med 'gugs pa'i thabs gang yang rung ba sbyor bar mi byed de/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo dag la bu phor 'gyur ro zhe 'am/_bu mor 'gyur ro zhe'am/_rigs 'phan 
[\[271a.5\]]par 'gyur ro zhe'am tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhe'am tshe thung bar 'gyur ro zhes cho 'phrul dag gis 'gugs par mi byed cing su la yang phung bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 
[\[271a.6\]]rnams la sems can gyi mtshan ma yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_log par 'tsho ba'i mtshan ma lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_sdig pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/des na de'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags 
[\[271a.7\]]dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par ston pa'i 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag bstan gyis de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[271b.2\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bas phung po'i sbyor ba dag la brtson par mi gnas khams dang skye mched kyi sbyor ba dag la brtson par mi gnas so/_/
[\[271b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des phung po dang khams dang skye mched stong pa nyid du legs par bsgoms pa yin zhing /_legs par yid la byas pa'i phyir ro/_/de rgyal po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/de 
[\[271b.4\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni stong pa nyid la legs par gnas pas chos gang la yang ngan pa'am/_mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de chom rkun gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la yang brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni rang 
[\[271b.5\]]gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yang /_chos gang la yang bsdu ba'am/_dbrog pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la yang brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa 
[\[271b.6\]]nyid la legs par gnas pas/_chos gang la yang nyung ngu nyid du'am/_mang po nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de sangs rgyas kyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la yang brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid la 
[\[271b.7\]]legs par gnas pas chos gang la yang [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la yang brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni nam mkha' stong pa 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]nyid la legs par gnas pas/_chos gang la yang bsdu ba'am/_mi bsdu ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de dud 'gro'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la yang brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i 
[\[272a.2\]]mtha' la legs par gnas pas/_chos thams cad la bsdu ba'am/_mi bsdu ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos gang la yang 'phel ba'am 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de bdag dang sems can dang skye ba po dang /_srog dang shes pa po dang /_
[\[272a.3\]]mthong ba po'i bar gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad srog med pa dang /_sems can med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la yang brtson par mi gnas so/_/de 
[\[272a.4\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par gnas pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang nam yang mi 'bral ba'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de nam yang ser sna'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas 
[\[272a.5\]]so/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de 'khrug pa dang khro ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_
[\[272a.6\]]le lo'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de rnam par g.yeng ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so/_/de chos thams cad 
[\[272a.7\]]stong pa nyid la spyod cing chos 'dod pa yin te/_sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing /_chos tha dad pa'i bsngags pa rjod pa ma yin no/_/de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bshes gnyen du 'dod pa yin te/_bshes gnyen du 'dod pa des chos thos nas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag la chos de ston cing mos par byed do/_/chos de bstan cing mos par byas nas sems can de dag bla na med pa yang 
[\[272b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go 'dzud do 'god do/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la blta ba dang /_mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bzhugs shing gzhes 
[\[272b.3\]]pa der skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong zhing 'di lta ste/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis nyin mtshan du gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang 
[\[272b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni phal cher 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag bskyed nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la gnas te/_gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon du gyur cing 
[\[272b.5\]]mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan dang po bskyed cing /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bskyed nas smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang 
[\[272b.6\]]ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[272b.7\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa de 'di snyam du bdag ni phyir mi ldog pa'am/_phyir mi ldog pa ma yin no snyam du de the tshom rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]zhe na/_de rang gi sa la the tshom med de/_rang gi sa la the tshom med pas/_chos rnams shin tu yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni phyir mi ldog pa'am/_phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa'i chos phra rab tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[273a.2\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu de la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de la som nyi med cing 
[\[273a.3\]]the tshom mi za'o/_/de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de la gnas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag kyang shes te/_bdud kyi las kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/bdud 
[\[273a.4\]]kyi las thams cad shes nas kyang rnam par 'joms so/_/rnam par 'thor ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mtshams med pa byed pa'i mi ni 'chi ka'i bar du yang rtag tu mtshams med pa'i sems dang mi 'bral zhing /_de'i mtshams med pa'i sems de rjes su 'brang 
[\[273a.5\]]ste/_mtshams med pa'i sems de ni thabs thams cad kyis kyang gzhil bar mi nus shing /_de'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems de ni 'chi ka'i bar du yang rjes su 'brang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sems de yang 
[\[273a.6\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur nas mi g.yo ste/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir zlog par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lha dang mi 
[\[273a.7\]]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das nas yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs te/_rang gi sa la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_sems can rnams kyang yongs 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]su smin par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyang mnyan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams 
[\[273b.2\]]la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yongs su 'dri bar byed/_yongs su zhu bar byed/_bsnyen bkur byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bstan pa'i bdud kyi las gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khong du chud de/_bdud kyi las 
[\[273b.3\]]skyes shing byung ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bar byed cing de rang gi sa la nam yang nem nur med cing /_the tshom mi za la yid gnyis mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i 
[\[273b.4\]]mtha' la nem nur dang /_yid gnyis dang the tshom mi za zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' la gcig gam gnyis su rnam par mi rtog ste/_de ltar shes pas de tshe brjes nas kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sems mi skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[273b.5\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[273b.6\]]dpa' chen po de srid pa las 'das nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam mam/_'on te mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[273b.7\]]ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi sa la de ltar gnas pa de ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig can 
[\[274a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis 'ongs nas/_'di skad du kye rigs kyi bu khyod tshe 'di nyid la nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig_/khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/_/
[\[274a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang khyod kyis ma thob bo/_/rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan na/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[274a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag kyang khyod la med do zhes zer yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sgra de thos nas mi zhum mi 'gong zhing de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur la yid 
[\[274a.5\]]skrag par mi 'gyur na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to snyam du rig par bya'o/_/de 
[\[274a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de 'di snyam du chos gang dag dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag la yod do snyam du 
[\[274a.7\]]sems pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis 'ongs nas 'di skad ces khyod nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas su gyis shig_/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]zhig bya zhes zer zhing /_rnam grangs du mas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma yin gyi/_kye ma 
[\[274b.2\]]'di ni bdud dam bdud sdig can gyis sprul pa'i mi zhig bdag gi gan du 'ongs nas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dzin du 'jug pa yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[274b.3\]]chen po nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mi mdzad do snyam du sems na/_rab 'byor rnam pa dang rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[274b.4\]]'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde dag klog cing kha ton du byed pa'i drung du bdud dam bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mi zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/_kye rigs kyi bu gang la khyod spyod pa'i mdo sde de dag ni de bzhin 
[\[274b.5\]]gshegs pas bshad pa'i shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde ma yin/_nyan thos kyis bshad pa ma yin gyi bdud kyis bshad pa dang gzhan mu stegs can gyis bshad pa yin te/_de dag ni shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde ma yin no zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[274b.6\]]chen po des kye ma gang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang 'bral bar byed cing byang chub kyi lam las 'dun pa zlog par byed pa 'di ni bdud dam bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mi zhig yin no snyam du rig par byed na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma gang dag yin pa'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag de 
[\[275a.2\]]la yod cing snang ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i ched du bdag gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed la/_chos de ni yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/de ci'i 
[\[275a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba byas na 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par 'gyur/_de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su gzung 
[\[275a.4\]]bar byas par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i phyir ro/_/de la chos gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed la/_chos de ni yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[275a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos thams cad stong zhes ston pa ste/_de la mi blun po kha cig ni 'di ni chos ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/_'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin/_'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba'i lam ma yin no 
[\[275a.6\]]zhes phyir zlog par byed cing phyir rgol te/_rab 'byor dam pa'i chos de'i ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[275a.7\]]rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba de dag gi nang du bdag kyang grangs su chud par bya'o/_/bdag kyang der lung bstan par bya'o/_/chos de'i ched du bdag gi srog kyang yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam du sems so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas dam pa'i chos kyi ched du rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog 
[\[275b.2\]]pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i chos de la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za ste/_chos 
[\[275b.3\]]de la yid gnyis gcig tsam yang mi skyed do/_/chos de thos kyang 'dzin to/_/bzung nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzungs rab 
[\[275b.4\]]tu thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 
[\[275b.5\]]mdo sde rnams chab mi 'tshal bar bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs shin tu thob pa dang /_de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang /_pad ma bkod pa'i gzungs shin tu thob pas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[275b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams thos nas chud za bar mi byed do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 
[\[275b.7\]]kho na thos nas som nyi ma mchis shing the tshom mi 'tshal la/_gong du yang 'dzin par bgyid cing tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid la/_chab mi 'tshal bar bgyid du bas kyi/_nyan thos kyis bshad pa rnams la ma lags sam/_lhas bshad 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa rnams la ma lags sam/_klus bshad pa rnams la ma lags sam/_gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa rnams la ma lags sam/_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci'am lto 'phye chen pos bshad pa'i mdo 
[\[276a.2\]]sde rnams thos nas kyang som nyi ma mchis shing the tshom mi 'tshal la/_gong du yang 'dzin par bgyid lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi skad dang sgra 
[\[276a.3\]]dang /_brda dang /_bsnyad pa dang /_brjod pa thams cad la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za la yid gnyis med pa yin no/_/skad dang /_sgra dang /_brda dang /_bsnyad pa dang /_brjod pa rnams thos ma thag tu 'dzin cing chud za bar mi byed do/_/de dag gi 
[\[276a.4\]]don kyang de kho na nyid du shes te/_gzungs 'di dag shin tu thob pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha 
[\[276a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_phyir mi ldog pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[276a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos de lta bu dang ldan pa gang la gnas nas/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rnam pa ni ji lta bu zhig lags/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[276a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]pa'i sgo gsum dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[276b.2\]]brgyad kyi bar dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam yin te/_rab 'byor de lta mod kyi chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems gang la bslabs nas/_bla 
[\[276b.3\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod snyam mam/_rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[276b.4\]]pos bslab par mi bya ba'i chos 'di ni 'ga' yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos thams cad la ma bslabs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par nus pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[276b.5\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa lags na 'di lta ste/_chos gang 'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 
[\[276b.6\]]'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa ma mchis pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_so so'i skye bo'i chos sam/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos sam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos sam/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos sam/_dgra bcom 
[\[276b.7\]]pa'i chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi bar 'di nas sam/_'dis sam/_'di zhes rig par bgyi ba gang la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams la tha dad du bgyid 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad stong pa ma yin du zin na/_byang chub sems 
[\[277a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[277a.3\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad ces gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na 'di lta ste/_chos gang 'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 
[\[277a.4\]]bar du 'di nas sam 'dis sam/_'di zhes rig par bya ba gang la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams la tha dad du byed ces zer ba ni/_rab 'byor gal te sems can de dag gis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par de ltar shes 
[\[277a.5\]]na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems can de dag gis chos thams cad stong par mi shes pa de'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[277a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_sangs rgyas nas kyang chos rnam par gzhag pa byas nas/_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[277a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang la slob pas thog ma nyid du 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par 'di la chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs pa ni 'ga' yang med de/_'dir bdag gis chos 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la brtags nas chos gang yang ma dmigs na/_ci'i phyir bdag chos rnams la mngon par zhen par bya snyam du brtag par bya'o/_/rab 'byor da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog na/_yang na pha rol tu phyin 
[\[277b.2\]]pa drug gam/_yang na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_yang na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_yang na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_yang na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_yang na dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_yang na rang 
[\[277b.3\]]byang chuba'am/_yang na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chuba'am/_chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ste/_stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen 
[\[277b.4\]]pa med pa'i phyir te/_stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par gnas so/_/bslab pa 
[\[277b.5\]]gang la bslabs shing bslab pa gang la gnas nas/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bar byed de/_'di dag gang la spyod ces bltas na yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa'o/_/yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa la spyod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas 
[\[277b.6\]]kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa las dgrol sla ba dag go snyam nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa de dang bral bar byed do/_/
[\[277b.7\]]bral nas kyang chos drug la 'jug par byed de/_'di skad ces kye sems can dag sbyin pa dag byin cig dang /_khyod longs spyod rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/longs spyod de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po cung zad kyang med do/_/de 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]bzhin du tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgrubs shig_/de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par zhugs shig_/de bzhin du shes rab sgoms shig_/de dag gis rlom sems su yang 
[\[278a.2\]]ma byed cig_/de dag la snying po cung zad kyang med do/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par gyis shig_/des rlom sems su yang ma byed cig_/de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par gyis shig_/des rlom sems su yang ma 
[\[278a.3\]]byed cig_/de bzhin du rang byang chub la gnas par gyis shig_/de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par gyis shig_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gnas par gyis shig_/de dag gis rlom sems su yang ma 
[\[278a.4\]]byed cig_/de dag la snying po cung zad kyang med do zhes ston te/_de sems can de dag la de skad 'doms de skad rjes su ston cing de byang chub kyi lam la spyod de/_chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid 
[\[278a.5\]]kyi phyir gang gis de dag mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang /_gang du de dag mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang /_gang de dag mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med de/_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[278a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la spyod cing /_chos gang la yang mi gnas pa ste/_de yang gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de la yang mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[278a.7\]]tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de la yang mi gnas so/_/de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ste/_de la yang mi 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bsam gtan ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de yang stong zhing /_rnam pa gang dag yin pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang stong pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[278b.2\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug ste de dag la yang mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang 
[\[278b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug ste de dag la yang mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang 'thob ste de la yang mi gnas so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du yang 'thob ste de la yang mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du rang byang chub kyang 'thob ste de la yang mi gnas 
[\[278b.4\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir te/_'bras bu de dag ngo bo nyid kyis med pa dang /_de gang la gnas pa de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin par mi byed pa'o/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par mi bya ba dag gis de 
[\[278b.5\]]la gnas par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o snyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/
[\[278b.6\]]chos de dag kyang 'di nyid la yod do snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ma gtogs par nam yang sems gang yang rung ba ma bskyed 
[\[278b.7\]]do/_/sa dang po nas bzung ste sa bcu pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig go/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i yid kyis lus sam ngag gam/_yid kyis rnam pa gang dang gang 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]gnon pa ni thams cad du yang byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig pa ste/_byang chub kyi sems de nyid la gnas nas/_byang chub kyi lam la rnam par g.yeng ba mi skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[279a.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci lam skyes pas byang chub 'thob lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_ci lam ma skyes pas byang chub 'thob 
[\[279a.3\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na ci lam skyes pa yang ma lags/_ma skyes pa yang ma lags pas byang chub 'thob lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[279a.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na gang gis byang chub 'thob lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ni lam gyis kyang mi 'thob la/_lam ma yin pas kyang mi 'thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub nyid lam yin la/_lam nyid 
[\[279a.5\]]byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub nyid lam lags la/_lam nyid byang chub lags na/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub de thob pa nyid lags na/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[279a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yang dang yang bstan pa mdzad/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji 
[\[279a.7\]]snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub 'thob bam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid kyang byang chub lags la/_byang chub nyid kyang sangs rgyas lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad ces gal te byang chub nyid lam yin la/_lam nyid kyang byang chub yin na/_byang chub sems dpas byang chub thob pa nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas/_
[\[279b.2\]]de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su 
[\[279b.3\]]rdzogs par byas nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_sangs rgyas nas bar der byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ston 
[\[279b.4\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[279b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_srid pa tha ma'i bar du gzhan dag gi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag 
[\[279b.6\]]par byed do/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len gang lags/_ngag gi gnas ngan len gang lags/_yid kyi gnas ngan len gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par 
[\[279b.7\]]len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa de ni lus kyi gnas ngan len yin no/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa gang yin pa de ni ngag gi gnas ngan len yin no/_/brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba de ni yid kyi gnas ngan len yin no//_//
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po sum cu gsum pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma dag pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len yin no/_/ser 
[\[280a.2\]]sna'i sems gang yin pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang /_'khrug pa'i sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems gang yin pa de ni yid kyi gnas ngan len yin no/_/
[\[280a.3\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral ba'i sems gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[280a.4\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang bral ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yin no/_/rab 
[\[280a.5\]]'byor gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan 
[\[280a.6\]]len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin du mig gi 'du shes dang /_rna ba dang /_sna 
[\[280a.7\]]dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'du shes dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang mig gi khams kyi 'du shes dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi 'du shes dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang /_gzugs kyi khams 
[\[280b.2\]]kyi 'du shes dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang /_skyes pa'i 'du shes dang /_bud med kyi 'du shes dang /_khye'u'i 'du shes dang /_bu mo'i 'du shes dang /_dge ba'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'du shes 
[\[280b.3\]]dang /_lung du bstan pa'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_'jig rten las 
[\[280b.4\]]'das pa'i chos kyi 'du shes dang /_'dus byas kyi chos kyi 'du shes dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'du shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan 
[\[280b.5\]]len yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/_gnas ngan len de dag thams cad yongs su spangs nas/_'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa 
[\[280b.6\]]rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag 'dod pa rnams la ni mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed do/_/gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa yang dag 
[\[280b.7\]]par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/'dzud do/_/'god do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su bzlums nas dang ba'i yid kyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rab 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang nas/_dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar 'bul te/_phul nas kyang bdag gi 
[\[281a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur cig ces dga' ba'i yid kyis de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la 
[\[281a.3\]]lha dang mi'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis mchod de/_mchod nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha'i rol mo'i sgra rtag tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su sngo bar 
[\[281a.4\]]byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha'i spos rnams kyis yongs su bkang nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams 
[\[281a.5\]]la rtag tu dbul ba phul te/_phul nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der lha'i spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rab 
[\[281a.6\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos 
[\[281a.7\]]rnams la zas ro brgya dang ldan pa 'bul bar byed cing /_phul nas kyang bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa dang /_sems can thams cad lha'i zhal zas 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ro brgya dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[281b.2\]]mchod rten rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams la lha'i dang /_mi'i byug pa rnams 'bul bar byed de/_phul nas kyang bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[281b.3\]]der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_sems can thams cad lha'i byug pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[281b.4\]]chen po yid las byung ba/_brnag pas bskyed pa/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos 
[\[281b.5\]]rnams la 'bul bar byed de/_phul nas kyang bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag yid las byung 
[\[281b.6\]]ba/_brnag pas bskyed pa yid du 'ong bar gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis kyang bsam gtan 
[\[281b.7\]]dang po la snyoms par 'jug par bya/_sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/_gzud par bya/_dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]'jug par bya/_sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya/_gzud par bya/_dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[282a.2\]]bzhi'i bar dag la gzud par bya/_dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gzud par bya/_dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[282a.3\]]bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ci nas kyang sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[282a.4\]]dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang mi 'bral bar bya'o snyam du sems te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de byang chub 
[\[282a.5\]]de la spyod pas de'i bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bdag kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/'dzud do/_/'god 
[\[282a.6\]]do/_/de sems can de dag la rang gi lus gzugs bzang ba yang ston to/_/de'i rgyu yang brjod do/_/sems can de dag gis mthong nas 'dod pa skyed de/_de 'dra ba kho na'i rgyu'i spyod pa la 'jug cing /_sems can de dag 'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyi stobs yongs 
[\[282a.7\]]su bzung bas mthar gyis de 'dra ba'i lus gzugs bzang ba mngon par 'grub bo/_/des sems can gang dag yongs su smin par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang de nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]med pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang na nang gi sgra mid pa dang /_mchu dang /_so dang /_lce dang /_rkan la sogs pa'i 'bad pas bskyed pa rnams sam/_yang na phyi rol gyi sgra rlung gis bskyod pa stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra 
[\[282b.2\]]'byung ba ji ltar chos de dag ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa dang /_chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ste/_gang gi phyir stong pa de'i phyir de dag la mtshan ma med do/_/gang la mtshan ma med pa de la smon pa med de/_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang 
[\[282b.3\]]rung /_nyal yang rung /_'chag kyang rung /_nyin mtshan du chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'byung ba ma gtogs par de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag par ma gyur pa gang na/_ngan song gsum gdags pa yod pa dang /_lta bar gyur pa rnams sam/_'dod 
[\[282b.4\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams sam/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag gam/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa rnams gdags pa yod pa dang /_de bzhin du ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin 
[\[282b.5\]]pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas dkris pa rnams dang /_'bras bu gdags pa yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_
[\[282b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub thob nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de'i bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming 
[\[282b.7\]]thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang gis sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des chos ston pa na chos 'di ni chos ma yin no zhes sems can gang yang chos de la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos gang yang med par sems can de dag gis de bzhin du shes pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[283a.2\]]dag par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/_sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dag dang /_gang 
[\[283a.3\]]dag dam pa'i chos thos na/_lta ba'i rnam pa gang dag gis zhum par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_bdag tu lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_'di lta ste/_rtag pa dang /_chad pa gnyis kyi bar la gnas te/_yod do zhes bdag gis kyang log par 'dzin pa bzung 
[\[283a.4\]]la/_gzhan dag kyang log par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dag la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes shing /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[283a.5\]]rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos su smra zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su spangs nas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de 
[\[283a.6\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la phan gdags pa'i phyir sems can dmyal ba der song nas/_sems can de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang phral nas/_de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas shi 'phos te mi rnams 
[\[283a.7\]]dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/der skyes pa rnams ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs la 'god par byed de/_ci nas kyang yang ngan song rnams su mi ltung zhing de nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su 'god par byed de/_
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der sems can de dag der skyes nas 'di lta ste/_'jig rten pa rnams sam/_'jig rten las 'das pa rnams sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam/_
[\[283b.2\]]zag pa med pa rnams sam/_'dus byas rnams sam/_'dus ma byas rnams sam/_chos gang la yang yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba nas/_sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i bar du de ltar 
[\[283b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa nyid kyi tshogs la nges pa lags sam/_
[\[283b.4\]]'on te nyan thos kyi tshogs la nges pa lags sam/_'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs la nges pa lags sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshogs gang la nges pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[283b.5\]]dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi tshogs la nges pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs la nges pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs la nges pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun 
[\[283b.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das ci dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa zhes bgyi'am/_'on te srid pa tha ma pa nges pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[283b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang nges pa yin no/_/phyir mi ldog pa dang srid pa tha ma pa yang nges pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]bar 'gyur lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_brgyad pa'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 
[\[284a.2\]]'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[284a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dang po sems bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_de bzhin du tshul khrims srung /_bzod pa sgrub/_dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom/_bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug_/shes rab sgom zhing 
[\[284a.4\]]mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas gnas pa de/_ngan song du skye ba'am/_lha tshe ring po'i nang du skye ba'i gnas med do/_/gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa mtha' 'khob pa rnams kyi nang du'am/_kla klo'i mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba'am/_log par lta ba'i 
[\[284a.5\]]khyim rnams sam/_mtha' 'khob pa'i mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba'am/_'khor bzhi po 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi 'khor ram/_dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba der skye bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[284a.6\]]ni gnas med do/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra'am/_chos kyi sgra'am/_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa'am/_bya ba med pa dang lta ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur ba der skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de/_rab 'byor dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[284a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa de ni gnas med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma dang ldan pa lags na/_ci'i slad du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi 
[\[284b.2\]]skyes pa'i rabs de dag 'khor bzhi po dag gi mdun du bstan pa mdzad/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu de dag ni slad rol du gyur pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[284b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dge ba'i las kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/_lus gang gis don byed nus pa'i lus de sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[284b.4\]]sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pa dang /_gsad pa gang dag yin pa'i gan du 'gro zhing /_de dag dang bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_gsad pa de dag 
[\[284b.5\]]la rnam par 'tshe bar yang mi byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la cig yod dam/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa ni snying rje chen 
[\[284b.6\]]po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_sems can gyi don gyi phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i skyon rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[284b.7\]]'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos gang dag la gnas nas/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i lus rnams yongs su 'dzin lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba de dag gang zhe na/_rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin pas/_rab 
[\[285a.2\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po sems bskyed pa kho na nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba gang yang med de/_gang ma rdzogs par de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[285a.3\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[285a.4\]]par bya ba la bslab par bya'o/_/de de la bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di 
[\[285a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa nas/_'phags pa'i ye shes kyi bar dang ldan pa ji ltar ngan song rnams su skye lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[285a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dang /_zag pa med pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/btsun 
[\[285a.7\]]pa bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags pa dang /_zag pa mi mnga' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]srog chags kyi lus zhig mngon par sprul te mngon par sprul nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[285b.2\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam zag pa med pa'i ye shes 
[\[285b.3\]]dang ldan pa yang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lus gang gis 'gro ba lnga po dag tu ci rigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_dper na dgra bcom 
[\[285b.4\]]pas dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhig mngon par sprul te/_mngon par sprul nas dgra bcom pa'i las rnams byed du bcug na/_las de dag gis 'khor bzhi po dag dga' ba skyed dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bcom 
[\[285b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang lus gang gis sems can rnams kyi don spyod pa byed pa'i lus de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/_lus 
[\[285b.6\]]yongs su bzung ba des sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar yang mi 'gyur la/_de dang mthun pa'i skyon gyis kyang mi gos so/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du 
[\[285b.7\]]glang po che'i gzugs ston tam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs ston tam/_srog chags kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang ston na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des bstan pa de glang po cher 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]rta'am/_glang ngam/_srog chags kyi rnam pa gzhan dag tu 'gyur snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[286a.2\]]chen po 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i lus de lta bu bsams bzhin du ston kyang /_de dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas kyang mi gos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[286a.3\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa 'di ltar lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don bgyid rngo thogs pa'i lus de dang de yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs la 
[\[286a.4\]]mkhas pa chen po lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la gnas nas/_thabs la mkhas pa 'di lta bu bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[286a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_thabs la mkhas pa 'di lta bu 'di byed de/_thabs la mkhas pa des phyogs bcu dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song nas/_sems can de dag gi don byed kyang de dag la 'dod pa mi skyed do/_/
[\[286a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang 'dod par byed pa'am/_gang la 'dod par byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid ni 'dod par mi 
[\[286a.7\]]byed cing stong pa nyid la 'dod par byed pa su yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yin te/_de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/_sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu 
[\[286b.2\]]g.yos so/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg go/_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/shar phyogs mtho na/_nub phyogs dma'o/_/nub phyogs mtho na/_shar phyogs dma'o/_/lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o/_/byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o/_/dbus mtho 
[\[286b.3\]]na mtha' dma'o/_/mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o/_/steng gi bar snang la yang lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas lha'i sil snyan bsgrags so/_/lha bye ba dag gis kyang lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po'i me tog gi char 
[\[286b.4\]]chen po phab bo/_/'di lta ste/_long ba rnams kyis mig rnyed pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyis thos pa rnyed pa dang /_smyon pa rnams kyis dran pa rnyed pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams kyis mnyam par gzhag pa rnyed pa dang /_sil snyan bye ba 
[\[286b.5\]]phrag 'bum yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung bar gyur te/_rmad du byung ba'i chos du ma 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/lha dang mi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sems 
[\[286b.6\]]can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab snyed dag ni 'di lta ste/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag ste/_chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni mi skye ba'i chos la 
[\[286b.7\]]bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/sems can du ma ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_sa thob par gyur to/_/sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag ni ngan song gsum po dag nas shi 'phos nas/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/thams 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_rab 'byor gyis zhus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid tshig dang yi ge'i 'bru lhag chad med pa 'di dag gis ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung 
[\[287a.2\]]gi bye ma snyed dag phyogs bcu kun tu mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang a la la sems can dpag tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med pa dag gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa 'di ni 'jig rten du sangs 
[\[287a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa yin no/_/zhes de lta bu'i sgra de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su byung bar gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mngon par byang 
[\[287a.4\]]chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi ris na sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[287a.5\]]pa zab mo bshad pa 'di la dad pa mi skyed/_dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa mi skyed cing /_lus dang sems kyis kyang tshogs pa stsol bar mi bgyid la/_'khor de nas kyang mchi bar bgyid cing /_gong du yang spong la 
[\[287a.6\]]spong bar bgyid pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sems can gyi ris na sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa 'di la dad pa mi skyed cing /_dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_
[\[287a.7\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa mi skyed la/_lus dang sems kyis tshogs pa sbyin par mi byed cing 'khor de nas 'gro bar byed pa de ni yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]song bar gyur la/_da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa na 'gro bar byed cing /_lus dang sems kyis kyang tshogs pa sbyin par mi byed de/_shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las sogs par byed do/_/de shes rab 'chal 
[\[287b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed de/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bkag pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[287b.3\]]rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bkag par 'gyur ro/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las sogs so/_/de chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa 
[\[287b.4\]]des lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo 'bum phrag mang po dang /_lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba rnams su btso bar 'gyur ro/_/de sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/mes 'jig 
[\[287b.5\]]pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mes 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu sems can dmyal ba chen por 'byung bar 'gyur te/_der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo 'bum phrag mang 
[\[287b.6\]]po dang /_lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por sreg par 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/_der song nas kyang yang mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mes 'jig pa byung 
[\[287b.7\]]nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu sems can dmyal ba chen por 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de der skye bar 'gyur te/_der yang lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po'i bar du sreg par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas kyang sems can 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por song nas kyang yang mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_mes 'jig pa byung nas kyang las kyi rlung gis shar phyogs su phangs par 'gyur zhing 
[\[288a.2\]]phyogs mtshams kyi bar du yang phangs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas der skyes nas sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_mes 'jig pa byung nas de nas kyang shi 'phos te/_
[\[288a.3\]]chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des yang skye bar 'gyur zhing /_yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/_der yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang 
[\[288a.4\]]por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du mes 'jig pa 'byung ba de srid du sems can dmyal ba ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/mes 'jig pa byung nas kyang de nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar 'gyur te/_phyogs 
[\[288a.5\]]bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ba de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur
