[\[288a.6\]]te/_de der skyes nas kyang lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/der gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal zad par byas nas/_'di lta ste/_dmus long gi khyim rnams su'am/_gdol pa'i khyim 
[\[288a.7\]]rnams su'am/_g.yung po'i khyim rnams su mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang long ba'am/_zhar ba'am/_sgur po'am/_lce med pa'am/_lag pa med pa'am/_rkang pa med pa'am/_rna ba med pa'am/_mdze can 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]nam/_sha bkra can nam/_yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag par 'gyur ba der rtag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[288b.2\]]de ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_yang dag par blangs pa rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su tshang ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b.3\]]mtshams ma mchis pa ni lnga lags la/_'di lta ste/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa 'di ni drug par gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang zag de ni mchog tu gyur pa zhes mi bya'i/_shin 
[\[288b.4\]]tu smad pa zhes bya'o/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad cing ston pa na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zlog par sems shing /_'di skad ces 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/_'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[288b.5\]]pas gsungs pa ma yin gyis/_khyed dang bdag cag gis de la bslab par mi bya'o zhes kyang zer zhing /_bdag nyid kyis kyang spong bar byed/_sems can mang po dag kyang de las 'byed par byed de/_de rang gi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod par byed de/_gzhan gyi 
[\[288b.6\]]sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod par bya bar sems te/_de rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug can du byas nas/_gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug can du bya bar sems te/_bdag nyid kyang mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba las nyams par gyur la/_gzhan dag kyang mtho ris 
[\[288b.7\]]dang thar pa'i lam dag las nyams par bya bar sems/_bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid mi shes shing khong du mi chud de/_spang bar bya bar sems la/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du 'dzin du 'jug par byed na/_kun dga' bo nga ni gang 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]zag de lta bu dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sgrogs par yang rjes su yi mi rang zhing nga ni de dag thos par yang mngon par mi dga' na mthong ba lta ci smos te/_lhan cig gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' 
[\[289a.2\]]bo gang zag de lta bu dag ni dam pa'i chos sun par byed pa yin te/_shing rul lta bu dang /_nag po'i phyogs pa dag yin no/_/kun dga' bo gang dag gang zag de lta bu dag mnyan par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang mi tshul ba'i phongs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang la la shes 
[\[289a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sun par byed pa'i gang zag de ni mthar thug pa yin par khong du chud par bya ste/_dam pa'i chos sun par byed pa'i skyon chags pa de ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i gang zag yin no/_/
[\[289a.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos sun par bgyid pa'i gang zag ngan song du skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dam pa'i chos sun par byed pa'i 
[\[289a.5\]]gang zag ngan song du skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad brjod pa zhog shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dam pa'i chos sun par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad thos na/_kha nas khrag skyug pa'am/_'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_'chi ba la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur te/_
[\[289a.6\]]de thos nas mya ngan gyi zug rngu snying la zug pa dang /_skam pa dang rnyis par gyur na mi rung zhes/_dam pa'i chos sun par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad 'di lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la skabs dbye ba ma mdzad do/_/de 
[\[289a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos sun par bgyid pa ngan song du skyes pa'i lus ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur zhing /_lus ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur lags/_bcom 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des gang zag de de ltar yun ring por sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du yun ring por dud 'gro rnams dang /_de 
[\[289b.2\]]bzhin du yun ring por gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur bas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji skad bka' stsal pa de de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rigs 
[\[289b.3\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dkar po'i rang bzhin can gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rten lags te/_bdag kyang ngan song rnams su 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring por myong na mi rung zhes de srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[289b.4\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can lus kyi las bsdams shing ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las bsdams pas dam pa'i chos spong bar 
[\[289b.5\]]bgyid pa dang /_dam pa'i chos sun par bgyid pa'i gang zag gis bstan pa de thos na bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal dag myong bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong /_dam pa'i chos kyang 
[\[289b.6\]]mi thos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun yang mi mthong /_de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yang mi skye la/_mi dbul por 'gyur ba'am/_dman pa'i khyim 'di lta ste/_gdol pa'i 
[\[289b.7\]]khyim rnams sam/_g.yung po'i khyim rnams sam/_dmus long ngam/_zhar ba'am/_yan lag ma tshang ba'i bar du gyur na mi rung zhes de lta bu'i tshul can du bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ngag gi las mi bzad pa la mngon par zhen te bgyis shing bsags 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]pas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bgyis shing bsags par 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ngag gi las mi bzad pa la mngon par zhen te/_byas shing bsags pas dam pa'i chos 
[\[290a.2\]]kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_kun dga' bo mi gti mug can gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la rab tu byung nas tshogs pa'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sun dbyung bar bya 
[\[290a.3\]]bar sems/_bzlog par bya bar sems na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sun phyung ba dang /_bzlog pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sun phyung ba dang /_bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sun phyung bas 'das pa dang /_ma 
[\[290a.4\]]'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sun phyung ba dang /_bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzlog pas/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[290a.5\]]bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos bzlog pas dge 'dun bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun bzlog pas 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bzlog pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bzlog 
[\[290a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzlog pas/_bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po dpag tu med/_grangs med tshad med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[290a.7\]]bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po dpag tu med/_grangs med/_tshad med pa yongs su bzung bas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba dpag tu med/_grangs med/_tshad 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]med pa dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi gti mug can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar bgyid 
[\[290b.2\]]pa des rnam pa du zhig gis spong bar bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mi gti mug can de rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bzhi gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[290b.3\]]stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos zab mo 'di la yid mi ches shing mi mos la/_chos de la dad pa mi 'thob pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba dang /_phung po lnga la mngon par zhen cing mi brtson pa dang /_bdag la stod cing gzhan la 
[\[290b.4\]]smod pa ste/_kun dga' bo rnam pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i mi gti mug can de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[290b.5\]]'di ltar chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las de lta bu dang ldan na smas shing nyams par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpas ngag gi las bsdam par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/
[\[290b.6\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos la/_thos nas kyang dad pa 
[\[290b.7\]]dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin/_'chang /_klog/_kun chub par byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed/_yi ger 'dri 
[\[291a.2\]]zhing yi ger 'drir 'jug par byed la/_gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul gsum la bzhugs te/_sems can rnams la chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su 
[\[291a.3\]]bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i sde dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i sde de dag thams cad 'dzin/_'chang /_klog/_
[\[291a.4\]]kun chub par byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa nas/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong 
[\[291a.5\]]gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[291a.6\]]snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[291a.7\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams cho 'phrul gsum po dag la bzhugs nas sems can rnams la 'di lta ste/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung du bstan 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i sde dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i sde rnams kyi chos 
[\[291b.2\]]ston la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan yang gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs shing bzung ba/_kun chub par byas shing blags la/_gzhan dag la yang chos ston te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rgya 
[\[291b.3\]]cher yang dag par ston na/_de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po mtshungs par skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[291b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi cho 'phrul gsum po dag kyang 'di las byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_
[\[291b.5\]]lung du bstan pa'i sde nas/_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar yang 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin 
[\[291b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis me tog nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rim 
[\[291b.7\]]gro byas/_mchod pa byas pa dang /_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir bcug ste/_glegs bam du byas pa la me tog nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byas/_
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]bla mar byas/_rim gro byas/_mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams de ni mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[292a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di len cing 'dzin la/_kun chub par 
[\[292a.3\]]byed cing klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de ni sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi 'gro ba dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro bar shes par 
[\[292a.4\]]bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi sar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas 
[\[292a.5\]]par rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /_nad thams cad 'jig par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs 
[\[292a.6\]]kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye 
[\[292a.7\]]ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gro byed/_mchod pa byed pa de ni 'jigs pa ga las kyang mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang 'di las nges par byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[292b.2\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang 'di las byung ba yin la/_kun dga' bo 'di las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[292b.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/_gzhan gyi grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_rgyal 
[\[292b.4\]]po'i pho brang 'khor gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_'di nyid yi ger bris te glegs bam du byas pa la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri 
[\[292b.5\]]mor byed pa'i grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der mi'am/_mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag la theg pa gang yang 
[\[292b.6\]]rung bas rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas pas na don che ba 
[\[292b.7\]]yin no/_/kun dga' bo gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der sangs rgyas byung bar shes par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dper na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig yod la/_nor bu rin po che de yang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]te/_gang du las bya ba der nor bu rin po che de bzhag par gyur pa der mi glags lta bas glags mi rnyed do/_/gang na skyes pa'am/_bud med mi ma yin pas zin par gyur pa der nor bu rin po che de bzhag na/_mi ma yin pa de nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid 
[\[293a.2\]]mi bzod pas/_de nas bdag nyid myur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mkhris pas tshig pa'i nad pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de bzhag na mkhris pa de rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du skyes pa'am/_bud med rlung gis phog pa'am/_bad kan nam/_'dus 
[\[293a.3\]]pa'i nad kyis thebs pa'i skyes pa'am/_bud med de'i lus la nor bu rin po che de bzhag na reg ma thag tu nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid kyis nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang nor bu rin po che de ni mtshan mo snang bar byed do/_/tsha ba'i dus na nor bu rin po che de phyogs gang du 
[\[293a.4\]]bzhag pa'i phyogs der bsil bar byed do/_/grang ba'i dus nas phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i phyogs der dro bar byed do/_/sa phyogs gang na/_sbrul gdug pa'am/_sdig pa yod la skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la zhig sbrul gdug 
[\[293a.5\]]pas zin par gyur na/_de la la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che de bstan na/_de mthong ma thag tu dug de med par 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan de dag dang ldan no/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang skyes pa'am/_bud med gang gi lus la 
[\[293a.6\]]'bras dang /_chu bur byung ba'am/_mig nad dam/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_mgul nad byung na/_skyes pa'am/_bud med de'i lus la nor bu rin po che de bzhag na/_de mthong ma thag tu nad de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzing gi chu gang du 
[\[293a.7\]]nor bu rin po che de bcug na/_chu de thams cad yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang /_de ras sngon po'am/_ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po'am/_btsod ka'am/_shel lam/_dmar ser ram/_ser skyas dkris te/_chur bcug na chu de thams cad kha 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]dog sngon por 'gyur ba nas/_kha dog ser skya'i bar du kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo chu gang rnyog pa can du gyur pa der nor bu rin po che de bcug na dang bar 'gyur te/_nor bu rin po che de yon tan de dag dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan pa yin no/_/kun dga' 
[\[293b.2\]]bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba 'di yang yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing /_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/_bam po sum cu 
[\[293b.3\]]bzhi pa tha ma/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de lha rnams la mchis sam/_'on te mi rnams la mchis/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[293b.4\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo nor bu rin po che de ni lha rnams la yang yod/_nor bu rin po che de ni 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yang yod de/_'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yod pa'i 
[\[293b.5\]]nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan chung ngo /_/lha yul pa'i ni yon tan tshad med do/_/lha yul pa'i nor bu rin po che de za ma tog gang gi nang na bcug pa'i za ma tog de yang /_de'i yon tan can du gyur te/_gang la la zhig gis za ma tog de la reg na de yang yon tan 
[\[293b.6\]]de dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha yul pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te/_gang du bzhag pa der gnod pa ci yang mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/nor bu rin po 
[\[293b.7\]]che de'i yon tan rnams ji lta bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi yon tan yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid nas 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de dang 'dra'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[294a.2\]]dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thams cad mkhyen pa zhes brjod de/_lha dang mi dang lha ma 
[\[294a.3\]]yin gyi 'jig rten na bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya zhing /_rim gro byed/_mchod pa byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi snod yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[294a.4\]]'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa chen po'i snod yin pa'i phyir mchod pa brnyes so/_/de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa 
[\[294a.5\]]dang /_de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_gdeg pa med pa dang /_gzhag pa med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_'ong ba 
[\[294a.6\]]med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi snod yin pa'i phyir mchod pa brnyes so/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[294a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa 'bum mam/_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'am/_
[\[294b.2\]]bskal pa stong phrag du ma'am/_bskal pa 'bum phrag du ma'am/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba'am/_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag 
[\[294b.3\]]dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod pa byed pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed 
[\[294b.4\]]pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa nas glegs bam du byas pa la 'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[294b.5\]]dang /_ba dan dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gro byed/_mchod pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su bzung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[294b.6\]]las yongs su bzung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma'i gan na mchog ces bya'o/_/gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/rab mchog ces bya'o/_/bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de 
[\[294b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa las yongs su bzung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba ni lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar byed de/_'khor ba na 'khor bar byed cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha 
[\[295a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar 
[\[295a.3\]]du yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur zhing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das 
[\[295a.4\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang 'thob ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /_lus gang gis 
[\[295a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad kyis sam/_yang na khams kyi rgyal por gyur pas sam/_yang na rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po 
[\[295a.6\]]lta bur gyur pas sam/_yang na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur pas sam/_yang na brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis sam/_yang na tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis sam/_yang na rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur 
[\[295a.7\]]ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gro byed/_mchod pa byed na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu bsags par 'gyur/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bzung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gshegs pa rnams la bsti stang byas par 'gyur/_bla mar byas par 'gyur/_rim gro byas par 'gyur/_mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[295b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag la gzugs kyi sku dang /_chos kyi skur lta bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya 
[\[295b.3\]]cher yang dag par bstan par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la byas te/_des na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[295b.4\]]dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub 
[\[295b.5\]]par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[295b.6\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi nyan thos su gyur pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob bo/_de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[295b.7\]]du rjes su thob bo/_/gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de dag gi nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 
[\[296a.2\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/nyan thos de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su 'thob bo/_/
[\[296a.3\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na da ltar rang sangs rgyas gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[296a.4\]]ltar theg pa gsum po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir te/_de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bstan to/_/de bzhin du skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba 
[\[296a.5\]]med pa'i tshul dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /_gdeg pa med pa dang /_gzhag pa med pa'i tshul dang /_gzung ba med pa dang /_gtang ba med pa'i tshul dang /_de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi 
[\[296a.6\]]tshul gyis bstan gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/_pha rol ma yin/_thang ma yin/_gshong ma yin/_phya le ma yin/_phya le ma yin pa ma yin/_mtshan ma ma yin/_mtshan 
[\[296a.7\]]ma med pa ma yin/_'jig rten pa ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/_'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_dge ba ma yin/_mi dge ba ma yin/_lung du bstan pa ma yin/_lung du ma bstan pa ma yin/_'das pa ma yin/_ma 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[296b.2\]]tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la spyod lags sam/_pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la yang spyod lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod de/_de yang mi 
[\[296b.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod la/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs/_sbyin bdag kyang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod la/_tshul 
[\[296b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la yang spyad la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs/_shes rab 
[\[296b.5\]]dang ldan pa dang /_shes rab 'chal pa yang mi dmigs so/_/'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[296b.6\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha 
[\[296b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgrub pa rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]rtsom pa rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon du 'gro 
[\[297a.2\]]ba ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[297a.3\]]gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/kun dga' bo dper na 'dzam bu gling gi shing ljon pa lo ma tha dad pa/_me tog tha dad pa/_'bras bu tha dad pa rnams kyi grib 
[\[297a.4\]]ma ni/_grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par bye brag gam/_tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs so/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos 
[\[297a.5\]]pa rnams la yang bye brag gam/_tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan mtha' 
[\[297a.6\]]yas pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing /_yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan 
[\[297a.7\]]pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir stsal nas/_glegs bam du bgyis sam/_'chang ngam/_klog 
[\[297b.2\]]gam/_de bzhin nyid la 'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du bgyid/_
[\[297b.3\]]bla mar bgyid/_ri mo bgyid/_mchod par bgyid la/_gong du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 
[\[297b.4\]]'drir stsal nas/_glegs bam du bgyis te/_gzhan dag la stsal na/_'di gnyis gang bsod nams ches mang du skyed lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun 
[\[297b.5\]]dga' bo de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel rnams la rtag par rgyun du me tog 
[\[297b.6\]]nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mo byed/_mchod pa byed pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam zhig gzhan dag la 
[\[297b.7\]]bgo bsha' byas te byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de blangs te/_me tog nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mo byed/_mchod 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]pa byed pa de gnyis gang bsod nams mang du skyed snyam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[298a.2\]]gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal pa de nyid ches bsod nams mang du skyed lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang 
[\[298a.3\]]'di gzigs nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig pa mdzad do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la 
[\[298a.4\]]mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de mthar thug par mi 'gyur gyi/_sdug bsngal thams cad mthar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 
[\[298a.5\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir bcug nas/_glegs 
[\[298a.6\]]bam du byas te/_me tog nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mo byed/_mchod pa byed pa bas gzhan gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir bcug 
[\[298a.7\]]ste/_chos la dga' bas gzhan dag la byin na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de nyid ches mang du skyed do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa des ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya/_gzung bar bya/_
[\[298b.2\]]bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang nges par 'byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[298b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab 
[\[298b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog sna tshogs nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[298b.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan/_bshad/_rnam par phye/_gsal bar byas/_yang dag par rab tu bstan te/_'di skad ces tshur shog_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[298b.6\]]khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang brjod na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[298b.7\]]bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can gang dag yin pa de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom 
[\[299a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di dag gzhan dag la rnam grangs 'dis rjod cing ston la/_gsal bar byed cing rnam par 'byed de/_yang dag par 
[\[299a.3\]]rab tu ston la de la 'di skad ces kye tshur shog_/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/lhogs shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan 
[\[299a.4\]]tan du gyis shig ces kyang brjod na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo rgyun du zhugs pa rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams 
[\[299a.5\]]lta yang zhog_/de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i sems can rnams lta yang zhog_/stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta yang zhog_/stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta'ang zhog_/kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi 
[\[299a.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta'ang zhog la/_kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs 
[\[299a.7\]]pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po 'di gzhan dag la rjod cing ston la/_gsal bar byed cing rnam par 'byed de/_yang dag par rab 
[\[299b.2\]]tu ston na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag gi bsod nams pas ches mang du skyed de/_de ni ston pa'am/_ston pa gang yang rung ba'am/_bla ma'i gnas lta bu'am/_tshangs pa mtshungs 
[\[299b.3\]]par spyod pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing /_gang dag ma 'ongs pa na 
[\[299b.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[299b.5\]]sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[299b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_gzhan mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas byung la/_da ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[299b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas gyur pa yin/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob/_'thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyang rang byang chub thob 'thob par 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams 
[\[300a.2\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa la/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs nas/_ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis 
[\[300a.3\]]bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang /_ri mor bya bar 'dod pa dang /_mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir bcug nas glegs bam du byas te/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs nas/_
[\[300a.4\]]ba dan gyi bar dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod pa bya'o/_/don gyi dbang 'di mthong ba nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/_bdag gis su 
[\[300a.5\]]la bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod pa bya zhing brten te gnas par bya snyam na/_kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas 
[\[300a.6\]]nga dang 'dra ba'am/_lhag pa yang ma mthong nas/_de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_ngas chos zhi ba gya nom pa gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod pa bya zhing brten te gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/
[\[300a.7\]]kun dga' bo chos de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid de/_kun dga' bo nga da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing brten te gnas na/_kun dga' bo 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[300b.2\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag 
[\[300b.3\]]par zhugs pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba 
[\[300b.4\]]dang /_mchod pa bya ba lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams las ni de bzhin gshegs pa da gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byung zhing /_
[\[300b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams byung ba'i phyir te/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis 
[\[300b.6\]]gang la bslabs na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[300b.7\]]phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mo bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de 
[\[301a.2\]]las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[301a.3\]]don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher rjod cing ston la rnam par 'byed de/_gsal bar byed cing yang dag par rab tu ston la/_'di skad ces tshur shog_/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs 
[\[301a.4\]]shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang rjod na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo rgyun du zhugs pa 
[\[301a.5\]]rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[301a.6\]]'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bkod na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/btsun 
[\[301a.7\]]pa bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher rjod cing 'chad pa nas/_yang dag 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]par rab tu ston pa'i bar du byed cing 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig ces bya ba nas/_ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang brjod pa'i bar du byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod 
[\[301b.2\]]nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo rang sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can rnams la yang sbyar bar 
[\[301b.3\]]bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang /_gang zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[301b.4\]]phyin pa don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing 'chad la/_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/_yang dag par ston la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slobs shig_/gang 
[\[301b.5\]]gi tshe 'di la slob pa de'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod na/_de ni bsod nams mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[301b.6\]]dpa' rnams nas sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji snyed pa dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la yang sbyar 
[\[301b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[302a.2\]]kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher rjod pa nas yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad ces tshur shog_/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig ces bya ba nas/_ji skad 
[\[302a.3\]]bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob pa de'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur zhing /_de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[302a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de dang /_de 
[\[302a.5\]]bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rigs kyi 
[\[302a.6\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du bcug ste/_de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di nyid rjod pa nas/_
[\[302a.7\]]yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig ces bya ba nas/_ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan gyis shig_/gang gi tshe khyod kyis ji skad bstan 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byas pa de'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro 
[\[302b.2\]]zhes rjod pa bas/_gang zhig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa nas/_yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i bar du byed la/_de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig ces bya ba 
[\[302b.3\]]nas/_ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig_/nan tan byas na khyod rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[302b.4\]]de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa dang /_gling bzhi pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[302b.5\]]byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po 'di ston pa pas ni gzhan gang zhig 'di skad ces bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[302b.6\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya zhing /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag tu ltung ba'i sems can rnams gdon par bya'o zhes zer ba de la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po 
[\[302b.7\]]tshig 'bru bzang po 'di ston na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni mtshar cig chos bstan mi dgos te/_de dag rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]chub la gzhol zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog pa dag yin la/_'di ni 'khor ba la yid byung zhing snying rje chen po la 'jug pas yongs su gzir ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[303a.2\]]kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal 
[\[303a.3\]]lags te/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal 
[\[303a.4\]]lags so/_/de bzhin du/_nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[303a.5\]]bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[303a.6\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so/_/de lta de ltar zas dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis sman gdags 'tshal lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[303a.7\]]de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang /_zang zing gis bsdu bas sman 'dogs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams ches mang du skyed kyi/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag ni de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de ni bsod nams ches mang du skyed snyam 
[\[303b.2\]]bgyid pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams la spro ba bskyed pa ni legs so legs 
[\[303b.3\]]so/_/'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/chos kyis bsdu ba dang /_zang zing gis 
[\[303b.4\]]bsdu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags par bya zhing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams las byung la/_rang 
[\[303b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de las byung zhing theg pa chen po yang de las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[303b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma bslabs te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la ma bslabs na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la 
[\[303b.7\]]ma bslabs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_nyan thos kyi byang chub yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_kun dga' bo gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la 
[\[304a.2\]]slob pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[304a.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na spyod pa de srid du 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur/_de 
[\[304a.4\]]bzhin du 'jig rten na chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur/_de bzhin du/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med 
[\[304a.5\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig 
[\[304a.6\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_de 
[\[304a.7\]]bzhin du rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[304b.2\]]dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_rjes su sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes rnams 'jig rten na mchis par 'gyur/_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[304b.3\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i bar du 'jig rten na mchis par 'gyur/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur/_dge ba'i chos bsgom pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 
[\[304b.4\]]'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur/_chos kyi tshul dang /_dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur/_'jig rten na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du mchis par 'gyur lags 
[\[304b.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_legs par smras so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yun ring po ji srid du 'jig rten na spyod par 'gyur ba yun ring po de srid du 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[304b.6\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_'jig rten na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du yod par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na thos pa tsam yang don chen po yin na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba 
[\[304b.7\]]dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mo byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_lha'i bu'am/_lha'i bu mo gang la 
[\[305a.2\]]la'i rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin 
[\[305a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cing /_
[\[305a.4\]]phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das la/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams 
[\[305a.5\]]cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[305a.6\]]da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyang shes 
[\[305a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dga' bo 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus shing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang 'dus la/_dge ba'i chos thams cad 
[\[305b.2\]]kyang sgrub pa dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis nga la bsnyen bkur byas te/_de'i phyir da ltar nga 
[\[305b.3\]]'tsho zhing sdod pa'i lus 'di la khyod kyis dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_gus par byas so/_/nga 'das pa'i 'og tu yang khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_gus par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo nga yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[305b.4\]]'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ci nas kyang yi ge gcig kyang nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du khyod kyi lag tu gtad do/_/
[\[305b.5\]]kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'jig rten na spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs par rig par bya'o/_/de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na sems can rnams la chos ston par rig par bya'o/_/kun 
[\[305b.6\]]dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod par rig par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[305b.7\]]nyan par byed/_yi ger 'dri bar byed/_yi ger 'drir 'jug par byed/_kun chub par byed/_rjod par byed/_'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_ston par byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_phye ma dang /_mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_sgron ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po gzhan 
[\[306a.2\]]dag gis kyang bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/_bla mar byed par 'gyur/_ri mor byed par 'gyur/_mchod par 'gyur/_rjed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang 
[\[306a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag ma de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang 
[\[306a.4\]]ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong lhag ma de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[306a.5\]]yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mjug sdud kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gsum ste rdzogs so//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[306a.6\]]khri pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA war ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[306a.7\]]ye ng+harma he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+teSh+wan+ta thA ga to h+ya wa data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH
